BioCore  3.9.0
A .NET library & program for annotating, editing various microscopy imaging formats using Bioformats supported images. Including whole slide, pyramidal, and series.
Loading...
Searching...
No Matches
Bio.cs
1using AForge;
2using AForge.Imaging.Filters;
3using BitMiracle.LibTiff.Classic;
4using CSScripting;
5using loci.common.services;
6using loci.formats;
7using loci.formats.meta;
8using loci.formats.services;
9using NetVips;
10using Newtonsoft.Json;
11using ome.xml.model.primitives;
12using System.Diagnostics;
13using System.Drawing.Imaging;
14using System.Globalization;
15using System.Runtime.InteropServices;
16using Image = System.Drawing.Image;
17using PixelFormat = System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat;
18using PointF = System.Drawing.PointF;
19using RectangleF = System.Drawing.RectangleF;
20using Size = System.Drawing.Size;
21using IntRange = AForge.IntRange;
22using OpenSlideGTK;

24namespace BioCore
25{
26 /* A class declaration. */
27 public static class Images
28 {
29 public static List<BioImage> images = new List<BioImage>();
32 public static BioImage GetImage(string ids)
33 {
34 for (int i = 0; i < images.Count; i++)
35 {
36 if (images[i].ID == ids || images[i].file == ids || images[i].filename == Path.GetFileName(ids))
37 return images[i];
38 }
39 return null;
40 }
44 public static void AddImage(BioImage im, bool newtab)
45 {
46 if (images.Contains(im)) return;
47 im.Filename = GetImageName(im.ID);
48 im.ID = im.Filename;
49 images.Add(im);
50 System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run(() =>
51 {
52 App.tabsView.Invoke((MethodInvoker)delegate
53 {
54 if (newtab)
55 App.tabsView.AddTab(im);
56 else
57 {
58 if (App.viewer != null)
59 App.viewer.AddImage(im);
60 else
61 App.tabsView.AddTab(im);
62 }
63 Console.WriteLine("Added image " + im.Filename + " to Images Table.");
64 App.nodeView.UpdateNodes();
65 });
66 });
67 }
74 public static int GetImageCountByName(string s)
75 {
76 string name = Path.GetFileName(s);
77 string ext = Path.GetExtension(s);
78 if (name.Split('-').Length > 2)
79 name = name.Remove(name.LastIndexOf('-'), name.Length - name.LastIndexOf('-'));
80 int i = 0;
81 for (int im = 0; im < images.Count; im++)
82 {
83 if (images[im].ID.Contains(name) && images[im].ID.EndsWith(ext))
84 i++;
85 }
86 return i;
87 }
93 public static string GetImageName(string s)
94 {
95 //Here we create a unique ID for an image.
96 int i = Images.GetImageCountByName(s);
97 if (i == 0)
98 return Path.GetFileName(s);
99 string name = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(s);
100 if (Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(name) != name)
101 name = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(name);
102 string ext = s.Substring(s.IndexOf('.'), s.Length - s.IndexOf('.'));
103 if (name.Split('-').Length > 2)
104 {
105 string sts = name.Remove(name.LastIndexOf('-'), name.Length - name.LastIndexOf('-'));
106 return sts + "-" + i + ext;
107 }
108 else
109 return name + "-" + i + ext;
110 }
114 public static void RemoveImage(BioImage im)
115 {
116 RemoveImage(im.ID);
117 }
123 public static void RemoveImage(string id)
124 {
125 BioImage im = GetImage(id);
126 if (im == null)
127 return;
128 images.Remove(im);
129 //im.Dispose();
130 im = null;
131 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Table.RemoveImage(" + '"' + id + '"' + ");");
132 }
138 public static void UpdateImage(BioImage im)
139 {
140 for (int i = 0; i < images.Count; i++)
141 {
142 if (images[i].ID == im.ID)
143 {
144 images[i] = im;
145 return;
146 }
147 }
148 }
149 }
150 /* Defining a struct called ZCT. */
151 public struct ZCT
152 {
153 public int Z { get; set; }
154 public int C { get; set; }
155 public int T { get; set; }
156 public ZCT(int z, int c, int t)
157 {
158 Z = z;
159 C = c;
160 T = t;
161 }
162 public static bool operator ==(ZCT c1, ZCT c2)
163 {
164 if (c1.Z == c2.Z && c1.C == c2.C && c1.T == c2.T)
165 return true;
166 else
167 return false;
168 }
169 public static bool operator !=(ZCT c1, ZCT c2)
170 {
171 if (c1.Z != c2.Z || c1.C != c2.C || c1.T != c2.T)
172 return false;
173 else
174 return true;
175 }
176 public override string ToString()
177 {
178 return Z + "," + C + "," + T;
179 }
180 }
181 public struct ZCTXY
182 {
183 public int Z { get; set; }
184 public int C { get; set; }
185 public int T { get; set; }
186 public int X { get; set; }
187 public int Y { get; set; }
188 /* A constructor for a class called ZCTXY. */
189 public ZCTXY(int z, int c, int t, int x, int y)
190 {
191 Z = z;
192 C = c;
193 T = t;
194 X = x;
195 Y = y;
196 }
197 public override string ToString()
198 {
199 return Z + "," + C + "," + T + "," + X + "," + Y;
200 }
201
202 public static bool operator ==(ZCTXY c1, ZCTXY c2)
203 {
204 if (c1.Z == c2.Z && c1.C == c2.C && c1.T == c2.T && c1.X == c2.X && c1.Y == c2.Y)
205 return true;
206 else
207 return false;
208 }
209 public static bool operator !=(ZCTXY c1, ZCTXY c2)
210 {
211 if (c1.Z != c2.Z || c1.C != c2.C || c1.T != c2.T || c1.X != c2.X || c1.Y != c2.Y)
212 return false;
213 else
214 return true;
215 }
216 }
217 /* A struct that is used to store the resolution of an image. */
218 public struct Resolution
219 {
220 int x;
221 int y;
222 PixelFormat format;
223 double px, py, pz, sx, sy, sz;
224 public int SizeX
225 {
226 get { return x; }
227 set { x = value; }
228 }
229 public int SizeY
230 {
231 get { return y; }
232 set { y = value; }
233 }
234 public double PhysicalSizeX
235 {
236 get { return px; }
237 set { px = value; }
238 }
239 public double PhysicalSizeY
240 {
241 get { return py; }
242 set { py = value; }
243 }
244 public double PhysicalSizeZ
245 {
246 get { return pz; }
247 set { pz = value; }
248 }
249 public double StageSizeX
250 {
251 get { return sx; }
252 set { sx = value; }
253 }
254 public double StageSizeY
255 {
256 get { return sy; }
257 set { sy = value; }
258 }
259 public double StageSizeZ
260 {
261 get { return sz; }
262 set { sz = value; }
263 }
264 public double VolumeWidth
265 {
266 get
267 {
268 return PhysicalSizeX * SizeX;
269 }
270 }
271 public double VolumeHeight
272 {
273 get
274 {
275 return PhysicalSizeY * SizeY;
276 }
277 }
278 public PixelFormat PixelFormat
279 {
280 get { return format; }
281 set { format = value; }
282 }
283 public int RGBChannelsCount
284 {
285 get
286 {
287 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
288 return 1;
289 else if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
290 return 3;
291 else
292 return 4;
293 }
294 }
295 public long SizeInBytes
296 {
297 get
298 {
299 if (format == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
300 return (long)y * (long)x;
301 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
302 return (long)y * (long)x * 2;
303 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
304 return (long)y * (long)x * 3;
305 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb || format == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
306 return (long)y * (long)x * 4;
307 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb || format == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
308 return (long)y * (long)x * 6;
309 throw new NotSupportedException(format + " is not supported.");
310 }
311 }
312 public Resolution(int w, int h, int omePx, int bitsPerPixel, double physX, double physY, double physZ, double stageX, double stageY, double stageZ)
313 {
314 x = w;
315 y = h;
316 sx = stageX;
317 sy = stageY;
318 sz = stageZ;
319 format = BioImage.GetPixelFormat(omePx, bitsPerPixel);
320 px = physX;
321 py = physY;
322 pz = physZ;
323 }
324 public Resolution(int w, int h, PixelFormat f, double physX, double physY, double physZ, double stageX, double stageY, double stageZ)
325 {
326 x = w;
327 y = h;
328 format = f;
329 sx = stageX;
330 sy = stageY;
331 sz = stageZ;
332 px = physX;
333 py = physY;
334 pz = physZ;
335 }
336 public Resolution Copy()
337 {
338 return new Resolution(x, y, format, px, py, pz, sx, sy, sz);
339 }
340 public override string ToString()
341 {
342 return "(" + x + ", " + y + ") " + format.ToString() + " " + (SizeInBytes / 1000) + " KB";
343 }
344 }
345 public enum RGB
346 {
347 R,
348 G,
349 B,
350 Gray
351 }
352 public struct ColorS : IDisposable
353 {
354 internal byte[] bytes;
355 public ColorS(ushort s)
356 {
357 bytes = new byte[6];
358 R = s;
359 G = s;
360 B = s;
361 }
362 public ColorS(ushort r, ushort g, ushort b)
363 {
364 bytes = new byte[6];
365 R = r;
366 G = g;
367 B = b;
368 }
369 public float Rf
370 {
371 get { return (float)R / (float)ushort.MaxValue; }
372 set
373 {
374 Byte[] bt = BitConverter.GetBytes(value * ushort.MaxValue);
375 bytes[4] = bt[1];
376 bytes[5] = bt[0];
377 }
378 }
379 public float Gf
380 {
381 get { return (float)G / (float)ushort.MaxValue; }
382 set
383 {
384 Byte[] bt = BitConverter.GetBytes(value * ushort.MaxValue);
385 bytes[2] = bt[1];
386 bytes[3] = bt[0];
387 }
388 }
389 public float Bf
390 {
391 get { return (float)B / (float)ushort.MaxValue; }
392 set
393 {
394 Byte[] bt = BitConverter.GetBytes(value * ushort.MaxValue);
395 bytes[0] = bt[1];
396 bytes[1] = bt[0];
397 }
398 }
399 public ushort R
400 {
401 get { return BitConverter.ToUInt16(bytes, 0); }
402 set
403 {
404 byte[] bt = BitConverter.GetBytes(value);
405 bytes[0] = bt[0];
406 bytes[1] = bt[1];
407 }
408 }
409 public ushort G
410 {
411 get { return BitConverter.ToUInt16(bytes, 2); }
412 set
413 {
414 byte[] bt = BitConverter.GetBytes(value);
415 bytes[2] = bt[0];
416 bytes[3] = bt[1];
417 }
418 }
419 public ushort B
420 {
421 get { return BitConverter.ToUInt16(bytes, 4); }
422 set
423 {
424 byte[] bt = BitConverter.GetBytes(value);
425 bytes[4] = bt[0];
426 bytes[5] = bt[1];
427 }
428 }
429 public byte[] Bytes { get { return bytes; } }
430 public static ColorS FromColor(System.Drawing.Color col)
431 {
432 float r = (((float)col.R) / 255) * ushort.MaxValue;
433 float g = (((float)col.G) / 255) * ushort.MaxValue;
434 float b = (((float)col.B) / 255) * ushort.MaxValue;
435 ColorS color = ColorS.FromVector(r, g, b);
436 return color;
437 }
438 public static ColorS FromVector(float x, float y, float z)
439 {
440 ColorS color = new ColorS();
441 color.bytes = new byte[6];
442 color.Rf = x;
443 color.Gf = y;
444 color.Bf = z;
445 return color;
446 }
452 public byte[] GetBytes(PixelFormat px)
453 {
454 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
455 {
456 byte[] bt = new byte[1];
457 bt[0] = (byte)R;
458 return bt;
459 }
460 else
461 if (px == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
462 {
463 return BitConverter.GetBytes(R);
464 }
465 else
466 if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
467 {
468 byte[] bt = new byte[3];
469 bt[0] = (byte)B;
470 bt[1] = (byte)G;
471 bt[2] = (byte)R;
472 return bt;
473 }
474 else
475 if (px == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb || px == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
476 {
477 byte[] bt = new byte[4];
478 bt[0] = 255;
479 bt[1] = (byte)R;
480 bt[2] = (byte)G;
481 bt[3] = (byte)B;
482 return bt;
483 }
484 else
485 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
486 {
487 return bytes;
488 }
489 throw new InvalidDataException("Pixel format: " + px.ToString() + " is not supported");
490
491 }
499 public static System.Drawing.Color ToColor(ColorS col, int bitsPerPixel)
500 {
501 if (bitsPerPixel == 8)
502 {
503 System.Drawing.Color c = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb((byte)col.R, (byte)col.G, (byte)col.B);
504 return c;
505 }
506 else
507 {
508 int r = (int)(((float)col.R / 65535) * 255);
509 int g = (int)(((float)col.G / 65535) * 255);
510 int b = (int)(((float)col.B / 65535) * 255);
511 System.Drawing.Color c = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb((byte)r, (byte)g, (byte)b);
512 return c;
513 }
514 }
515 public SharpDX.Vector4 ToVector()
516 {
517 return new SharpDX.Vector4(Rf, Gf, Bf, 1.0f);
518 }
519 public override string ToString()
520 {
521 return R + "," + G + "," + B;
522 }
523 public override bool Equals(object obj)
524 {
525 ColorS s = (ColorS)obj;
526 if (s.R == R && s.G == G && s.B == B)
527 return true;
528 else
529 return false;
530 }
531 public static ColorS operator /(ColorS a, ColorS b)
532 {
533 return new ColorS((ushort)(a.Rf / b.Rf), (ushort)(a.Gf / b.Gf), (ushort)(a.Bf / b.Bf));
534 }
535 public static ColorS operator *(ColorS a, ColorS b)
536 {
537 return new ColorS((ushort)(a.Rf * b.Rf), (ushort)(a.Gf * b.Gf), (ushort)(a.Bf * b.Bf));
538 }
539 public static ColorS operator +(ColorS a, ColorS b)
540 {
541 return new ColorS((ushort)(a.Rf + b.Rf), (ushort)(a.Gf + b.Gf), (ushort)(a.Bf + b.Bf));
542 }
543 public static ColorS operator -(ColorS a, ColorS b)
544 {
545 return new ColorS((ushort)(a.Rf - b.Rf), (ushort)(a.Gf - b.Gf), (ushort)(a.Bf - b.Bf));
546 }
547 public static ColorS operator /(ColorS a, float b)
548 {
549 return ColorS.FromVector(a.Rf / b, a.Gf / b, a.Bf / b);
550 }
551 public static ColorS operator *(ColorS a, float b)
552 {
553 return ColorS.FromVector(a.Rf * b, a.Gf * b, a.Bf * b);
554 }
555 public static ColorS operator +(ColorS a, float b)
556 {
557 return ColorS.FromVector(a.Rf + b, a.Gf + b, a.Bf + b);
558 }
559 public static ColorS operator -(ColorS a, float b)
560 {
561 return ColorS.FromVector(a.Rf - b, a.Gf - b, a.Bf - b);
562 }
563 public static bool operator ==(ColorS a, ColorS b)
564 {
565 if (a.R == b.R && a.G == b.G && a.B == b.B)
566 return true;
567 else
568 return false;
569 }
570 public static bool operator !=(ColorS a, ColorS b)
571 {
572 if (a.R == b.R && a.G == b.G && a.B == b.B)
573 return false;
574 else
575 return true;
576 }
577 public void Dispose()
578 {
579 bytes = null;
580 }
581 }
582 public struct RectangleD
583 {
584 private double x;
585 private double y;
586 private double w;
587 private double h;
588 public double X { get { return x; } set { x = value; } }
589 public double Y { get { return y; } set { y = value; } }
590 public double W { get { return w; } set { w = value; } }
591 public double H { get { return h; } set { h = value; } }
592
593 /* Creating a new rectangle with the given parameters. */
594 public RectangleD(double X, double Y, double W, double H)
595 {
596 x = X;
597 y = Y;
598 w = W;
599 h = H;
600 }
601 public System.Drawing.Rectangle ToRectangleInt()
602 {
603 return new System.Drawing.Rectangle((int)X, (int)Y, (int)W, (int)H);
604 }
611 public bool IntersectsWith(RectangleD p)
612 {
613 if (IntersectsWith(p.X, p.Y) || IntersectsWith(p.X + p.W, p.Y) || IntersectsWith(p.X, p.Y + p.H) || IntersectsWith(p.X + p.W, p.Y + p.H))
614 return true;
615 else
616 return false;
617 }
618 public bool IntersectsWith(PointD p)
619 {
620 return IntersectsWith(p.X, p.Y);
621 }
628 public bool IntersectsWith(double x, double y)
629 {
630 if (X <= x && (X + W) >= x && Y <= y && (Y + H) >= y)
631 return true;
632 else
633 return false;
634 }
635 public RectangleF ToRectangleF()
636 {
637 return new RectangleF((float)X, (float)Y, (float)W, (float)H);
638 }
639 public override string ToString()
640 {
641 return X.ToString() + ", " + Y.ToString() + ", " + W.ToString() + ", " + H.ToString();
642 }
643
644 }
645 public class ROI
646 {
647 public enum Type
648 {
649 Rectangle,
650 Point,
651 Line,
652 Polygon,
653 Polyline,
654 Freeform,
655 Ellipse,
656 Label,
657 Mask
658 }
659 /* A property of a class. */
660 public PointD Point
661 {
662 get
663 {
664 if (Points.Count == 0)
665 return new PointD(0, 0);
666 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Ellipse || type == Type.Label || type == Type.Freeform)
667 return new PointD(BoundingBox.X, BoundingBox.Y);
668 return Points[0];
669 }
670 set
671 {
672 if (Points.Count == 0)
673 {
674 AddPoint(value);
675 }
676 else
677 UpdatePoint(value, 0);
678 UpdateBoundingBox();
679 }
680 }
681 /* A property of a class. */
682 public RectangleD Rect
683 {
684 get
685 {
686 if (Points.Count == 0)
687 return new RectangleD(0, 0, 0, 0);
688 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Polyline || type == Type.Polygon || type == Type.Freeform || type == Type.Label)
689 return BoundingBox;
690 if (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse)
691 return new RectangleD(Points[0].X, Points[0].Y, Points[1].X - Points[0].X, Points[2].Y - Points[0].Y);
692 else
693 return new RectangleD(Points[0].X, Points[0].Y, 1, 1);
694 }
695 set
696 {
697 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Polyline || type == Type.Polygon || type == Type.Freeform)
698 {
699 BoundingBox = value;
700 }
701 else
702 if (Points.Count < 4 && (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse))
703 {
704 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X, value.Y));
705 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y));
706 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X, value.Y + value.H));
707 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y + value.H));
708 }
709 else
710 if (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse)
711 {
712 Points[0] = new PointD(value.X, value.Y);
713 Points[1] = new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y);
714 Points[2] = new PointD(value.X, value.Y + value.H);
715 Points[3] = new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y + value.H);
716 }
717 UpdateBoundingBox();
718 }
719 }
720 /* A property of a class. */
721 public double X
722 {
723 get
724 {
725 return Point.X;
726 }
727 set
728 {
729 Rect = new RectangleD(value, Y, W, H);
730 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
731 }
732 }
733 /* A property of a class. */
734 public double Y
735 {
736 get
737 {
738 return Point.Y;
739 }
740 set
741 {
742 Rect = new RectangleD(X, value, W, H);
743 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
744 }
745 }
746 public double W
747 {
748 get
749 {
750 if (type == Type.Point)
751 return strokeWidth;
752 else
753 return BoundingBox.W;
754 }
755 set
756 {
757 Rect = new RectangleD(X, Y, value, H);
758 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
759 }
760 }
761 public double H
762 {
763 get
764 {
765 if (type == Type.Point)
766 return strokeWidth;
767 else
768 return BoundingBox.H;
769 }
770 set
771 {
772 Rect = new RectangleD(X, Y, W, value);
773 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
774 }
775 }
776 public Type type;
777 public static float selectBoxSize = 8f;
778 private List<PointD> Points = new List<PointD>();
779 public List<PointD> PointsD
780 {
781 get
782 {
783 return Points;
784 }
785 }
786 private List<RectangleD> selectBoxs = new List<RectangleD>();
787 public List<int> selectedPoints = new List<int>();
788 public RectangleD BoundingBox;
789 public Font font = System.Drawing.SystemFonts.DefaultFont;
790 public ZCT coord;
791 public System.Drawing.Color strokeColor;
792 public System.Drawing.Color fillColor;
793 public bool isFilled = false;
794 public string id = "";
795 public string roiID = "";
796 public string roiName = "";
797 public int serie = 0;
798 private string text = "";
799 public string properties;
800 public double strokeWidth = 1;
801 public int shapeIndex = 0;
802 public bool closed = false;
803 public bool selected = false;
804 public PointD[] PointsImage
805 {
806 get
807 {
808 return ImageView.SelectedImage.ToImageSpace(PointsD);
809 }
810 }
814 public ROI Copy()
815 {
816 ROI copy = new ROI();
817 copy.id = id;
818 copy.roiID = roiID;
819 copy.roiName = roiName;
820 copy.text = text;
821 copy.strokeWidth = strokeWidth;
822 copy.strokeColor = strokeColor;
823 copy.fillColor = fillColor;
824 copy.Points = Points;
825 copy.selected = selected;
826 copy.shapeIndex = shapeIndex;
827 copy.closed = closed;
828 copy.font = font;
829 copy.selectBoxs = selectBoxs;
830 copy.BoundingBox = BoundingBox;
831 copy.isFilled = isFilled;
832 copy.coord = coord;
833 copy.selectedPoints = selectedPoints;
834
835 return copy;
836 }
842 public ROI Copy(ZCT cord)
843 {
844 ROI copy = new ROI();
845 copy.type = type;
846 copy.id = id;
847 copy.roiID = roiID;
848 copy.roiName = roiName;
849 copy.text = text;
850 copy.strokeWidth = strokeWidth;
851 copy.strokeColor = strokeColor;
852 copy.fillColor = fillColor;
853 copy.Points.AddRange(Points);
854 copy.selected = selected;
855 copy.shapeIndex = shapeIndex;
856 copy.closed = closed;
857 copy.font = font;
858 copy.selectBoxs.AddRange(selectBoxs);
859 copy.BoundingBox = BoundingBox;
860 copy.isFilled = isFilled;
861 copy.coord = cord;
862 copy.selectedPoints = selectedPoints;
863 return copy;
864 }
865 /* A property of a class. */
866 public string Text
867 {
868 get
869 {
870 return text;
871 }
872 set
873 {
874 text = value;
875 if (type == Type.Label)
876 {
877 UpdateBoundingBox();
878 }
879 }
880 }
881 public Size TextSize
882 {
883 get
884 {
885 return TextRenderer.MeasureText(text, font);
886 }
887 }
888 public Mask roiMask { get; set; }
892 public class Mask : IDisposable
893 {
894 public float min = 0;
895 float[] mask;
896 int width;
897 int height;
898 public int Width { get { return width; } set { width = value; } }
899 public int Height { get { return height; } set { height = value; } }
900 public double PhysicalSizeX { get; set; }
901 public double PhysicalSizeY { get; set; }
902 bool updatePixbuf = true;
903 bool updateColored = true;
904 BufferInfo pixbuf;
905 BufferInfo colored;
906 bool selected = false;
907 internal bool Selected
908 {
909 get { return selected; }
910 set
911 {
912 selected = value;
913 if (selected)
914 UpdateColored(System.Drawing.Color.Blue);
915 else
916 updateColored = true;
917 }
918 }
919 public bool IsSelected(int x, int y)
920 {
921 int ind = y * width + x;
922 if (ind > mask.Length)
923 throw new ArgumentException("Point " + x + "," + y + " is outside the mask.");
924 if (mask[ind] > min)
925 {
926 return true;
927 }
928 return false;
929 }
930 public float GetValue(int x, int y)
931 {
932 int ind = y * width + x;
933 if (ind > mask.Length)
934 throw new ArgumentException("Point " + x + "," + y + " is outside the mask.");
935 return mask[ind];
936 }
937 public void SetValue(int x, int y, float val)
938 {
939 int ind = y * width + x;
940 if (ind > mask.Length)
941 throw new ArgumentException("Point " + x + "," + y + " is outside the mask.");
942 mask[ind] = val;
943 updatePixbuf = true;
944 updateColored = true;
945 }
946 public Mask(float[] fts, int width, int height, double physX, double physY)
947 {
948 this.width = width;
949 this.height = height;
950 PhysicalSizeX = physX;
951 PhysicalSizeY = physY;
952 mask = fts;
953 }
954 public Mask(byte[] bts, int width, int height, double physX, double physY)
955 {
956 this.width = width;
957 this.height = height;
958 PhysicalSizeX = physX;
959 PhysicalSizeY = physY;
960 mask = new float[bts.Length];
961 for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)
962 {
963 for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)
964 {
965 int ind = y * width + x;
966 mask[ind] = (float)BitConverter.ToSingle(bts, ind * 4);
967 }
968 }
969 }
970 public BufferInfo Bitmap
971 {
972 get
973 {
974 if (updatePixbuf)
975 {
976 if (pixbuf != null)
977 pixbuf.Dispose();
978 byte[] pixelData = new byte[width * height * 4];
979 for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)
980 {
981 for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)
982 {
983 int ind = y * width + x;
984 if (mask[ind] > 0)
985 {
986 pixelData[4 * ind] = (byte)(mask[ind] / 255);// Blue
987 pixelData[4 * ind + 1] = (byte)(mask[ind] / 255);// Green
988 pixelData[4 * ind + 2] = (byte)(mask[ind] / 255);// Red
989 pixelData[4 * ind + 3] = 125;// Alpha
990 }
991 else
992 pixelData[4 * ind + 3] = 0;
993 }
994 }
995 pixbuf = new BufferInfo("",width,height,PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb,pixelData, new ZCT(), 0);
996 updatePixbuf = false;
997 return pixbuf;
998 }
999 else
1000 return pixbuf;
1001 }
1002 }
1003 void UpdateColored(System.Drawing.Color col)
1004 {
1005 byte[] pixelData = new byte[width * height * 4];
1006 for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)
1007 {
1008 for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)
1009 {
1010 int ind = y * width + x;
1011 if (mask[ind] > 0)
1012 {
1013 pixelData[4 * ind] = col.R;
1014 pixelData[4 * ind + 1] = col.G;
1015 pixelData[4 * ind + 2] = col.B;
1016 pixelData[4 * ind + 3] = 125;
1017 }
1018 else
1019 pixelData[4 * ind + 3] = 0;
1020 }
1021 }
1022 colored = new BufferInfo(width, height, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb, pixelData, new ZCT(), "");
1023 updateColored = false;
1024 }
1025 public BufferInfo GetColored(System.Drawing.Color col, bool forceUpdate = false)
1026 {
1027 if (updateColored || forceUpdate)
1028 {
1029 UpdateColored(col);
1030 return colored;
1031 }
1032 else
1033 return colored;
1034 }
1035 public byte[] GetBytes()
1036 {
1037 byte[] pixelData = new byte[width * height * 4];
1038 for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)
1039 {
1040 for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)
1041 {
1042 int ind = y * width + x;
1043 byte[] bt = BitConverter.GetBytes(mask[ind]);
1044 pixelData[4 * ind] = bt[0];
1045 pixelData[4 * ind + 1] = bt[1];
1046 pixelData[4 * ind + 2] = bt[2];
1047 pixelData[4 * ind + 3] = bt[3];
1048 }
1049 }
1050 return pixelData;
1051 }
1052 public void Dispose()
1053 {
1054 if (pixbuf != null)
1055 pixbuf.Dispose();
1056 if (colored != null)
1057 colored.Dispose();
1058 mask = null;
1059 }
1060 }
1061
1062 public ROI()
1063 {
1064 coord = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
1065 strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.Yellow;
1066 font = SystemFonts.DefaultFont;
1067 BoundingBox = new RectangleD(0, 0, 1, 1);
1068 }
1075 public RectangleD GetSelectBound(double scaleX, double scaleY)
1076 {
1077 double fx = scaleX / 2;
1078 double fy = scaleY / 2;
1079 return new RectangleD(BoundingBox.X - fx, BoundingBox.Y - fy, BoundingBox.W + scaleX, BoundingBox.H + scaleY);
1080 }
1085 public RectangleD[] GetSelectBoxes()
1086 {
1087 selectBoxs.Clear();
1088 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
1089 {
1090 selectBoxs.Add(new RectangleD((Points[i].X), (Points[i].Y), ROI.selectBoxSize, ROI.selectBoxSize));
1091 }
1092 return selectBoxs.ToArray();
1093 }
1100 public RectangleD[] GetSelectBoxes(double s)
1101 {
1102 double f = s / 2;
1103 selectBoxs.Clear();
1104 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
1105 {
1106 selectBoxs.Add(new RectangleD((float)(Points[i].X - f), (float)(Points[i].Y - f), (float)s, (float)s));
1107 }
1108 return selectBoxs.ToArray();
1109 }
1117 public static ROI CreatePoint(ZCT coord, double x, double y)
1118 {
1119 ROI an = new ROI();
1120 an.coord = coord;
1121 an.AddPoint(new PointD(x, y));
1122 an.type = Type.Point;
1123 Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreatePoint(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), " + x + "," + y + ");");
1124 return an;
1125 }
1136 public static ROI CreatePoint(int s, int z, int c, int t, double x, double y)
1137 {
1138 return CreatePoint(new ZCT(z, c, t), x, y);
1139 }
1147 public static ROI CreateLine(ZCT coord, PointD x1, PointD x2)
1148 {
1149 ROI an = new ROI();
1150 an.coord = coord;
1151 an.type = Type.Line;
1152 an.AddPoint(x1);
1153 an.AddPoint(x2);
1154 Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreateLine(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), new PointD(" + x1.X + "," + x1.Y + "), new PointD(" + x2.X + "," + x2.Y + "));");
1155 return an;
1156 }
1166 public static ROI CreateRectangle(ZCT coord, double x, double y, double w, double h)
1167 {
1168 ROI an = new ROI();
1169 an.coord = coord;
1170 an.type = Type.Rectangle;
1171 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
1172 Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreateRectangle(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), new RectangleD(" + x + "," + y + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
1173 return an;
1174 }
1184 public static ROI CreateEllipse(ZCT coord, double x, double y, double w, double h)
1185 {
1186 ROI an = new ROI();
1187 an.coord = coord;
1188 an.type = Type.Ellipse;
1189 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
1190 Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreateEllipse(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), new RectangleD(" + x + "," + y + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
1191 return an;
1192 }
1199 public static ROI CreatePolygon(ZCT coord, PointD[] pts)
1200 {
1201 ROI an = new ROI();
1202 an.coord = coord;
1203 an.type = Type.Polygon;
1204 an.AddPoints(pts);
1205 an.closed = true;
1206 return an;
1207 }
1214 public static ROI CreateFreeform(ZCT coord, PointD[] pts)
1215 {
1216 ROI an = new ROI();
1217 an.coord = coord;
1218 an.type = Type.Freeform;
1219 an.AddPoints(pts);
1220 an.closed = true;
1221 return an;
1222 }
1223 public static ROI CreateMask(ZCT coord, float[] mask, int width, int height, PointD loc, double physicalX, double physicalY)
1224 {
1225 ROI an = new ROI();
1226 an.coord = coord;
1227 an.type = Type.Mask;
1228 an.roiMask = new Mask(mask, width, height, physicalX, physicalY);
1229 an.AddPoint(loc);
1230 return an;
1231 }
1232 public static ROI CreateMask(ZCT coord, byte[] mask, int width, int height, PointD loc, double physicalX, double physicalY)
1233 {
1234 ROI an = new ROI();
1235 an.coord = coord;
1236 an.type = Type.Mask;
1237 an.roiMask = new Mask(mask, width, height, physicalX, physicalY);
1238 an.AddPoint(loc);
1239 return an;
1240 }
1245 public void UpdatePoint(PointD p, int i)
1246 {
1247 if (i < Points.Count)
1248 {
1249 Points[i] = p;
1250 }
1251 UpdateBoundingBox();
1252 }
1258 public PointD GetPoint(int i)
1259 {
1260 return Points[i];
1261 }
1265 public PointD[] GetPoints()
1266 {
1267 return Points.ToArray();
1268 }
1272 public System.Drawing.PointF[] GetPointsF()
1273 {
1274 PointF[] pfs = new PointF[Points.Count];
1275 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
1276 {
1277 pfs[i].X = (float)Points[i].X;
1278 pfs[i].Y = (float)Points[i].Y;
1279 }
1280 return pfs;
1281 }
1285 public void AddPoint(PointD p)
1286 {
1287 Points.Add(p);
1288 UpdateBoundingBox();
1289 }
1293 public void AddPoints(PointD[] p)
1294 {
1295 Points.AddRange(p);
1296 UpdateBoundingBox();
1297 }
1301 public void AddPoints(float[] xp, float[] yp)
1302 {
1303 for (int i = 0; i < xp.Length; i++)
1304 {
1305 Points.Add(new PointD(xp[i], yp[i]));
1306 }
1307 UpdateBoundingBox();
1308 }
1312 public void AddPoints(int[] xp, int[] yp)
1313 {
1314 for (int i = 0; i < xp.Length; i++)
1315 {
1316 Points.Add(new PointD(xp[i], yp[i]));
1317 }
1318 UpdateBoundingBox();
1319 }
1323 public void RemovePoints(int[] indexs)
1324 {
1325 List<PointD> inds = new List<PointD>();
1326 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
1327 {
1328 bool found = false;
1329 for (int ind = 0; ind < indexs.Length; ind++)
1330 {
1331 if (indexs[ind] == i)
1332 found = true;
1333 }
1334 if (!found)
1335 inds.Add(Points[i]);
1336 }
1337 Points = inds;
1338 UpdateBoundingBox();
1339 }
1343 public int GetPointCount()
1344 {
1345 return Points.Count;
1346 }
1352 public PointD[] stringToPoints(string s)
1353 {
1354 List<PointD> pts = new List<PointD>();
1355 string[] ints = s.Split(' ');
1356 for (int i = 0; i < ints.Length; i++)
1357 {
1358 string[] sints;
1359 if (s.Contains("\t"))
1360 sints = ints[i].Split('\t');
1361 else
1362 sints = ints[i].Split(',');
1363 double x = double.Parse(sints[0]);
1364 double y = double.Parse(sints[1]);
1365 pts.Add(new PointD(x, y));
1366 }
1367 return pts.ToArray();
1368 }
1374 public string PointsToString(BioImage b)
1375 {
1376 string pts = "";
1377 PointD[] ps = b.ToImageSpace(Points);
1378 for (int j = 0; j < ps.Length; j++)
1379 {
1380 if (j == ps.Length - 1)
1381 pts += ps[j].X.ToString() + "," + ps[j].Y.ToString();
1382 else
1383 pts += ps[j].X.ToString() + "," + ps[j].Y.ToString() + " ";
1384 }
1385 return pts;
1386 }
1389 public void UpdateBoundingBox()
1390 {
1391 if (type == Type.Label)
1392 {
1393 if (text != "")
1394 {
1395 Size s = TextSize;
1396 BoundingBox = new RectangleD(Points[0].X, Points[0].Y, s.Width, s.Height);
1397 }
1398 }
1399 else
1400 {
1401 PointD min = new PointD(double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue);
1402 PointD max = new PointD(double.MinValue, double.MinValue);
1403 foreach (PointD p in Points)
1404 {
1405 if (min.X > p.X)
1406 min.X = p.X;
1407 if (min.Y > p.Y)
1408 min.Y = p.Y;
1409
1410 if (max.X < p.X)
1411 max.X = p.X;
1412 if (max.Y < p.Y)
1413 max.Y = p.Y;
1414 }
1415 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
1416 r.X = min.X;
1417 r.Y = min.Y;
1418 r.W = max.X - min.X;
1419 r.H = max.Y - min.Y;
1420 if (r.W == 0)
1421 r.W = 1;
1422 if (r.H == 0)
1423 r.H = 1;
1424 BoundingBox = r;
1425 }
1426 }
1432 public override string ToString()
1433 {
1434 return type.ToString() + ", " + Text + " (" + W + ", " + H + "); " + " (" + Point.X + ", " + Point.Y + ") " + coord.ToString();
1435 }
1436 }
1437 public class Channel : IDisposable
1438 {
1439 public IntRange[] range;
1440 public ChannelInfo info;
1441 public Statistics[] stats;
1442 private ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod contrastMethod = null;
1443 private ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType illuminationType = null;
1444 private ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode acquisitionMode = null;
1445 private int index;
1446 [Serializable]
1447 public struct ChannelInfo
1448 {
1449 internal string name;
1450 internal string ID;
1451 internal int index;
1452 internal string fluor;
1453 internal int samplesPerPixel;
1454 internal System.Drawing.Color? color;
1455 internal int emission;
1456 internal int excitation;
1457 internal int exposure;
1458 internal string lightSource;
1459 internal double lightSourceIntensity;
1460 internal int lightSourceWavelength;
1461 internal string contrastMethod;
1462 internal string illuminationType;
1463 internal int bitsPerPixel;
1464 internal int min, max;
1465 internal string diodeName;
1466 internal string lightSourceAttenuation;
1467 internal string acquisitionMode;
1468 public string Name
1469 {
1470 get { return name; }
1471 set { name = value; }
1472 }
1473 public int Index
1474 {
1475 get
1476 {
1477 return index;
1478 }
1479 set
1480 {
1481 index = value;
1482 }
1483
1484 }
1485 public int Min
1486 {
1487 get
1488 {
1489 return min;
1490 }
1491 set
1492 {
1493 if (value <= 0)
1494 {
1495 max = 0;
1496 return;
1497 }
1498 if (value > ushort.MaxValue)
1499 min = 0;
1500 else
1501 min = value;
1502 }
1503 }
1504 public int Max
1505 {
1506 get
1507 {
1508 return max;
1509 }
1510 set
1511 {
1512 if (value <= 0)
1513 {
1514 max = 1;
1515 return;
1516 }
1517 if (value > ushort.MaxValue)
1518 max = ushort.MaxValue;
1519 else
1520 max = value;
1521
1522 }
1523 }
1524 public string Fluor
1525 {
1526 get { return fluor; }
1527 set { fluor = value; }
1528 }
1529 public int SamplesPerPixel
1530 {
1531 get { return samplesPerPixel; }
1532 set { samplesPerPixel = value; }
1533 }
1534 public System.Drawing.Color? Color
1535 {
1536 get { return color; }
1537 set { color = value; }
1538 }
1539 public int Emission
1540 {
1541 get { return emission; }
1542 set { emission = value; }
1543 }
1544 public int Excitation
1545 {
1546 get { return excitation; }
1547 set { excitation = value; }
1548 }
1549 public int Exposure
1550 {
1551 get { return exposure; }
1552 set { exposure = value; }
1553 }
1554 public string LightSource
1555 {
1556 get { return lightSource; }
1557 set { lightSource = value; }
1558 }
1559 public double LightSourceIntensity
1560 {
1561 get { return lightSourceIntensity; }
1562 set { lightSourceIntensity = value; }
1563 }
1564 public int LightSourceWavelength
1565 {
1566 get { return lightSourceWavelength; }
1567 set { lightSourceWavelength = value; }
1568 }
1569 public string ContrastMethod
1570 {
1571 get
1572 {
1573 if (contrastMethod == null)
1574 return ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod.BRIGHTFIELD.ToString();
1575 return contrastMethod;
1576 }
1577 set
1578 {
1579 contrastMethod = value;
1580 }
1581 }
1582 public string IlluminationType
1583 {
1584 get
1585 {
1586 if (illuminationType == null)
1587 return ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType.OTHER.ToString();
1588 return illuminationType;
1589 }
1590 set
1591 {
1592 illuminationType = value;
1593 }
1594 }
1595 public string DiodeName
1596 {
1597 get { return diodeName; }
1598 set
1599 {
1600 diodeName = value;
1601 }
1602 }
1603 public string LightSourceAttenuation
1604 {
1605 get { return lightSourceAttenuation; }
1606 set
1607 {
1608 lightSourceAttenuation = value;
1609 }
1610 }
1611 public string AcquisitionMode
1612 {
1613 get
1614 {
1615 if (acquisitionMode == null)
1616 return ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode.WIDEFIELD.ToString();
1617 return acquisitionMode;
1618 }
1619 set
1620 {
1621 acquisitionMode = value;
1622 }
1623 }
1624 }
1630 public static System.Drawing.Color SpectralColor(double l) // RGB <0,1> <- lambda l <400,700> [nm]
1631 {
1632 double t;
1633 double r = 0;
1634 double g = 0;
1635 double b = 0;
1636 if ((l >= 400.0) && (l < 410.0)) { t = (l - 400.0) / (410.0 - 400.0); r = +(0.33 * t) - (0.20 * t * t); }
1637 else if ((l >= 410.0) && (l < 475.0)) { t = (l - 410.0) / (475.0 - 410.0); r = 0.14 - (0.13 * t * t); }
1638 else if ((l >= 545.0) && (l < 595.0)) { t = (l - 545.0) / (595.0 - 545.0); r = +(1.98 * t) - (t * t); }
1639 else if ((l >= 595.0) && (l < 650.0)) { t = (l - 595.0) / (650.0 - 595.0); r = 0.98 + (0.06 * t) - (0.40 * t * t); }
1640 else if ((l >= 650.0) && (l < 700.0)) { t = (l - 650.0) / (700.0 - 650.0); r = 0.65 - (0.84 * t) + (0.20 * t * t); }
1641 if ((l >= 415.0) && (l < 475.0)) { t = (l - 415.0) / (475.0 - 415.0); g = +(0.80 * t * t); }
1642 else if ((l >= 475.0) && (l < 590.0)) { t = (l - 475.0) / (590.0 - 475.0); g = 0.8 + (0.76 * t) - (0.80 * t * t); }
1643 else if ((l >= 585.0) && (l < 639.0)) { t = (l - 585.0) / (639.0 - 585.0); g = 0.84 - (0.84 * t); }
1644 if ((l >= 400.0) && (l < 475.0)) { t = (l - 400.0) / (475.0 - 400.0); b = +(2.20 * t) - (1.50 * t * t); }
1645 else if ((l >= 475.0) && (l < 560.0)) { t = (l - 475.0) / (560.0 - 475.0); b = 0.7 - (t) + (0.30 * t * t); }
1646 r *= 255;
1647 g *= 255;
1648 b *= 255;
1649 return System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(255, (int)r, (int)g, (int)b);
1650 }
1651 public string Name
1652 {
1653 get { return info.name; }
1654 set { info.name = value; }
1655 }
1656 public int Index
1657 {
1658 get
1659 {
1660 return index;
1661 }
1662 set
1663 {
1664 index = value;
1665 }
1666 }
1667 public IntRange RangeR
1668 {
1669 get
1670 {
1671 return range[0];
1672 }
1673 }
1674 public IntRange RangeG
1675 {
1676 get
1677 {
1678 if (range.Length > 1)
1679 return range[1];
1680 else
1681 return range[0];
1682 }
1683 }
1684 public IntRange RangeB
1685 {
1686 get
1687 {
1688 if (range.Length > 1)
1689 return range[2];
1690 else
1691 return range[0];
1692 }
1693 }
1694 public string Fluor
1695 {
1696 get { return info.fluor; }
1697 set { info.fluor = value; }
1698 }
1699 public int SamplesPerPixel
1700 {
1701 get { return info.samplesPerPixel; }
1702 set
1703 {
1704 info.samplesPerPixel = value;
1705 range = new IntRange[info.samplesPerPixel];
1706 }
1707 }
1708 public System.Drawing.Color? Color
1709 {
1710 get { return info.color; }
1711 set { info.color = value; }
1712 }
1713 public System.Drawing.Color EmissionColor
1714 {
1715 get { return SpectralColor(Emission); }
1716 }
1717 public int Emission
1718 {
1719 get { return info.emission; }
1720 set { info.emission = value; }
1721 }
1722 public int Excitation
1723 {
1724 get { return info.excitation; }
1725 set { info.excitation = value; }
1726 }
1727 public int Exposure
1728 {
1729 get { return info.exposure; }
1730 set { info.exposure = value; }
1731 }
1732 public string LightSource
1733 {
1734 get { return info.lightSource; }
1735 set { info.lightSource = value; }
1736 }
1737 public double LightSourceIntensity
1738 {
1739 get { return info.lightSourceIntensity; }
1740 set { info.lightSourceIntensity = value; }
1741 }
1742 public int LightSourceWavelength
1743 {
1744 get { return info.lightSourceWavelength; }
1745 set { info.lightSourceWavelength = value; }
1746 }
1747 public string LightSourceAttenuation
1748 {
1749 get { return info.lightSourceAttenuation; }
1750 set { info.lightSourceAttenuation = value; }
1751 }
1752 public string DiodeName
1753 {
1754 get { return info.diodeName; }
1755 set { info.diodeName = value; }
1756 }
1757 public ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod ContrastMethod
1758 {
1759 get { return contrastMethod; }
1760 set
1761 {
1762 contrastMethod = value;
1763 }
1764 }
1765 public ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType IlluminationType
1766 {
1767 get { return illuminationType; }
1768 set { illuminationType = value; }
1769 }
1770 public ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode AcquisitionMode
1771 {
1772 get { return acquisitionMode; }
1773 set { acquisitionMode = value; }
1774 }
1775
1776 public int BitsPerPixel
1777 {
1778 get { return info.bitsPerPixel; }
1779 set { info.bitsPerPixel = value; }
1780 }
1781 public Channel(int ind, int bitsPerPixel, int samples)
1782 {
1783 info = new ChannelInfo();
1784 if (bitsPerPixel == 16)
1785 info.Max = 65535;
1786 if (bitsPerPixel == 14)
1787 info.Max = 16383;
1788 if (bitsPerPixel == 12)
1789 info.Max = 4096;
1790 if (bitsPerPixel == 10)
1791 info.Max = 1024;
1792 if (bitsPerPixel == 8)
1793 info.Max = byte.MaxValue;
1794 info.samplesPerPixel = samples;
1795 range = new IntRange[info.SamplesPerPixel];
1796 for (int i = 0; i < range.Length; i++)
1797 {
1798 range[i] = new IntRange(0, info.Max);
1799 }
1800 info.min = 0;
1801 info.bitsPerPixel = bitsPerPixel;
1802 info.Name = ind.ToString();
1803 contrastMethod = ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod.BRIGHTFIELD;
1804 illuminationType = ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType.TRANSMITTED;
1805 info.Fluor = "None";
1806 info.LightSource = "Unknown";
1807 info.diodeName = "LED";
1808 info.lightSourceAttenuation = "1.0";
1809 info.LightSource = null;
1810 Index = ind;
1811 }
1812 public Channel Copy()
1813 {
1814 Channel c = new Channel(info.index, info.bitsPerPixel, SamplesPerPixel);
1815 c.Name = Name;
1816 c.info.ID = info.ID;
1817 c.range = range;
1818 c.info.color = info.color;
1819 c.Fluor = Fluor;
1820 c.SamplesPerPixel = SamplesPerPixel;
1821 c.Emission = Emission;
1822 c.Excitation = Excitation;
1823 c.Exposure = Exposure;
1824 c.LightSource = LightSource;
1825 c.LightSourceIntensity = LightSourceIntensity;
1826 c.LightSourceWavelength = LightSourceWavelength;
1827 c.contrastMethod = contrastMethod;
1828 c.illuminationType = illuminationType;
1829 c.DiodeName = DiodeName;
1830 c.LightSourceAttenuation = LightSourceAttenuation;
1831 return c;
1832 }
1833 public override string ToString()
1834 {
1835 if (Name == "")
1836 return index.ToString();
1837 else
1838 return index + ", " + Name;
1839 }
1840 public void Dispose()
1841 {
1842 if (stats != null)
1843 {
1844 for (int i = 0; i < stats.Length; i++)
1845 {
1846 if (stats[i] != null)
1847 stats[i].Dispose();
1848 }
1849 }
1850 }
1851 }
1852 public class Plane
1853 {
1854 private double exposure;
1855 private ZCT coordinate;
1856 private double delta;
1857 private Point3D location;
1858 public double Exposure
1859 {
1860 get { return exposure; }
1861 set { exposure = value; }
1862 }
1863 public ZCT Coordinate
1864 {
1865 get { return coordinate; }
1866 set { coordinate = value; }
1867 }
1868 public double Delta
1869 {
1870 get { return delta; }
1871 set { delta = value; }
1872 }
1873 public Point3D Location
1874 {
1875 get { return location; }
1876 set { location = value; }
1877 }
1878 }
1879 public class BufferInfo : IDisposable
1880 {
1881 public ushort GetValueRGB(int x, int y, int RGBChannel)
1882 {
1883 if (bytes == null)
1884 return 0;
1885 if (x >= SizeX || x < 0)
1886 x = 0;
1887 if (y >= SizeY || y < 0)
1888 y = 0;
1889 int stridex = SizeX;
1890 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
1891 {
1892 int index2 = ((y * stridex + x) * 2 * RGBChannelsCount) + (RGBChannel * 2);
1893 return BitConverter.ToUInt16(bytes, index2);
1894 }
1895 else
1896 {
1897 int stride = SizeX;
1898 int index = ((y * stridex + x) * RGBChannelsCount) + RGBChannel;
1899 return bytes[index];
1900 }
1901 }
1902 public ColorS GetPixel(int ix, int iy)
1903 {
1904 if (isRGB)
1905 return new ColorS(GetValueRGB(ix, iy, 0), GetValueRGB(ix, iy, 1), GetValueRGB(ix, iy, 2));
1906 else
1907 {
1908 ushort s = GetValueRGB(ix, iy, 0);
1909 return new ColorS(s, s, s);
1910 }
1911 }
1912 public void SetPixel(int ix, int iy, ColorS col)
1913 {
1914 if (isRGB)
1915 {
1916 SetColorRGB(ix, iy, col);
1917 }
1918 else
1919 SetValue(ix, iy, col.R);
1920 }
1926 public void SetValue(int x, int y, ushort value)
1927 {
1928 int stridex = SizeX;
1929 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
1930 {
1931 int index2 = ((y * stridex + x) * 2 * RGBChannelsCount);
1932 byte upper = (byte)(value >> 8);
1933 byte lower = (byte)(value & 0xff);
1934 bytes[index2] = upper;
1935 bytes[index2 + 1] = lower;
1936 }
1937 else
1938 {
1939 int index = (y * stridex + x) * RGBChannelsCount;
1940 bytes[index] = (byte)value;
1941 }
1942 }
1950 public void SetValueRGB(int ix, int iy, int RGBChannel, ushort value)
1951 {
1952 int x = ix;
1953 int y = iy;
1954 //We invert the RGB channel parameter since pixels are in BGR order.
1955 if (RGBChannel == 2)
1956 RGBChannel = 0;
1957 else
1958 if (RGBChannel == 0)
1959 RGBChannel = 2;
1960 int stridex = SizeX;
1961 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
1962 {
1963 int index2 = ((y * stridex + x) * 2 * RGBChannelsCount) + (RGBChannel * 2);
1964 byte upper = (byte)(value >> 8);
1965 byte lower = (byte)(value & 0xff);
1966 bytes[index2] = upper;
1967 bytes[index2 + 1] = lower;
1968 }
1969 else
1970 {
1971 int index = ((y * stridex + x) * RGBChannelsCount) + RGBChannel;
1972 bytes[index] = (byte)value;
1973 }
1974 }
1980 public void SetColorRGB(int ix, int iy, ColorS value)
1981 {
1982 int x = ix;
1983 int y = iy;
1984 int stridex = SizeX;
1985 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
1986 {
1987 int index2 = ((y * stridex + x) * 6);
1988 bytes[index2] = value.bytes[5];
1989 bytes[index2 + 1] = value.bytes[4];
1990 bytes[index2 + 2] = value.bytes[3];
1991 bytes[index2 + 3] = value.bytes[2];
1992 bytes[index2 + 4] = value.bytes[1];
1993 bytes[index2 + 5] = value.bytes[0];
1994 }
1995 else
1996 {
1997 int index2 = ((y * stridex + x) * RGBChannelsCount);
1998 bytes[index2 + 2] = (byte)value.R;
1999 bytes[index2 + 1] = (byte)value.G;
2000 bytes[index2] = (byte)value.B;
2001 }
2002 }
2010 public static string CreateID(string filepath, int index)
2011 {
2012 if (filepath == null)
2013 return "";
2014 const char sep = '/';
2015 filepath = filepath.Replace("\\", "/");
2016 string s = filepath + sep + 'i' + sep + index;
2017 return s;
2018 }
2019 public string ID;
2020 public string File
2021 {
2022 get { return file; }
2023 set { file = value; }
2024 }
2025 public int HashID
2026 {
2027 get
2028 {
2029 return ID.GetHashCode();
2030 }
2031 }
2032 public int SizeX, SizeY;
2033 public int Stride
2034 {
2035 get
2036 {
2037 int s = 0;
2038 if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2039 s = SizeX;
2040 else
2041 if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2042 s = SizeX * 2;
2043 else
2044 if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2045 s = SizeX * 3;
2046 else
2047 if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb || pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
2048 s = SizeX * 4;
2049 else
2050 s = SizeX * 3 * 2;
2051 return s;
2052 }
2053 }
2054 public int PaddedStride
2055 {
2056 get
2057 {
2058 return GetStridePadded(Stride);
2059 }
2060 }
2061 public byte[] PaddedBuffer
2062 {
2063 get
2064 {
2065 return GetPaddedBuffer(Bytes, SizeX, SizeY, Stride, PixelFormat);
2066 }
2067 }
2068 public bool LittleEndian
2069 {
2070 get
2071 {
2072 return littleEndian;
2073 }
2074 set
2075 {
2076 littleEndian = value;
2077 }
2078 }
2079 public long Length
2080 {
2081 get
2082 {
2083 return bytes.Length;
2084 }
2085 }
2086 public int RGBChannelsCount
2087 {
2088 get
2089 {
2090 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2091 return 3;
2092 else
2093 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2094 return 1;
2095 else
2096 return 4;
2097 }
2098 }
2099 public int BitsPerPixel
2100 {
2101 get
2102 {
2103 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2104 {
2105 return 16;
2106 }
2107 else
2108 return 8;
2109 }
2110 }
2111 public ZCT Coordinate;
2112 public PixelFormat PixelFormat
2113 {
2114 get
2115 {
2116 return pixelFormat;
2117 }
2118 set
2119 {
2120 pixelFormat = value;
2121 }
2122 }
2123 public byte[] Bytes
2124 {
2125 get { return bytes; }
2126 set
2127 {
2128 bytes = value;
2129 }
2130 }
2131 public byte[] PaddedBytes
2132 {
2133 get
2134 {
2135 return GetPaddedBuffer(bytes, SizeX, SizeY, Stride, PixelFormat);
2136 }
2137 }
2138 /* Converting a byte array to an image. */
2139 public Image Image
2140 {
2141 get
2142 {
2143 return GetBitmap(SizeX, SizeY, Stride, PixelFormat, Bytes);
2144 }
2145 set
2146 {
2147 Bitmap bitmap;
2148 bitmap = (Bitmap)value;
2149 if (!LittleEndian)
2150 bitmap.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
2151 PixelFormat = value.PixelFormat;
2152 SizeX = value.Width;
2153 SizeY = value.Height;
2154 bytes = GetBuffer(bitmap, Stride);
2155 if (LittleEndian)
2156 Array.Reverse(bytes);
2157 bitmap.Dispose();
2158 bitmap = null;
2159 GC.Collect();
2160 }
2161 }
2162 /* Converting a bitmap to a byte array. */
2163 public Image ImageRGB
2164 {
2165 get
2166 {
2167 return GetBitmapRGB(SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, Bytes);
2168 }
2169 set
2170 {
2171 Bitmap bitmap;
2172 bitmap = (Bitmap)value;
2173 if (!LittleEndian)
2174 bitmap.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
2175 PixelFormat = value.PixelFormat;
2176 SizeX = value.Width;
2177 SizeY = value.Height;
2178 bytes = GetBuffer(bitmap, Stride);
2179 if (LittleEndian)
2180 Array.Reverse(bytes);
2181 bitmap.Dispose();
2182 bitmap = null;
2183 GC.Collect();
2184 }
2185 }
2186 public IntPtr RGBData
2187 {
2188 get
2189 {
2190 return GetRGBData(SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, bytes);
2191 }
2192 }
2193 public Plane Plane
2194 {
2195 get { return plane; }
2196 set { plane = value; }
2197 }
2198 public int PixelFormatSize
2199 {
2200 get
2201 {
2202 if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2203 return 1;
2204 else if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2205 return 2;
2206 else if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2207 return 3;
2208 else if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb || pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
2209 return 4;
2210 else if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2211 return 6;
2212 throw new InvalidDataException("Bio only supports 8, 16, 24, 32, and 48 bit images.");
2213 }
2214 }
2215 private PixelFormat pixelFormat;
2216 public Statistics[] Stats
2217 {
2218 get { return stats; }
2219 set { stats = value; }
2220 }
2221 Statistics[] stats;
2222 byte[] bytes;
2223 string file;
2224 bool littleEndian = BitConverter.IsLittleEndian;
2225 Plane plane = null;
2231 public void SetImage(Bitmap bitmap, bool switchRGB)
2232 {
2233 if (switchRGB)
2234 bitmap = BufferInfo.SwitchRedBlue(bitmap);
2235 bitmap.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
2236 PixelFormat = bitmap.PixelFormat;
2237 SizeX = bitmap.Width;
2238 SizeY = bitmap.Height;
2239 bytes = GetBuffer((Bitmap)bitmap, Stride);
2240 }
2248 private static int GetStridePadded(int stride)
2249 {
2250 if (stride % 4 == 0)
2251 return stride;
2252 int newstride = stride + 2;
2253 if (stride % 3 == 0 && stride % 2 != 0)
2254 {
2255 newstride = stride + 1;
2256 if (newstride % 4 != 0)
2257 newstride = stride + 3;
2258 }
2259 if (newstride % 4 != 0)
2260 return stride + 5;
2261 return newstride;
2262 }
2273 private static byte[] GetPaddedBuffer(byte[] bts, int w, int h, int stride, PixelFormat px)
2274 {
2275 if (stride == 0)
2276 return null;
2277 int newstride = GetStridePadded(stride);
2278 if (newstride == stride)
2279 return bts;
2280 byte[] newbts = new byte[newstride * h];
2281 if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || px == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb || px == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb || px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2282 {
2283 for (int y = 0; y < h; ++y)
2284 {
2285 for (int x = 0; x < w; ++x)
2286 {
2287 int index = (y * stride) + x;
2288 int index2 = (y * newstride) + x;
2289 newbts[index2] = bts[index];
2290 }
2291 }
2292 }
2293 else
2294 {
2295 for (int y = 0; y < h; ++y)
2296 {
2297 for (int x = 0; x < w * 2; ++x)
2298 {
2299 int index = (y * stride) + x;
2300 int index2 = (y * newstride) + x;
2301 newbts[index2] = bts[index];
2302 }
2303 }
2304 }
2305 return newbts;
2306 }
2320 public static BufferInfo[] RGB48To16(string file, int w, int h, int stride, byte[] bts, ZCT coord, int index, Plane plane)
2321 {
2322 BufferInfo[] bfs = new BufferInfo[3];
2323 Bitmap bmpr = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale);
2324 Bitmap bmpg = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale);
2325 Bitmap bmpb = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale);
2326
2327 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
2328 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
2329 BitmapData bmdr = bmpr.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmpr.PixelFormat);
2330 BitmapData bmdg = bmpg.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmpg.PixelFormat);
2331 BitmapData bmdb = bmpb.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmpb.PixelFormat);
2332 unsafe
2333 {
2334 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2335 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2336 {
2337 //getting the pixels of current row
2338 byte* rowr = (byte*)bmdr.Scan0 + (y * bmdr.Stride);
2339 byte* rowg = (byte*)bmdg.Scan0 + (y * bmdg.Stride);
2340 byte* rowb = (byte*)bmdb.Scan0 + (y * bmdb.Stride);
2341 int rowRGB = y * stride;
2342 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2343 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2344 {
2345 int indexRGB = x * 6;
2346 int index16 = x * 2;
2347 //R
2348 rowr[index16 + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];
2349 rowr[index16] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];
2350 //G
2351 rowg[index16 + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];
2352 rowg[index16] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3];
2353 //B
2354 rowb[index16 + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 4];
2355 rowb[index16] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 5];
2356
2357 }
2358 }
2359 }
2360 bmpr.UnlockBits(bmdr);
2361 bmpg.UnlockBits(bmdg);
2362 bmpb.UnlockBits(bmdb);
2363 bfs[0] = new BufferInfo(file, bmpr, new ZCT(coord.Z, 0, coord.T), index, plane);
2364 bfs[0].RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
2365 bfs[1] = new BufferInfo(file, bmpg, new ZCT(coord.Z, 0, coord.T), index + 1, plane);
2366 bfs[1].RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
2367 bfs[2] = new BufferInfo(file, bmpb, new ZCT(coord.Z, 0, coord.T), index + 2, plane);
2368 bfs[2].RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
2369 return bfs;
2370 }
2377 public static BufferInfo RGB16To48(BufferInfo[] bfs)
2378 {
2379 //If this is a 2 channel image we fill the last channel with black.
2380 if (bfs[2] == null)
2381 {
2382 byte[] bt = new byte[bfs[0].SizeY * (bfs[0].SizeX * 2 * 3)];
2383 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2384 for (int y = 0; y < bfs[0].SizeY; y++)
2385 {
2386 //getting the pixels of current row
2387 int rowRGB = y * (bfs[0].SizeX * 2 * 3);
2388 int row16 = y * (bfs[0].SizeX * 2);
2389 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2390 for (int x = 0; x < bfs[0].SizeX; x++)
2391 {
2392 int indexRGB = x * 6;
2393 int index16 = x * 2;
2394 //R
2395 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB] = 0;
2396 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = 0;
2397 //G
2398 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = bfs[1].Bytes[row16 + index16];
2399 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3] = bfs[1].Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
2400 //B
2401 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 4] = bfs[0].Bytes[row16 + index16];
2402 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 5] = bfs[0].Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
2403 }
2404 }
2405 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(bfs[0].ID, bfs[0].SizeX, bfs[0].SizeY, PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb, bt, bfs[0].Coordinate, 0, bfs[0].Plane);
2406 return bf;
2407 }
2408 else
2409 {
2410 byte[] bt = new byte[bfs[0].SizeY * (bfs[0].SizeX * 2 * 3)];
2411 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2412 for (int y = 0; y < bfs[0].SizeY; y++)
2413 {
2414 //getting the pixels of current row
2415 int rowRGB = y * (bfs[0].SizeX * 2 * 3);
2416 int row16 = y * (bfs[0].SizeX * 2);
2417 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2418 for (int x = 0; x < bfs[0].SizeX; x++)
2419 {
2420 int indexRGB = x * 6;
2421 int index16 = x * 2;
2422 //R
2423 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB] = bfs[2].Bytes[row16 + index16];
2424 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = bfs[2].Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
2425 //G
2426 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = bfs[1].Bytes[row16 + index16];
2427 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3] = bfs[1].Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
2428 //B
2429 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 4] = bfs[0].Bytes[row16 + index16];
2430 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 5] = bfs[0].Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
2431 }
2432 }
2433 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(bfs[0].ID, bfs[0].SizeX, bfs[0].SizeY, PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb, bt, bfs[0].Coordinate, 0, bfs[0].Plane);
2434 return bf;
2435 }
2436 }
2443 public static BufferInfo RGB16To48(BufferInfo bfs)
2444 {
2445 byte[] bt = new byte[bfs.SizeY * (bfs.SizeX * 2 * 3)];
2446 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2447 for (int y = 0; y < bfs.SizeY; y++)
2448 {
2449 //getting the pixels of current row
2450 int rowRGB = y * (bfs.SizeX * 2 * 3);
2451 int row16 = y * (bfs.SizeX * 2);
2452 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2453 for (int x = 0; x < bfs.SizeX; x++)
2454 {
2455 int indexRGB = x * 6;
2456 int index16 = x * 2;
2457 //R
2458 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB] = bfs.Bytes[row16 + index16];
2459 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = bfs.Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
2460 //G
2461 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = bfs.Bytes[row16 + index16];
2462 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3] = bfs.Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
2463 //B
2464 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 4] = bfs.Bytes[row16 + index16];
2465 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 5] = bfs.Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
2466 }
2467 }
2468 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(bfs.ID, bfs.SizeX, bfs.SizeY, PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb, bt, bfs.Coordinate, 0, bfs.Plane);
2469 return bf;
2470 }
2482 public static Bitmap GetRGBBitmap(BufferInfo[] bfs, IntRange rr, IntRange rg, IntRange rb)
2483 {
2484 int stride;
2485 if (bfs[0].BitsPerPixel > 8)
2486 stride = bfs[0].SizeX * 6;
2487 else
2488 stride = bfs[0].SizeX * 3;
2489 int w = bfs[0].SizeX;
2490 int h = bfs[0].SizeY;
2491 byte[] bt = new byte[h * w * 3];
2492 if (bfs[0].BitsPerPixel == 8)
2493 {
2494 BufferInfo bf = BufferInfo.RGB8To24(bfs);
2495 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2496 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2497 {
2498 int rowRGB = y * stride;
2499 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2500 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2501 {
2502 int indexRGB = x * 3;
2503 int indexRGBA = x * 3;
2504 float ri = ((float)bf.Bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB] - rr.Min);
2505 if (ri < 0)
2506 ri = 0;
2507 ri = ri / rr.Max;
2508 float gi = ((float)bf.Bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] - rg.Min);
2509 if (gi < 0)
2510 gi = 0;
2511 gi = gi / rg.Max;
2512 float bi = ((float)bf.Bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] - rb.Min);
2513 if (bi < 0)
2514 bi = 0;
2515 bi = bi / rb.Max;
2516 bt[rowRGB + indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(ri * 255);//byte R
2517 bt[rowRGB + indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(gi * 255);//byte G
2518 bt[rowRGB + indexRGBA] = (byte)(bi * 255);//byte B
2519 }
2520 }
2521 bf.Dispose();
2522 }
2523 else
2524 {
2525 BufferInfo bf = BufferInfo.RGB16To48(bfs);
2526 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2527 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2528 {
2529 //getting the pixels of current row
2530 int rowRGB = y * w * 6;
2531 int row = y * w * 3;
2532 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2533 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2534 {
2535 int indexRGB = x * 6;
2536 int indexRGBA = x * 3;
2537 float ri = ((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bf.Bytes, rowRGB + indexRGB) - rr.Min);
2538 if (ri < 0)
2539 ri = 0;
2540 ri = ri / rr.Max;
2541 float gi = ((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bf.Bytes, rowRGB + indexRGB + 2) - rg.Min);
2542 if (gi < 0)
2543 gi = 0;
2544 gi = gi / rg.Max;
2545 float bi = ((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bf.Bytes, rowRGB + indexRGB + 4) - rb.Min);
2546 if (bi < 0)
2547 bi = 0;
2548 bi = bi / rb.Max;
2549 bt[row + indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(ri * 255);//byte R
2550 bt[row + indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(gi * 255);//byte G
2551 bt[row + indexRGBA] = (byte)(bi * 255);//byte B
2552 }
2553 }
2554 bf.Dispose();
2555 }
2556 return GetBitmap(w, h, w * 3, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bt);
2557 }
2566 public static Bitmap GetEmissionBitmap(BufferInfo bfs, IntRange rr, System.Drawing.Color col)
2567 {
2568 int stride;
2569 if (bfs.BitsPerPixel > 8)
2570 stride = bfs.SizeX * 3 * 2;
2571 else
2572 stride = bfs.SizeX * 3;
2573 float r = (col.R / 255f);
2574 float g = (col.G / 255f);
2575 float b = (col.B / 255f);
2576
2577 int w = bfs.SizeX;
2578 int h = bfs.SizeY;
2579 byte[] bts = new byte[h * stride];
2580
2581 if (bfs.BitsPerPixel > 8)
2582 {
2583 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2584 {
2585 //getting the pixels of current row
2586 int rowRGB = y * (w * 2 * 3);
2587 int row16 = y * (w * 2);
2588 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2589 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2590 {
2591 int indexRGB = x * 6;
2592 int index16 = x * 2;
2593
2594 float rf = (BitConverter.ToUInt16(bfs.Bytes, row16 + index16) / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * r;
2595 float gf = (BitConverter.ToUInt16(bfs.Bytes, row16 + index16) / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * g;
2596 float bf = (BitConverter.ToUInt16(bfs.Bytes, row16 + index16) / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * b;
2597 ushort rs = (ushort)(rf * ushort.MaxValue);
2598 ushort gs = (ushort)(gf * ushort.MaxValue);
2599 ushort bs = (ushort)(bf * ushort.MaxValue);
2600 byte[] rbb = BitConverter.GetBytes(rs);
2601 byte[] gbb = BitConverter.GetBytes(gs);
2602 byte[] bbb = BitConverter.GetBytes(bs);
2603 //R
2604 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB] = rbb[0];
2605 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = rbb[1];
2606 //G
2607 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = gbb[0];
2608 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3] = gbb[1];
2609 //B
2610 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 4] = bbb[0];
2611 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 5] = bbb[1];
2612 }
2613 }
2614 }
2615 else
2616 {
2617 for (int y = 0; y < bfs.SizeY; y++)
2618 {
2619 //getting the pixels of current row
2620 int rowRGB = y * (bfs.SizeX * 3);
2621 int row8 = y * (bfs.SizeX);
2622 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2623 for (int x = 0; x < bfs.SizeX; x++)
2624 {
2625 int indexRGB = x * 3;
2626 int index8 = x;
2627
2628 float rf = (bfs.Bytes[row8 + index8] / 255f) * r;
2629 float gf = (bfs.Bytes[row8 + index8] / 255f) * g;
2630 float bf = (bfs.Bytes[row8 + index8] / 255f) * b;
2631 byte rs = (byte)(rf * byte.MaxValue);
2632 byte gs = (byte)(gf * byte.MaxValue);
2633 byte bs = (byte)(bf * byte.MaxValue);
2634 //R
2635 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB] = rs;
2636 //G
2637 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = gs;
2638 //B
2639 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = bs;
2640 }
2641 }
2642 }
2643 byte[] bt = new byte[h * (w * 3)];
2644 if (bfs.BitsPerPixel == 8)
2645 {
2646 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2647 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2648 {
2649 int row = y * stride;
2650 int rowRGB = y * w * 3;
2651 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2652 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2653 {
2654 int indexRGB = x * 3;
2655 int indexRGBA = x * 3;
2656 float ri = ((float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB] - rr.Min);
2657 if (ri < 0)
2658 ri = 0;
2659 ri = ri / rr.Max;
2660 float gi = ((float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] - rr.Min);
2661 if (gi < 0)
2662 gi = 0;
2663 gi = gi / rr.Max;
2664 float bi = ((float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] - rr.Min);
2665 if (bi < 0)
2666 bi = 0;
2667 bi = bi / rr.Max;
2668 bt[rowRGB + indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(ri * 255);//byte R
2669 bt[rowRGB + indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(gi * 255);//byte G
2670 bt[rowRGB + indexRGBA] = (byte)(bi * 255);//byte B
2671 }
2672 }
2673 }
2674 else
2675 {
2676 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2677 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2678 {
2679 //getting the pixels of current row
2680 int rowRGB = y * w * 3 * 2;
2681 int row = y * w * 3;
2682 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2683 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2684 {
2685 int indexRGB = x * 6;
2686 int indexRGBA = x * 3;
2687 float ri = ((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) - rr.Min);
2688 if (ri < 0)
2689 ri = 0;
2690 ri = ri / rr.Max;
2691 float gi = ((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 2) - rr.Min);
2692 if (gi < 0)
2693 gi = 0;
2694 gi = gi / rr.Max;
2695 float bi = ((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 4) - rr.Min);
2696 if (bi < 0)
2697 bi = 0;
2698 bi = bi / rr.Max;
2699 bt[row + indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(ri * 255);//byte R
2700 bt[row + indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(gi * 255);//byte G
2701 bt[row + indexRGBA] = (byte)(bi * 255);//byte B
2702 }
2703 }
2704 }
2705 bts = null;
2706 Bitmap bmp;
2707 if (bfs.BitsPerPixel > 8)
2708 return GetBitmap(w, h, w * 3, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bt);
2709 else
2710 return GetBitmap(w, h, w * 3 * 2, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bt);
2711 }
2720 public static Bitmap GetEmissionBitmap(BufferInfo[] bfs, Channel[] chans)
2721 {
2722 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(bfs[0].SizeX, bfs[0].SizeY, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);
2723 Merge m = new Merge(bm);
2724 for (int i = 0; i < chans.Length; i++)
2725 {
2726 m.OverlayImage = bm;
2727 Bitmap b = GetEmissionBitmap(bfs[i], chans[i].range[0], chans[i].EmissionColor);
2728 bm = m.Apply(b);
2729 }
2730 return bm;
2731 }
2738 public static BufferInfo RGB8To24(BufferInfo[] bfs)
2739 {
2740 //If this is a 2 channel image we fill the last channel with black.
2741 if (bfs[2] == null)
2742 {
2743 byte[] bt = new byte[bfs[0].SizeY * (bfs[0].SizeX * 3)];
2744 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2745 for (int y = 0; y < bfs[0].SizeY; y++)
2746 {
2747 //getting the pixels of current row
2748 int rowRGB = y * (bfs[0].SizeX * 3);
2749 int row8 = y * (bfs[0].SizeX);
2750 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2751 for (int x = 0; x < bfs[0].SizeX; x++)
2752 {
2753 int indexRGB = x * 3;
2754 int index8 = x;
2755 //R
2756 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB] = 0;
2757 //G
2758 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = bfs[1].Bytes[row8 + index8];
2759 //B
2760 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = bfs[0].Bytes[row8 + index8];
2761 }
2762 }
2763 return new BufferInfo(bfs[0].ID, bfs[0].SizeX, bfs[0].SizeY, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bt, bfs[0].Coordinate, 0);
2764 }
2765 else
2766 {
2767 byte[] bt = new byte[bfs[0].SizeY * (bfs[0].SizeX * 3)];
2768 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2769 for (int y = 0; y < bfs[0].SizeY; y++)
2770 {
2771 //getting the pixels of current row
2772 int rowRGB = y * (bfs[0].SizeX * 3);
2773 int row8 = y * (bfs[0].SizeX);
2774 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2775 for (int x = 0; x < bfs[0].SizeX; x++)
2776 {
2777 int indexRGB = x * 3;
2778 int index8 = x;
2779 //R
2780 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB] = bfs[2].Bytes[row8 + index8];
2781 //G
2782 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = bfs[1].Bytes[row8 + index8];
2783 //B
2784 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = bfs[0].Bytes[row8 + index8];
2785 }
2786 }
2787 return new BufferInfo(bfs[0].ID, bfs[0].SizeX, bfs[0].SizeY, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bt, bfs[0].Coordinate, 0);
2788 }
2789 }
2795 public static BufferInfo RGB8To24(BufferInfo bfs)
2796 {
2797 byte[] bt = new byte[bfs.SizeY * (bfs.SizeX * 3)];
2798 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2799 for (int y = 0; y < bfs.SizeY; y++)
2800 {
2801 //getting the pixels of current row
2802 int rowRGB = y * (bfs.SizeX * 3);
2803 int row8 = y * (bfs.SizeX);
2804 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2805 for (int x = 0; x < bfs.SizeX; x++)
2806 {
2807 int indexRGB = x * 3;
2808 int index8 = x;
2809 //R
2810 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB] = bfs.Bytes[row8 + index8];
2811 //G
2812 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = bfs.Bytes[row8 + index8];
2813 //B
2814 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = bfs.Bytes[row8 + index8];
2815 }
2816 }
2817 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(bfs.ID, bfs.SizeX, bfs.SizeY, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bt, bfs.Coordinate, 0);
2818 return bf;
2819 }
2825 public static Bitmap[] RGB24To8(Bitmap info)
2826 {
2827 Bitmap[] bfs = new Bitmap[3];
2828 ExtractChannel cr = new ExtractChannel((short)0);
2829 ExtractChannel cg = new ExtractChannel((short)1);
2830 ExtractChannel cb = new ExtractChannel((short)2);
2831 bfs[0] = cr.Apply(info);
2832 bfs[1] = cg.Apply(info);
2833 bfs[2] = cb.Apply(info);
2834 cr = null;
2835 cg = null;
2836 cb = null;
2837 return bfs;
2838 }
2849 public static unsafe Bitmap GetBitmap(int w, int h, int stride, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts)
2850 {
2851 fixed (byte* numPtr1 = bts)
2852 {
2853 if (stride % 4 == 0)
2854 {
2855 return new Bitmap(w, h, stride, px, new IntPtr((void*)numPtr1));
2856 }
2857 int newstride = GetStridePadded(stride);
2858 byte[] newbts = GetPaddedBuffer(bts, w, h, stride, px);
2859 fixed (byte* numPtr2 = newbts)
2860 {
2861 return new Bitmap(w, h, newstride, px, new IntPtr((void*)numPtr2));
2862 }
2863 }
2864 }
2873 public static unsafe Bitmap GetBitmapRGB(int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts)
2874 {
2875 if (px == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
2876 {
2877 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
2878 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
2879 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
2880 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
2881 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
2882 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2883 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2884 {
2885 //getting the pixels of current row
2886 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
2887 int rowRGB = y * w * 4;
2888 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2889 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2890 {
2891 int indexRGB = x * 4;
2892 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
2893 row[indexRGBA + 3] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3];//byte A
2894 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
2895 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
2896 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
2897 }
2898 }
2899 //unlocking bits and disposing image
2900 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
2901 return bmp;
2902 }
2903 else if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2904 {
2905 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
2906 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
2907 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
2908 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
2909 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
2910 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2911 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2912 {
2913 //getting the pixels of current row
2914 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
2915 int rowRGB = y * w * 3;
2916 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2917 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2918 {
2919 int indexRGB = x * 3;
2920 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
2921 row[indexRGBA + 3] = byte.MaxValue;//byte A
2922 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
2923 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
2924 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
2925 }
2926 }
2927 //unlocking bits and disposing image
2928 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
2929 return bmp;
2930 }
2931 else
2932 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2933 {
2934 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
2935 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
2936 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
2937 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
2938 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
2939 unsafe
2940 {
2941 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2942 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2943 {
2944 //getting the pixels of current row
2945 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
2946 int rowRGB = y * w * 6;
2947 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2948 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2949 {
2950 int indexRGB = x * 6;
2951 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
2952 int b = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
2953 int g = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 2) / 255);
2954 int r = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 4) / 255);
2955 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
2956 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
2957 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(g);//byte G
2958 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(r);//byte B
2959 }
2960 }
2961 }
2962 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
2963 return bmp;
2964 }
2965 else
2966 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2967 {
2968 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
2969 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
2970 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
2971 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
2972 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
2973 unsafe
2974 {
2975 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2976 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2977 {
2978 //getting the pixels of current row
2979 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
2980 int rowRGB = y * w;
2981 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2982 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2983 {
2984 int indexRGB = x;
2985 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
2986 byte b = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];
2987 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
2988 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
2989 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
2990 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
2991 }
2992 }
2993 }
2994 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
2995 return bmp;
2996 }
2997 else
2998 if (px == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2999 {
3000 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3001 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3002 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3003 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3004 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3005 unsafe
3006 {
3007 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3008 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3009 {
3010 //getting the pixels of current row
3011 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3012 int rowRGB = y * w * 2;
3013 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3014 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3015 {
3016 int indexRGB = x * 2;
3017 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3018 ushort b = (ushort)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
3019 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
3020 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
3021 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
3022 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
3023 }
3024 }
3025 }
3026 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3027 return bmp;
3028 }
3029
3030 throw new NotSupportedException("Pixelformat " + px + " is not supported.");
3031 }
3040 public static unsafe IntPtr GetRGBData(int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts)
3041 {
3042 if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
3043 {
3044 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3045 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3046 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3047 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3048 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3049 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3050 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3051 {
3052 //getting the pixels of current row
3053 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3054 int rowRGB = y * w * 3;
3055 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3056 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3057 {
3058 int indexRGB = x * 3;
3059 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3060 row[indexRGBA + 3] = byte.MaxValue;//byte A
3061 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
3062 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
3063 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
3064 }
3065 }
3066 //unlocking bits and disposing image
3067 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3068 return bmd.Scan0;
3069 }
3070 else
3071 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
3072 {
3073 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3074 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3075 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3076 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3077 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3078 unsafe
3079 {
3080 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3081 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3082 {
3083 //getting the pixels of current row
3084 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3085 int rowRGB = y * w * 6;
3086 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3087 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3088 {
3089 int indexRGB = x * 6;
3090 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3091 int b = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
3092 int g = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 2) / 255);
3093 int r = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 4) / 255);
3094 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
3095 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
3096 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(g);//byte G
3097 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(r);//byte B
3098 }
3099 }
3100 }
3101 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3102 return bmd.Scan0;
3103 }
3104 else
3105 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
3106 {
3107 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3108 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3109 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3110 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3111 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3112 unsafe
3113 {
3114 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3115 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3116 {
3117 //getting the pixels of current row
3118 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3119 int rowRGB = y * w;
3120 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3121 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3122 {
3123 int indexRGB = x;
3124 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3125 byte b = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];
3126 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
3127 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
3128 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
3129 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
3130 }
3131 }
3132 }
3133 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3134 return bmd.Scan0;
3135 }
3136 else
3137 if (px == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
3138 {
3139 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3140 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3141 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3142 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3143 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3144 unsafe
3145 {
3146 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3147 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3148 {
3149 //getting the pixels of current row
3150 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3151 int rowRGB = y * w * 2;
3152 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3153 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3154 {
3155 int indexRGB = x * 2;
3156 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3157 ushort b = (ushort)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
3158 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
3159 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
3160 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
3161 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
3162 }
3163 }
3164 }
3165 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3166 return bmd.Scan0;
3167 }
3168 throw new NotSupportedException("Pixelformat " + px + " is not supported.");
3169 }
3178 public static unsafe byte[] GetRGBBuffer(int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts)
3179 {
3180 if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
3181 {
3182 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3183 BufferInfo bmp = new BufferInfo(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3184 // The destination array will be larger due to the added alpha channel.
3185 int destLength = (bts.Length / 3) * 4; // For every 3 bytes in the source, there will be 4 bytes in the destination.
3186 byte[] dest = new byte[destLength];
3187
3188 for (int i = 0, j = 0; i < bts.Length; i += 3, j += 4)
3189 {
3190 // Copy RGB components directly.
3191 dest[j] = bts[i]; // Red
3192 dest[j + 1] = bts[i + 1]; // Green
3193 dest[j + 2] = bts[i + 2]; // Blue
3194 dest[j + 3] = 255; // Alpha (fully opaque)
3195 }
3196 return bmp.Bytes;
3197 }
3198 else
3199 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
3200 {
3201 // Initialize the destination array.
3202 int pixelCount = bts.Length / 6; // 6 bytes per pixel in source, 4 bytes per pixel in destination.
3203 byte[] dest = new byte[pixelCount * 4];
3204
3205 for (int i = 0, j = 0; i < bts.Length; i += 6, j += 4)
3206 {
3207 // Use BitConverter to convert two bytes to a single ushort, then downsample by shifting.
3208 ushort red = BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, i);
3209 ushort green = BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, i + 2);
3210 ushort blue = BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, i + 4);
3211
3212 // Downsample to 8 bits by shifting right 8 bits.
3213 // This effectively takes the higher 8 bits of each 16-bit color value.
3214 dest[j] = (byte)(red >> 8); // Red
3215 dest[j + 1] = (byte)(green >> 8); // Green
3216 dest[j + 2] = (byte)(blue >> 8); // Blue
