3217 dest[j + 3] = 255; // Alpha (fully opaque)
3218 }
3219 return dest;
3220 }
3221 else
3222 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
3223 {
3224 int pixelCount = bts.Length; // 1 byte per pixel in source, 4 bytes per pixel in destination.
3225 byte[] dest = new byte[pixelCount * 4];
3226
3227 for (int i = 0, j = 0; i < bts.Length; i++, j += 4)
3228 {
3229 byte gray = bts[i];
3230
3231 // Set RGB channels to the grayscale value and Alpha to 255 (fully opaque).
3232 dest[j] = gray; // Red
3233 dest[j + 1] = gray; // Green
3234 dest[j + 2] = gray; // Blue
3235 dest[j + 3] = 255; // Alpha
3236 }
3237
3238 return dest;
3239 }
3240 else
3241 if (px == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
3242 {
3243 int pixelCount = bts.Length / 2; // 2 bytes per pixel in source, 4 bytes per pixel in destination.
3244 byte[] dest = new byte[pixelCount * 4];
3245
3246 for (int i = 0, j = 0; i < bts.Length; i += 2, j += 4)
3247 {
3248 // Convert two bytes to a single ushort to get the 16-bit grayscale value.
3249 ushort gray = BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, i);
3250
3251 // Downsample to 8 bits by taking the higher byte.
3252 // This is a simple method and may not preserve the full dynamic range.
3253 byte gray8bit = (byte)(gray >> 8);
3254
3255 // Set RGB channels to the grayscale value and Alpha to 255 (fully opaque).
3256 dest[j] = gray8bit; // Red
3257 dest[j + 1] = gray8bit; // Green
3258 dest[j + 2] = gray8bit; // Blue
3259 dest[j + 3] = 255; // Alpha
3260 }
3261
3262 return dest;
3263 }
3264 throw new NotSupportedException("Pixelformat " + px + " is not supported.");
3265 }
3278 public static Bitmap GetFiltered(int w, int h, int stride, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts, IntRange rr, IntRange rg, IntRange rb)
3279 {
3280 if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
3281 {
3282 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);
3283 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3284 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3285 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3286 unsafe
3287 {
3288 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3289 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3290 {
3291 //getting the pixels of current row
3292 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3293 int rowRGB = y * stride;
3294 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3295 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3296 {
3297 int indexRGB = x * 3;
3298 int indexRGBA = x * 3;
3299 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
3300 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
3301 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
3302 float ri = ((float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB] - rr.Min);
3303 if (ri < 0)
3304 ri = 0;
3305 ri = ri / (float)rr.Max;
3306 float gi = ((float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] - rg.Min);
3307 if (gi < 0)
3308 gi = 0;
3309 gi = gi / (float)rg.Max;
3310 float bi = ((float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] - rb.Min);
3311 if (bi < 0)
3312 bi = 0;
3313 bi = bi / (float)rb.Max;
3314 int b = (int)(ri * 255f);
3315 int g = (int)(gi * 255f);
3316 int r = (int)(bi * 255f);
3317 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
3318 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(g);//byte G
3319 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(r);//byte B
3320 }
3321 }
3322 }
3323 //unlocking bits and disposing image
3324 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3325 return bmp;
3326 }
3327 else
3328 if (px == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
3329 {
3330 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb);
3331 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3332 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3333 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3334 unsafe
3335 {
3336 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3337 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3338 {
3339 //getting the pixels of current row
3340 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3341 int rowRGB = y * stride;
3342 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3343 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3344 {
3345 int indexRGB = x * 4;
3346 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3347 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
3348 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
3349 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
3350 float ri = ((float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB] - rr.Min);
3351 if (ri < 0)
3352 ri = 0;
3353 ri = ri / (float)rr.Max;
3354 float gi = ((float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] - rg.Min);
3355 if (gi < 0)
3356 gi = 0;
3357 gi = gi / (float)rg.Max;
3358 float bi = ((float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] - rb.Min);
3359 if (bi < 0)
3360 bi = 0;
3361 bi = bi / (float)rb.Max;
3362 int b = (int)(ri * 255f);
3363 int g = (int)(gi * 255f);
3364 int r = (int)(bi * 255f);
3365 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
3366 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(g);//byte G
3367 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(r);//byte B
3368 }
3369 }
3370 }
3371 //unlocking bits and disposing image
3372 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3373 return bmp;
3374 }
3375 else
3376 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
3377 {
3378 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3379 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3380 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3381 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3382 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3383 unsafe
3384 {
3385 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3386 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3387 {
3388 //getting the pixels of current row
3389 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3390 int rowRGB = y * stride;
3391 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3392 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3393 {
3394 int indexRGB = x * 6;
3395 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3396 float ri = ((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) - rr.Min);
3397 if (ri < 0)
3398 ri = 0;
3399 ri = ri / (float)rr.Max;
3400 float gi = ((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 2) - rg.Min);
3401 if (gi < 0)
3402 gi = 0;
3403 gi = gi / (float)rg.Max;
3404 float bi = ((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 4) - rb.Min);
3405 if (bi < 0)
3406 bi = 0;
3407 bi = bi / (float)rb.Max;
3408 int b = (int)(ri * 255f);
3409 int g = (int)(gi * 255f);
3410 int r = (int)(bi * 255f);
3411 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
3412 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
3413 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(g);//byte G
3414 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(r);//byte B
3415 }
3416 }
3417 }
3418
3419 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3420 return bmp;
3421 }
3422 else
3423 if (px == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
3424 {
3425 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3426 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3427 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3428 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3429 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3430 unsafe
3431 {
3432 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3433 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3434 {
3435 //getting the pixels of current row
3436 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3437 int rowRGB = y * stride;
3438 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3439 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3440 {
3441 int indexRGB = x * 2;
3442 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3443 float ri = (float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) - rr.Min;
3444 if (ri < 0)
3445 ri = 0;
3446 ri = ri / rr.Max;
3447 int b = (int)(ri * 255);
3448 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
3449 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
3450 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
3451 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
3452 }
3453 }
3454 }
3455 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3456 return bmp;
3457 }
3458 else
3459 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
3460 {
3461 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3462 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3463 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3464 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3465 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3466 unsafe
3467 {
3468 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3469 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3470 {
3471 //getting the pixels of current row
3472 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3473 int rowRGB = y * stride;
3474 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3475 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3476 {
3477 int indexRGB = x;
3478 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3479 float ri = (float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB] - rr.Min;
3480 if (ri < 0)
3481 ri = 0;
3482 ri = ri / rr.Max;
3483 int b = (int)(ri * 255);
3484 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
3485 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
3486 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
3487 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
3488 }
3489 }
3490 }
3491
3492 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3493 return bmp;
3494 }
3495 throw new InvalidDataException("Bio supports only 8, 16 24, 32, 48 bit images.");
3496 }
3505 public Bitmap GetFiltered(IntRange rr, IntRange rg, IntRange rb)
3506 {
3507 return BufferInfo.GetFiltered(SizeX, SizeY, Stride, PixelFormat, Bytes, rr, rg, rb);
3508 }
3512 public void Crop(Rectangle r)
3513 {
3514 //This crop function supports 16 bit images unlike Bitmap class.
3515 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
3516 {
3517 if (RGBChannelsCount == 1)
3518 {
3519 byte[] bts = null;
3520 int bytesPer = 2;
3521 int stridenew = r.Width * bytesPer;
3522 int strideold = Stride;
3523 bts = new byte[(stridenew * r.Height)];
3524 for (int y = 0; y < r.Height; y++)
3525 {
3526 for (int x = 0; x < stridenew; x += bytesPer)
3527 {
3528 int indexnew = (y * stridenew + x);
3529 int indexold = ((y + r.Y) * strideold + (x + (r.X * bytesPer)));// + r.X;
3530 bts[indexnew] = bytes[indexold];
3531 bts[indexnew + 1] = bytes[indexold + 1];
3532 }
3533 }
3534 bytes = bts;
3535 }
3536 else
3537 {
3538 byte[] bts = null;
3539 int bytesPer = 6;
3540 int stridenew = r.Width * bytesPer;
3541 int strideold = Stride;
3542 bts = new byte[(stridenew * r.Height)];
3543 for (int y = 0; y < r.Height; y++)
3544 {
3545 for (int x = 0; x < stridenew; x += bytesPer)
3546 {
3547 int indexnew = (y * stridenew + x);
3548 int indexold = ((y + r.Y) * strideold + (x + (r.X * bytesPer)));// + r.X;
3549 bts[indexnew] = bytes[indexold];
3550 bts[indexnew + 1] = bytes[indexold + 1];
3551 bts[indexnew + 2] = bytes[indexold + 2];
3552 bts[indexnew + 3] = bytes[indexold + 3];
3553 bts[indexnew + 4] = bytes[indexold + 4];
3554 bts[indexnew + 5] = bytes[indexold + 5];
3555 }
3556 }
3557 bytes = bts;
3558 }
3559 }
3560 else
3561 {
3562 Image = ((Bitmap)Image).Clone(r, PixelFormat);
3563 }
3564 SizeX = r.Width;
3565 SizeY = r.Height;
3566 }
3573 public Bitmap GetCropBitmap(Rectangle r)
3574 {
3575 //This crop function supports 16 bit images unlike Bitmap class.
3576 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
3577 {
3578 byte[] bts = null;
3579 if (RGBChannelsCount == 1)
3580 {
3581 int bytesPer = 2;
3582 int stridenew = r.Width * bytesPer;
3583 int strideold = Stride;
3584 bts = new byte[(stridenew * r.Height)];
3585 for (int y = 0; y < r.Height; y++)
3586 {
3587 for (int x = 0; x < stridenew; x += bytesPer)
3588 {
3589 int indexnew = (y * stridenew + x) * RGBChannelsCount;
3590 int indexold = (((y + r.Y) * strideold + (x + (r.X * bytesPer))) * RGBChannelsCount);// + r.X;
3591 bts[indexnew] = bytes[indexold];
3592 bts[indexnew + 1] = bytes[indexold + 1];
3593 }
3594 }
3595 return new Bitmap(r.Width, r.Height, stridenew, PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale, Marshal.UnsafeAddrOfPinnedArrayElement(bts, 0));
3596 }
3597 else
3598 {
3599 int bytesPer = 6;
3600 int stridenew = r.Width * bytesPer;
3601 int strideold = Stride;
3602 bts = new byte[(stridenew * r.Height)];
3603 for (int y = 0; y < r.Height; y++)
3604 {
3605 for (int x = 0; x < stridenew; x += bytesPer)
3606 {
3607 int indexnew = (y * stridenew + x);
3608 int indexold = ((y + r.Y) * strideold + (x + (r.X * bytesPer)));// + r.X;
3609 bts[indexnew] = bytes[indexold];
3610 bts[indexnew + 1] = bytes[indexold + 1];
3611 bts[indexnew + 2] = bytes[indexold + 2];
3612 bts[indexnew + 3] = bytes[indexold + 3];
3613 bts[indexnew + 4] = bytes[indexold + 4];
3614 bts[indexnew + 5] = bytes[indexold + 5];
3615 }
3616 }
3617 //bytes = bts;
3618 return new Bitmap(r.Width, r.Height, stridenew, PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb, Marshal.UnsafeAddrOfPinnedArrayElement(bts, 0));
3619 }
3620 }
3621 else
3622 {
3623 return ((Bitmap)Image).Clone(r, PixelFormat);
3624 }
3625
3626 }
3632 public BufferInfo GetCropBuffer(Rectangle r)
3633 {
3634 BufferInfo inf = null;
3635 //This crop function supports 16 bit images unlike Bitmap class.
3636 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
3637 {
3638 byte[] bts = null;
3639 if (RGBChannelsCount == 1)
3640 {
3641 int bytesPer = 2;
3642 int stridenew = r.Width * bytesPer;
3643 int strideold = Stride;
3644 bts = new byte[(stridenew * r.Height)];
3645 for (int y = 0; y < r.Height; y++)
3646 {
3647 for (int x = 0; x < stridenew; x += bytesPer)
3648 {
3649 int indexnew = (y * stridenew + x) * RGBChannelsCount;
3650 int indexold = (((y + r.Y) * strideold + (x + (r.X * bytesPer))) * RGBChannelsCount);// + r.X;
3651 bts[indexnew] = bytes[indexold];
3652 bts[indexnew + 1] = bytes[indexold + 1];
3653 }
3654 }
3655 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(r.Width, r.Height, PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale, bts, Coordinate, ID);
3656 return bf;
3657 }
3658 else
3659 {
3660 int bytesPer = 6;
3661 int stridenew = r.Width * bytesPer;
3662 int strideold = Stride;
3663 bts = new byte[(stridenew * r.Height)];
3664 for (int y = 0; y < r.Height; y++)
3665 {
3666 for (int x = 0; x < stridenew; x += bytesPer)
3667 {
3668 int indexnew = (y * stridenew + x);
3669 int indexold = ((y + r.Y) * strideold + (x + (r.X * bytesPer)));// + r.X;
3670 bts[indexnew] = bytes[indexold];
3671 bts[indexnew + 1] = bytes[indexold + 1];
3672 bts[indexnew + 2] = bytes[indexold + 2];
3673 bts[indexnew + 3] = bytes[indexold + 3];
3674 bts[indexnew + 4] = bytes[indexold + 4];
3675 bts[indexnew + 5] = bytes[indexold + 5];
3676 }
3677 }
3678 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(r.Width, r.Height, PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb, bts, Coordinate, ID);
3679 return bf;
3680 }
3681 }
3682 else
3683 {
3684 Bitmap bmp = ((Bitmap)Image).Clone(r, PixelFormat);
3685 return new BufferInfo(ID, bmp, Coordinate, 0);
3686 }
3687 }
3688 /* Creating a new BufferInfo object. */
3689 public BufferInfo(int w, int h, PixelFormat px)
3690 {
3691 ID = CreateID("", 0);
3692 SizeX = w;
3693 SizeY = h;
3694 pixelFormat = px;
3695 Coordinate = new ZCT();
3696 Bytes = new byte[Stride * h];
3697 }
3698 /* Creating a new BufferInfo object. */
3699 public BufferInfo(string file, int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts, ZCT coord, int index)
3700 {
3701 ID = CreateID(file, index);
3702 SizeX = w;
3703 SizeY = h;
3704 pixelFormat = px;
3705 Coordinate = coord;
3706 Bytes = bts;
3707 if (isRGB)
3708 SwitchRedBlue();
3709 }
3710 /* Creating a new BufferInfo object. */
3711 public BufferInfo(string file, int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts, ZCT coord, int index, Plane plane)
3712 {
3713 ID = CreateID(file, index);
3714 SizeX = w;
3715 SizeY = h;
3716 pixelFormat = px;
3717 Coordinate = coord;
3718 Bytes = bts;
3719 if (isRGB)
3720 SwitchRedBlue();
3721 Plane = plane;
3722 }
3723 /* Creating a new BufferInfo object. */
3724 public BufferInfo(string file, int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] byts, ZCT coord, int index, bool littleEndian = true, bool interleaved = true)
3725 {
3726 ID = CreateID(file, index);
3727 SizeX = w;
3728 SizeY = h;
3729 pixelFormat = px;
3730 Coordinate = coord;
3731 Bytes = byts;
3732 if (!interleaved)
3733 {
3734 byte[] bts = new byte[Length];
3735 int strplane = 0;
3736 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
3737 strplane = w * 2;
3738 else
3739 strplane = w;
3740 if (RGBChannelsCount == 1)
3741 {
3742 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3743 {
3744 int x = 0;
3745 int str1 = Stride * y;
3746 int str2 = strplane * y;
3747 for (int st = 0; st < strplane; st++)
3748 {
3749 bts[str1 + x] = bytes[str2 + st];
3750 x++;
3751 }
3752 }
3753 }
3754 else
3755 {
3756 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
3757 {
3758 int ind = strplane * h;
3759 int ind2 = strplane * h * 2;
3760 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3761 {
3762 int i = 0;
3763 int x = 0;
3764 int str1 = Stride * y;
3765 int str2 = strplane * y;
3766 for (int st = 0; st < strplane; st += 2)
3767 {
3768 bts[str1 + x + 0] = bytes[str2 + st];
3769 bts[str1 + x + 1] = bytes[str2 + st + 1];
3770 bts[str1 + x + 2] = bytes[ind + str2 + st];
3771 bts[str1 + x + 3] = bytes[ind + str2 + st + 1];
3772 bts[str1 + x + 4] = bytes[ind2 + str2 + st];
3773 bts[str1 + x + 5] = bytes[ind2 + str2 + st + 1];
3774 if (i == 1)
3775 {
3776 i = 0; x += 6;
3777 }
3778 i++;
3779 }
3780 }
3781 }
3782 else
3783 {
3784 int ind = strplane * h;
3785 int indb = ind * 2;
3786 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3787 {
3788 int x = 0;
3789 int str1 = Stride * y;
3790 int str2 = strplane * y;
3791 for (int st = 0; st < strplane; st++)
3792 {
3793 bts[str1 + x + 2] = bytes[str2 + st];
3794 bts[str1 + x + 1] = bytes[ind + str2 + st];
3795 bts[str1 + x] = bytes[indb + str2 + st];
3796 x += 3;
3797 }
3798 }
3799 }
3800 }
3801 bytes = bts;
3802 }
3803 if (!littleEndian)
3804 {
3805 Array.Reverse(Bytes);
3806 RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
3807 }
3808 if (isRGB)
3809 SwitchRedBlue();
3810 }
3811 /* Creating a new BufferInfo object. */
3812 public BufferInfo(string file, int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] byts, ZCT coord, int index, Plane plane, bool littleEndian = true, bool interleaved = true)
3813 {
3814 ID = CreateID(file, index);
3815 SizeX = w;
3816 SizeY = h;
3817 pixelFormat = px;
3818 Coordinate = coord;
3819 Bytes = byts;
3820 if (!interleaved)
3821 {
3822 byte[] bts = new byte[Length];
3823 int strplane = 0;
3824 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
3825 strplane = w * 2;
3826 else
3827 strplane = w;
3828 if (RGBChannelsCount == 1)
3829 {
3830 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3831 {
3832 int x = 0;
3833 int str1 = Stride * y;
3834 int str2 = strplane * y;
3835 for (int st = 0; st < strplane; st++)
3836 {
3837 bts[str1 + x] = bytes[str2 + st];
3838 x++;
3839 }
3840 }
3841 }
3842 else
3843 {
3844 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
3845 {
3846 int ind = strplane * h;
3847 int ind2 = strplane * h * 2;
3848 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3849 {
3850 int i = 0;
3851 int x = 0;
3852 int str1 = Stride * y;
3853 int str2 = strplane * y;
3854 for (int st = 0; st < strplane; st += 2)
3855 {
3856 bts[str1 + x + 0] = bytes[str2 + st];
3857 bts[str1 + x + 1] = bytes[str2 + st + 1];
3858 bts[str1 + x + 2] = bytes[ind + str2 + st];
3859 bts[str1 + x + 3] = bytes[ind + str2 + st + 1];
3860 bts[str1 + x + 4] = bytes[ind2 + str2 + st];
3861 bts[str1 + x + 5] = bytes[ind2 + str2 + st + 1];
3862 if (i == 1)
3863 {
3864 i = 0; x += 6;
3865 }
3866 i++;
3867 }
3868 }
3869 }
3870 else
3871 {
3872 int ind = strplane * h;
3873 int indb = ind * 2;
3874 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3875 {
3876 int x = 0;
3877 int str1 = Stride * y;
3878 int str2 = strplane * y;
3879 for (int st = 0; st < strplane; st++)
3880 {
3881 bts[str1 + x + 2] = bytes[str2 + st];
3882 bts[str1 + x + 1] = bytes[ind + str2 + st];
3883 bts[str1 + x] = bytes[indb + str2 + st];
3884 x += 3;
3885 }
3886 }
3887 }
3888 }
3889 bytes = bts;
3890 }
3891 if (!littleEndian)
3892 {
3893 Array.Reverse(Bytes);
3894 RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
3895 }
3896 if (isRGB)
3897 SwitchRedBlue();
3898 Plane = plane;
3899 }
3900 public BufferInfo(string file, Image im, ZCT coord, int index)
3901 {
3902 ID = CreateID(file, index);
3903 SizeX = im.Width;
3904 SizeY = im.Height;
3905 pixelFormat = im.PixelFormat;
3906 Coordinate = coord;
3907 if (isRGB)
3908 SwitchRedBlue();
3909 Image = im;
3910 }
3911 public BufferInfo(string file, Image im, ZCT coord, int index, Plane pl)
3912 {
3913 ID = CreateID(file, index);
3914 SizeX = im.Width;
3915 SizeY = im.Height;
3916 pixelFormat = im.PixelFormat;
3917 Coordinate = coord;
3918 if (isRGB)
3919 SwitchRedBlue();
3920 Image = im;
3921 Plane = pl;
3922 }
3923 public BufferInfo(int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts, ZCT coord, string id)
3924 {
3925 ID = id;
3926 SizeX = w;
3927 SizeY = h;
3928 pixelFormat = px;
3929 Coordinate = coord;
3930 if (isRGB)
3931 SwitchRedBlue();
3932 Bytes = bts;
3933 }
3940 public static Bitmap SwitchRedBlue(Bitmap image)
3941 {
3942 ExtractChannel cr = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.R);
3943 ExtractChannel cb = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.B);
3944 // apply the filter
3945 Bitmap rImage = cr.Apply(image);
3946 Bitmap bImage = cb.Apply(image);
3947
3948 ReplaceChannel replaceRFilter = new ReplaceChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.R, bImage);
3949 replaceRFilter.ApplyInPlace(image);
3950
3951 ReplaceChannel replaceBFilter = new ReplaceChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.B, rImage);
3952 replaceBFilter.ApplyInPlace(image);
3953 rImage.Dispose();
3954 bImage.Dispose();
3955 return image;
3956 }
3960 public void SwitchRedBlue()
3961 {
3962 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale || Bytes == null)
3963 return;
3964 //BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(SizeX, SizeY,PixelFormat, bytes, Coordinate, ID);
3965 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
3966 for (int y = 0; y < SizeY; y++)
3967 {
3968 for (int x = 0; x < Stride; x += 3)
3969 {
3970 int i = y * Stride + x;
3971 byte bb = bytes[i + 2];
3972 bytes[i + 2] = bytes[i];
3973 bytes[i] = bb;
3974 }
3975 }
3976 else
3977 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb)
3978 for (int y = 0; y < SizeY; y++)
3979 {
3980 for (int x = 0; x < Stride; x += 4)
3981 {
3982 int i = y * Stride + x;
3983 byte bb = bytes[i + 2];
3984 bytes[i + 2] = bytes[i];
3985 bytes[i] = bb;
3986 }
3987 }
3988 else
3989 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
3990 {
3991 for (int y = 0; y < SizeY; y++)
3992 {
3993 //getting the pixels of current row
3994 int rowRGB = y * (Stride);
3995 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3996 for (int x = 0; x < Stride; x += 6)
3997 {
3998 int indexRGB = x;
3999 byte b1 = bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB];
4000 byte b2 = bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];
4001 //B
4002 bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB] = bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB + 4];
4003 bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB + 5];
4004 //R
4005 bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB + 4] = b1;
4006 bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB + 5] = b2;
4007 }
4008 }
4009 }
4010 }
4018 public byte[] GetSaveBytes(bool littleEndian)
4019 {
4020 BufferInfo bf = this.Copy();
4021 if (!littleEndian)
4022 {
4023 bf.SwitchRedBlue();
4024 bf.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
4025 }
4026 Bitmap bitmap = (Bitmap)bf.Image;
4027 BitmapData data = bitmap.LockBits(new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, SizeX, SizeY), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat);
4028 IntPtr ptr = data.Scan0;
4029 int length = this.bytes.Length;
4030 byte[] bytes = new byte[length];
4031 Marshal.Copy(ptr, bytes, 0, length);
4032 if (!littleEndian)
4033 Array.Reverse(bytes);
4034 bitmap.UnlockBits(data);
4035 bitmap.Dispose();
4036 return bytes;
4037 }
4047 public static byte[] GetBuffer(Bitmap bmp, int stride)
4048 {
4049 BitmapData data = bmp.LockBits(new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, bmp.PixelFormat);
4050 IntPtr ptr = data.Scan0;
4051 int length = data.Stride * bmp.Height;
4052 byte[] bytes = new byte[length];
4053 Marshal.Copy(ptr, bytes, 0, length);
4054 Array.Reverse(bytes);
4055 bmp.UnlockBits(data);
4056
4057 return bytes;
4058 }
4066 public static Bitmap To24Bit(Bitmap b)
4067 {
4068 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(b.Width, b.Height, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);
4069 System.Drawing.Graphics g = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(bm);
4070 if (b.PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale || b.PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
4071 {
4072 g.DrawImage(AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp(b), 0, 0);
4073 }
4074 else
4075 {
4076 g.DrawImage(b, 0, 0);
4077 }
4078 g.Dispose();
4079 return bm;
4080 }
4087 public static Bitmap To32Bit(Bitmap b)
4088 {
4089 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(b.Width, b.Height, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4090 if (b.PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale || b.PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
4091 {
4092 bm = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp(b);
4093 }
4094 System.Drawing.Graphics g = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(bm);
4095 g.DrawImage(b, 0, 0);
4096 return bm;
4097 }
4100 public void RGBTo32Bit()
4101 {
4102 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4103 System.Drawing.Graphics g = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(bm);
4104 g.DrawImage((Bitmap)Image, 0, 0);
4105 Image = bm;
4106 }
4115 public static Bitmap SwitchChannels(Bitmap image, int c1, int c2)
4116 {
4117 ExtractChannel cr = new ExtractChannel((short)c1);
4118 ExtractChannel cb = new ExtractChannel((short)c2);
4119 // apply the filter
4120 Bitmap rImage = cr.Apply(image);
4121 Bitmap bImage = cb.Apply(image);
4122 ReplaceChannel replaceRFilter = new ReplaceChannel((short)c1, bImage);
4123 replaceRFilter.ApplyInPlace(image);
4124 ReplaceChannel replaceBFilter = new ReplaceChannel((short)c2, rImage);
4125 replaceBFilter.ApplyInPlace(image);
4126 rImage.Dispose();
4127 bImage.Dispose();
4128 return image;
4129 }
4130 public byte[] RGBBytes => GetRGBBuffer(SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, Bytes);
4135 public BufferInfo Copy()
4136 {
4137 byte[] bt = new byte[Bytes.Length];
4138 for (int i = 0; i < bt.Length; i++)
4139 {
4140 bt[i] = bytes[i];
4141 }
4142 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, bt, Coordinate, ID);
4143 bf.plane = Plane;
4144 return bf;
4145 }
4150 public BufferInfo CopyInfo()
4151 {
4152 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, null, Coordinate, ID);
4153 bf.bytes = new byte[bf.Stride * bf.SizeY];
4154 bf.plane = Plane;
4155 return bf;
4156 }
4159 public void To8Bit()
4160 {
4161 Bitmap bm = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp((Bitmap)Image);
4162 bm.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
4163 Image = bm;
4164 }
4166 public void To16Bit()
4167 {
4168 Bitmap bm = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp((Bitmap)Image);
4169 Image = bm;
4170 }
4171
4175 public void ToRGB()
4176 {
4177 int stride;
4178 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
4179 stride = SizeX * 3 * 2;
4180 else
4181 stride = SizeX * 3;
4182
4183 int w = SizeX;
4184 int h = SizeY;
4185 byte[] bts = null;
4186 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
4187 {
4188 return;
4189 }
4190 else
4191 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
4192 {
4193 bts = new byte[h * SizeX * 3 * 2];
4194 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4195 {
4196 //getting the pixels of current row
4197 int rowRGB = y * (w * 2 * 3);
4198 int row16 = y * (w * 2);
4199 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4200 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4201 {
4202 int indexRGB = x * 6;
4203 int index16 = x * 2;
4204 //R
4205 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB] = Bytes[row16 + index16];
4206 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
4207 //G
4208 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = Bytes[row16 + index16];
4209 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3] = Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
4210 //B
4211 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 4] = Bytes[row16 + index16];
4212 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 5] = Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
4213 }
4214 }
4215 Bytes = bts;
4216 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
4217 }
4218 else
4219 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
4220 {
4221 return;
4222 }
4223 else
4224 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
4225 {
4226 bts = new byte[h * SizeX * 3];
4227 for (int y = 0; y < SizeY; y++)
4228 {
4229 //getting the pixels of current row
4230 int rowRGB = y * (SizeX * 3);
4231 int row8 = y * (SizeX);
4232 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4233 for (int x = 0; x < SizeX; x++)
4234 {
4235 int indexRGB = x * 3;
4236 int index8 = x;
4237 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB] = Bytes[row8 + index8];
4238 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = Bytes[row8 + index8];
4239 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = Bytes[row8 + index8];
4240 }
4241 }
4242 Bytes = bts;
4243 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
4244 }
4245 }
4249 public void RotateFlip(RotateFlipType rot)
4250 {
4251 Bitmap fl = (Bitmap)Image.Clone();
4252 fl.RotateFlip(rot);
4253 Image = fl;
4254 fl.Dispose();
4255 }
4256 /* Checking if the image is RGB or not. */
4257 public bool isRGB
4258 {
4259 get
4260 {
4261 if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
4262 return false;
4263 else
4264 return true;
4265 }
4266 }
4270 public override string ToString()
4271 {
4272 return ID;
4273 }
4275 public void Dispose()
4276 {
4277 bytes = null;
4278 if (stats != null)
4279 {
4280 for (int i = 0; i < stats.Length; i++)
4281 {
4282 if (stats[i] != null)
4283 stats[i].Dispose();
4284 }
4285 }
4286 ID = null;
4287 file = null;
4288 GC.Collect();
4289 }
4290
4291 public static BufferInfo operator /(BufferInfo a, BufferInfo b)
4292 {
4293 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4294 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4295 {
4296 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4297 {
4298 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) / b.GetPixel(x, y));
4299 }
4300 }
4301 return bf;
4302 }
4303 public static BufferInfo operator *(BufferInfo a, BufferInfo b)
4304 {
4305 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4306 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4307 {
4308 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4309 {
4310 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) * b.GetPixel(x, y));
4311 }
4312 }
4313 return bf;
4314 }
4315 public static BufferInfo operator +(BufferInfo a, BufferInfo b)
4316 {
4317 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4318 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4319 {
4320 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4321 {
4322 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) + b.GetPixel(x, y));
4323 }
4324 }
4325 return bf;
4326 }
4327 public static BufferInfo operator -(BufferInfo a, BufferInfo b)
4328 {
4329 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4330 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4331 {
4332 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4333 {
4334 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) - b.GetPixel(x, y));
4335 }
4336 }
4337 return bf;
4338 }
4339
4340 public static BufferInfo operator /(BufferInfo a, float b)
4341 {
4342 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4343 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4344 {
4345 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4346 {
4347 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) / b);
4348 }
4349 }
4350 return bf;
4351 }
4352 public static BufferInfo operator *(BufferInfo a, float b)
4353 {
4354 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4355 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4356 {
4357 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4358 {
4359 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) * b);
4360 }
4361 }
4362 return bf;
4363 }
4364 public static BufferInfo operator +(BufferInfo a, float b)
4365 {
4366 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4367 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4368 {
4369 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4370 {
4371 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) + b);
4372 }
4373 }
4374 return bf;
4375 }
4376 public static BufferInfo operator -(BufferInfo a, float b)
4377 {
4378 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4379 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4380 {
4381 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4382 {
4383 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) - b);
4384 }
4385 }
4386 return bf;
4387 }
4388

4390 {
4391 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();

4393 {
4394 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)

4402 {
4403 BufferInfo bf = a.Copy();
4404 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4405 {
4406 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4407 {
4408 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) * b);
4409 }
4410 }
4411 return bf;
4412 }
4413 public static BufferInfo operator +(BufferInfo a, ColorS b)
4414 {
4415 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4416 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4417 {
4418 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4419 {
4420 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) + b);
4421 }
4422 }
4423 return bf;
4424 }
4425 public static BufferInfo operator -(BufferInfo a, ColorS b)
4426 {
4427 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4428 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4429 {
4430 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4431 {
4432 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) - b);
4433 }
4434 }
4435 return bf;
4436 }
4437 }
4438
4439 /* It's a class that holds a string, an IFilter, and a Type */
4440 public class Filt
4441 {
4442 /* Defining an enum. */
4443 public enum Type
4444 {
4445 Base,
4446 Base2,
4447 InPlace,
4448 InPlace2,
4449 InPlacePartial,
4450 Resize,
4451 Rotate,
4452 Transformation,
4453 Copy
4454 }
4455 public string name;
4456 public IFilter filt;
4457 public Type type;
4458 public Filt(string s, IFilter f, Type t)
4459 {
4460 name = s;
4461 filt = f;
4462 type = t;
4463 }
4464 }
4465 public static class Filters
4466 {
4472 public static Filt GetFilter(string name)
4473 {
4474 return filters[name];
4475 }
4476 public static Dictionary<string, Filt> filters = new Dictionary<string, Filt>();
4485 public static BioImage Base(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
4486 {
4487 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
4488 if (!inPlace)
4489 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
4490 try
4491 {
4492 Filt f = filters[name];
4493 BaseFilter fi = (BaseFilter)f.filt;
4494 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4495 {
4496 img.Buffers[i].SetImage(fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i].Image), false); ;
4497 }
4498 if (!inPlace)
4499 {
4500 Images.AddImage(img, true);
4501 }
4502 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.Base(" + '"' + id +
4503 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
4504 }
4505 catch (Exception e)
4506 {
4507 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString(), "Filter Error");
4508 }
4509 return img;
4510 }
4521 public static BioImage Base2(string id, string id2, string name, bool inPlace)
4522 {
4523 BioImage c2 = Images.GetImage(id);
4524 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id2);
4525 if (!inPlace)
4526 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
4527 try
4528 {
4529 Filt f = filters[name];
4530 BaseFilter2 fi = (BaseFilter2)f.filt;
4531 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4532 {
4533 fi.OverlayImage = (Bitmap)c2.Buffers[i].Image;
4534 img.Buffers[i].SetImage(fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i].Image), false);
4535 }
4536 if (!inPlace)
4537 {
4538 Images.AddImage(img, true);
4539 }
4540 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.Base2(" + '"' + id + '"' + "," +
4541 '"' + id2 + '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
4542 return img;
4543 }
4544 catch (Exception e)
4545 {
4546 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString(), "Filter Error");
4547 }
4548 return img;
4549 }
4558 public static BioImage InPlace(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
4559 {
4560 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
4561 if (!inPlace)
4562 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
4563 try
4564 {
4565 Filt f = filters[name];
4566 BaseInPlaceFilter fi = (BaseInPlaceFilter)f.filt;
4567 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4568 {
4569 img.Buffers[i].SetImage(fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i].Image), false);
4570 }
4571 if (!inPlace)
4572 {
4573 Images.AddImage(img, true);
4574 }
4575 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.InPlace(" + '"' + id +
4576 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
4577 return img;
4578 }
4579 catch (Exception e)
4580 {
4581 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString(), "Filter Error");
4582 }
4583 return img;
4584 }
4595 public static BioImage InPlace2(string id, string id2, string name, bool inPlace)
4596 {
4597 BioImage c2 = Images.GetImage(id);
4598 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id2);
4599 if (!inPlace)
4600 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
4601 try
4602 {
4603 Filt f = filters[name];
4604 BaseInPlaceFilter2 fi = (BaseInPlaceFilter2)f.filt;
4605 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4606 {
4607 fi.OverlayImage = (Bitmap)c2.Buffers[i].Image;
4608 img.Buffers[i].SetImage(fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i].Image), false);
4609 }
4610 if (!inPlace)
4611 {
4612 Images.AddImage(img, true);
4613 }
4614 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.InPlace2(" + '"' + id + '"' + "," +
4615 '"' + id2 + '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
4616 return img;
4617 }
4618 catch (Exception e)
4619 {
4620 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString(), "Filter Error");
4621 }
4622 return img;
4623 }
4632 public static BioImage InPlacePartial(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
4633 {
4634 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
4635 if (!inPlace)
4636 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
4637 try
4638 {
4639 Filt f = filters[name];
4640 BaseInPlacePartialFilter fi = (BaseInPlacePartialFilter)f.filt;
4641 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4642 {
4643 img.Buffers[i].SetImage(fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i].Image), false);
4644 }
4645 if (!inPlace)
4646 {
4647 Images.AddImage(img, true);
4648 }
4649 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.InPlacePartial(" + '"' + id +
4650 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
4651 return img;
4652 }
4653 catch (Exception e)
4654 {
4655 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString(), "Filter Error");
4656 }
4657 return img;
4658 }
4668 public static BioImage Resize(string id, string name, bool inPlace, int w, int h)
4669 {
4670 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
4671 if (!inPlace)
4672 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
4673 try
4674 {
4675 Filt f = filters[name];
4676 BaseResizeFilter fi = (BaseResizeFilter)f.filt;
4677 fi.NewHeight = h;
4678 fi.NewWidth = w;
4679 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4680 {
4681 img.Buffers[i].SetImage(fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i].Image), false);
4682 }
4683 if (!inPlace)
4684 {
4685 Images.AddImage(img, true);
4686 }
4687 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.Resize(" + '"' + id +
4688 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
4689 }
4690 catch (Exception e)
4691 {
4692 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString(), "Filter Error");
4693 }
4694 return img;
4695 }
4708 public static BioImage Rotate(string id, string name, bool inPlace, float angle, int a, int r, int g, int b)
4709 {
4710 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
4711 if (!inPlace)
4712 img = BioImage.Copy(Images.GetImage(id));
4713 try
4714 {
4715 Filt f = filters[name];
4716 BaseRotateFilter fi = (BaseRotateFilter)f.filt;
4717 fi.Angle = angle;
4718 fi.FillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(a, r, g, b);
4719 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4720 {
4721 img.Buffers[i].SetImage(fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i].Image), false);
4722 }
4723 if (!inPlace)
4724 {
4725 Images.AddImage(img,true);
4726 }
4727 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.Rotate(" + '"' + id +
4728 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + "," + angle.ToString() + "," +
4729 a + "," + r + "," + g + "," + b + ");");
4730 }
4731 catch (Exception e)
4732 {
4733 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString(), "Filter Error");
4734 }
4735 return img;
4736
4737 }
4747 public static BioImage Transformation(string id, string name, bool inPlace, float angle)
4748 {
4749 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
4750 if (!inPlace)
4751 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
4752 try
4753 {
4754 Filt f = filters[name];
4755 BaseTransformationFilter fi = (BaseTransformationFilter)f.filt;
4756 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4757 {
4758 img.Buffers[i].SetImage(fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i].Image), false);
4759 }
4760 if (!inPlace)
4761 {
4762 Images.AddImage(img,true);
4763 }
4764 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.Transformation(" + '"' + id +
4765 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + "," + angle + ");");
4766 }
4767 catch (Exception e)
4768 {
4769 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString(), "Filter Error");
4770 }
4771 return img;
4772 }
4781 public static BioImage Copy(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
4782 {
4783 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
4784 if (!inPlace)
4785 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
4786 try
4787 {
4788 Filt f = filters[name];
4789 BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter fi = (BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter)f.filt;
4790 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4791 {
4792 img.Buffers[i].Image = fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i].Image);
4793 }
4794 if (!inPlace)
4795 {
4796 Images.AddImage(img, true);
4797 }
4798 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.Copy(" + '"' + id +
4799 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
4800 }
4801 catch (Exception e)
4802 {
4803 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString(), "Filter Error");
4804 }
4805 return img;
4806 }
4816 public static BioImage Crop(string id, double x, double y, double w, double h)
4817 {
4818 BioImage c = Images.GetImage(id);
4819 RectangleF r = c.ToImageSpace(new RectangleD(x, y, w, h));
4820 Rectangle rec = new Rectangle((int)r.X, (int)r.Y, (int)r.Width, (int)r.Height);
4821 BioImage img = BioImage.Copy(c, false);
4822 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4823 {
4824 img.Buffers[i].Crop(rec);
4825 }
4826 Images.AddImage(img,false);
4827 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.Crop(" + '"' + id + '"' + "," + x + "," + y + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
4828 App.tabsView.AddTab(img);
4829 return img;
4830 }
4837 public static BioImage Crop(string id, RectangleD r)
4838 {
4839 return Crop(id, r.X, r.Y, r.W, r.H);
4840 }
4843 public static void Init()
4844 {
4845 //Base Filters
4846 Filt f = new Filt("AdaptiveSmoothing", new AdaptiveSmoothing(), Filt.Type.Base);
4847 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4848 f = new Filt("BayerFilter", new BayerFilter(), Filt.Type.Base);
4849 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4850 f = new Filt("BayerFilterOptimized", new BayerFilterOptimized(), Filt.Type.Base);
4851 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4852 f = new Filt("BayerDithering", new BayerDithering(), Filt.Type.Base);
4853 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4854 f = new Filt("ConnectedComponentsLabeling", new ConnectedComponentsLabeling(), Filt.Type.Base);
4855 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4856 f = new Filt("ExtractChannel", new ExtractChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
4857 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4858 f = new Filt("ExtractNormalizedRGBChannel", new ExtractNormalizedRGBChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
4859 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4860 f = new Filt("Grayscale", new Grayscale(0.2125, 0.7154, 0.0721), Filt.Type.Base);
4861 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4862 //f = new Filt("TexturedFilter", new TexturedFilter());
4863 //filters.Add(f.name, f);
4864 f = new Filt("WaterWave", new WaterWave(), Filt.Type.Base);
4865 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4866 f = new Filt("YCbCrExtractChannel", new YCbCrExtractChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
4867 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4868

5023 //filters.Add(f.name, f);

5025 filters.Add(f.name, f);

5027 filters.Add(f.name, f);

5035 filters.Add(f.name, f);

5037 filters.Add(f.name, f);

5039 filters.Add(f.name, f);
5040
5041 }
5042 }
5043 /* It calculates the statistics of an image */
5044 public class Statistics
5045 {
5046 private int[] values = null;
5047 public int[] Values
5048 {
5049 get { return values; }
5050 set { values = value; }
5051 }
5052 private int bitsPerPixel;
5053 private int min = ushort.MaxValue;
5054 private int max = ushort.MinValue;
5055 private float stackMin = ushort.MaxValue;
5056 private float stackMax = ushort.MinValue;
5057 private float stackMean = 0;
5058 private float stackMedian = 0;
5059 private float mean = 0;
5060 private float median = 0;
5061 private float meansum = 0;
5062 private float[] stackValues = new float[ushort.MaxValue];
5063 private int count = 0;
5064 public int Min
5065 {
5066 get { return min; }
5067 }
5068 public int Max
5069 {
5070 get { return max; }
5071 }
5072 public double Mean
5073 {
5074 get { return mean; }
5075 }
5076 public int BitsPerPixel
5077 {
5078 get { return bitsPerPixel; }
5079 }
5080 public float Median
5081 {
5082 get
5083 {
5084 return median;
5085 }
5086 }
5087 public float StackMedian
5088 {
5089 get
5090 {
5091 return stackMedian;
5092 }
5093 }
5094 public float StackMean
5095 {
5096 get
5097 {
5098 return stackMean;
5099 }
5100 }
5101 public float StackMax
5102 {
5103 get
5104 {
5105 return stackMax;
5106 }
5107 }
5108 public float StackMin
5109 {
5110 get
5111 {
5112 return stackMin;
5113 }
5114 }
5115 public float[] StackValues
5116 {
5117 get { return stackValues; }
5118 }
5119 public Statistics(bool bit16)
5120 {
5121 values = new int[ushort.MaxValue + 1];
5122 if (bit16)
5123 {
5124 bitsPerPixel = 16;
5125 }
5126 else
5127 {
5128 bitsPerPixel = 8;
5129 }
5130 }
5142 public static Statistics[] FromBytes(byte[] bts, int w, int h, int rGBChannels, int BitsPerPixel, int stride)
5143 {
5144 Statistics[] sts = new Statistics[rGBChannels];
5145 bool bit16 = false;
5146 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
5147 bit16 = true;
5148 for (int i = 0; i < rGBChannels; i++)
5149 {
5150 sts[i] = new Statistics(bit16);
5151 sts[i].max = ushort.MinValue;
5152 sts[i].min = ushort.MaxValue;
5153 sts[i].bitsPerPixel = BitsPerPixel;
5154 }
5155
5156 float sumr = 0;
5157 float sumg = 0;
5158 float sumb = 0;
5159 float suma = 0;
5160 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
5161 {
5162 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
5163 {
5164 for (int x = 0; x < stride; x += 2 * rGBChannels)
5165 {
5166 if (rGBChannels == 3)
5167 {
5168 ushort b = BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, (y * stride + (x)));
5169 ushort g = BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, (y * stride + (x + 2)));
5170 ushort r = BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, (y * stride + (x + 4)));
5171 if (sts[0].max < r)
5172 sts[0].max = r;
5173 if (sts[0].min > r)
5174 sts[0].min = r;
5175 sts[0].values[r]++;
5176 sumr += r;
5177 if (sts[1].max < g)
5178 sts[1].max = g;
5179 if (sts[1].min > g)
5180 sts[1].min = g;
5181 sts[1].values[g]++;
5182 sumg += g;
5183 if (sts[2].max < b)
5184 sts[2].max = b;
5185 if (sts[2].min > b)
5186 sts[2].min = b;
5187 sts[2].values[b]++;
5188 sumb += b;
5189 }
5190 else
5191 {
5192 ushort r = BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, (y * stride + (x)));
5193 if (sts[0].max < r)
5194 sts[0].max = r;
5195 if (sts[0].min > r)
5196 sts[0].min = r;
5197 sts[0].values[r]++;
5198 sumr += r;
5199 }
5200 }
5201 }
5202 }
5203 else
5204 {
5205 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
5206 {
5207 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
5208 {
5209 if (rGBChannels > 1)
5210 {
5211 byte b = bts[y * stride + x];
5212 byte g = bts[y * stride + (x + 1)];
5213 byte r = bts[y * stride + (x + 2)];
5214 byte a = 0;
5215 if (rGBChannels == 4)
5216 {
5217 a = bts[y * stride + x];
5218 b = bts[y * stride + (x + 1)];
5219 g = bts[y * stride + (x + 2)];
5220 r = bts[y * stride + (x + 3)];
5221
5222 if (sts[0].max < a)
5223 sts[0].max = a;
5224 if (sts[0].min > a)
5225 sts[0].min = a;
5226 sts[0].values[a]++;
5227 suma += a;
5228 if (sts[1].max < b)
5229 sts[1].max = b;
5230 if (sts[1].min > b)
5231 sts[1].min = b;
5232 sts[1].values[b]++;
5233 sumb += b;
5234 if (sts[2].max < g)
5235 sts[2].max = g;
5236 if (sts[2].min > g)
5237 sts[2].min = g;
5238 sts[2].values[g]++;
5239 sumg += g;
5240 if (sts[3].max < r)
5241 sts[3].max = r;
5242 if (sts[3].min > r)
5243 sts[3].min = r;
5244 sts[3].values[r]++;
5245 sumr += r;
5246 }
5247 else
5248 {
5249 if (sts[0].max < r)
5250 sts[0].max = r;
5251 if (sts[0].min > r)
5252 sts[0].min = r;
5253 sts[0].values[r]++;
5254 sumr += r;
5255 if (sts[1].max < g)
5256 sts[1].max = g;
5257 if (sts[1].min > g)
5258 sts[1].min = g;
5259 sts[1].values[g]++;
5260 sumg += g;
5261 if (sts[2].max < b)
5262 sts[2].max = b;
5263 if (sts[2].min > b)
5264 sts[2].min = b;
5265 sts[2].values[b]++;
5266 sumb += b;
5267 }
5268 }
5269 else
5270 {
5271 byte r = bts[y * stride + x];
5272 if (sts[0].max < r)
5273 sts[0].max = r;
5274 if (sts[0].min > r)
5275 sts[0].min = r;
5276 sts[0].values[r]++;
5277 sumr += r;
5278 }
5279 }
5280 }
5281 }
5282
5283 sts[0].mean = sumr / (float)(w * h);
5284 if (rGBChannels > 1)
5285 {
5286 sts[1].mean = sumg / (float)(w * h);
5287 sts[2].mean = sumb / (float)(w * h);
5288 if (rGBChannels == 4)
5289 sts[3].mean = suma / (float)(w * h);
5290 }
5291
5292 for (int i = 0; i < sts[0].values.Length; i++)
5293 {
5294 if (sts[0].median < sts[0].values[i])
5295 sts[0].median = sts[0].values[i];
5296 }
5297 if (rGBChannels > 1)
5298 {
5299 for (int i = 0; i < sts[1].values.Length; i++)
5300 {
5301 if (sts[1].median < sts[1].values[i])
5302 sts[1].median = sts[1].values[i];
5303 if (sts[2].median < sts[2].values[i])
5304 sts[2].median = sts[2].values[i];
5305 if (rGBChannels == 4)
5306 {
5307 if (sts[3].median < sts[3].values[i])
5308 sts[3].median = sts[3].values[i];
5309 }
5310 }
5311 }
5312 return sts;
5313 }
5319 public static Statistics[] FromBytes(BufferInfo bf)
5320 {
5321 return FromBytes(bf.Bytes, bf.SizeX, bf.SizeY, bf.RGBChannelsCount, bf.BitsPerPixel, bf.Stride);
5322 }
5323 public static BioImage b = null;
5324 public static Dictionary<string, BufferInfo> list = new Dictionary<string, BufferInfo>();
5326 public static void FromBytes()
5327 {
5328 string name = Thread.CurrentThread.Name;
5329 list[name].Stats = FromBytes(list[name]);
5330 list.Remove(name);
5331 }
5335 public static void CalcStatistics(BufferInfo bf)
5336 {
5337 bf.Stats = null;
5338 Thread th = new Thread(FromBytes);
5339 th.Name = bf.ID;
5340 list.Add(th.Name.ToString(), bf);
5341 th.Start();
5342 }
5344 public static void ClearCalcBuffer()
5345 {
5346 list.Clear();
5347 }
5351 public void AddStatistics(Statistics s)
5352 {
5353 if (stackValues == null)
5354 {
5355 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
5356 stackValues = new float[ushort.MaxValue + 1];
5357 else
5358 stackValues = new float[byte.MaxValue + 1];
5359 }
5360 if (stackMax < s.max)
5361 stackMax = s.max;
5362 if (stackMin > s.min)
5363 stackMin = s.min;
5364 meansum += s.mean;
5365 for (int i = 0; i < stackValues.Length; i++)
5366 {
5367 stackValues[i] += s.values[i];
5368 }
5369 values = s.values;
5370 count++;
5371 }
5384 public void MeanHistogram()
5385 {
5386 for (int i = 0; i < stackValues.Length; i++)
5387 {
5388 stackValues[i] /= (float)count;
5389 }
5390 stackMean = (float)meansum / (float)count;
5391
5392 for (int i = 0; i < stackValues.Length; i++)
5393 {
5394 if (stackMedian < stackValues[i])
5395 stackMedian = (float)stackValues[i];
5396 }
5397
5398 }
5399
5406 public PointF[] GetPoints(int bin)
5407 {
5408 PointF[] pts = new PointF[stackValues.Length];
5409 for (int x = 0; x < stackValues.Length; x += bin)
5410 {
5411 pts[x].X = x;
5412 pts[x].Y = stackValues[x];
5413 }
5414 return pts;
5415 }
5417 public void Dispose()
5418 {
5419 stackValues = null;
5420 values = null;
5421 }
5423 public void DisposeHistogram()
5424 {
5425 stackValues = null;
5426 values = null;
5427 }
5428 }
5429 /* The class is used to store the physical and stage sizes of an image */
5430 public class ImageInfo
5431 {
5432 bool HasPhysicalXY;
5433 bool HasPhysicalXYZ = false;
5434 private double physicalSizeX = -1;
5435 private double physicalSizeY = -1;
5436 private double physicalSizeZ = -1;
5437 public double PhysicalSizeX
5438 {
5439 get { return physicalSizeX; }
5440 set
5441 {
5442 physicalSizeX = value;
5443 HasPhysicalXY = true;
5444 }
5445 }
5446 public double PhysicalSizeY
5447 {
5448 get { return physicalSizeY; }
5449 set
5450 {
5451 physicalSizeY = value;
5452 HasPhysicalXY = true;
5453 }
5454 }
5455 public double PhysicalSizeZ
5456 {
5457 get { return physicalSizeZ; }
5458 set
5459 {
5460 physicalSizeZ = value;
5461 HasPhysicalXYZ = true;
5462 }
5463 }
5464
5465 bool HasStageXY = false;
5466 bool HasStageXYZ = false;
5467 public double stageSizeX = -1;
5468 public double stageSizeY = -1;
5469 public double stageSizeZ = -1;
5470 public double StageSizeX
5471 {
5472 get { return stageSizeX; }
5473 set
5474 {
5475 stageSizeX = value;
5476 HasStageXY = true;
5477 }
5478 }
5479 public double StageSizeY
5480 {
5481 get { return stageSizeY; }
5482 set
5483 {
5484 stageSizeY = value;
5485 HasStageXY = true;
5486 }
5487 }
5488 public double StageSizeZ
5489 {
5490 get { return stageSizeZ; }
5491 set
5492 {
5493 stageSizeZ = value;
5494 HasStageXYZ = true;
5495 }
5496 }
5497
5498 private int series = 0;
5499 public int Series
5500 {
5501 get { return series; }
5502 set { series = value; }
5503 }
5504
5505 public ImageInfo Copy()
5506 {
5507 ImageInfo inf = new ImageInfo();
5508 inf.PhysicalSizeX = PhysicalSizeX;
5509 inf.PhysicalSizeY = PhysicalSizeY;
5510 inf.PhysicalSizeZ = PhysicalSizeZ;
5511 inf.StageSizeX = StageSizeX;
5512 inf.StageSizeY = StageSizeY;
5513 inf.StageSizeZ = StageSizeZ;
5514 inf.HasPhysicalXY = HasPhysicalXY;
5515 inf.HasPhysicalXYZ = HasPhysicalXYZ;
5516 inf.StageSizeX = StageSizeX;
5517 inf.StageSizeY = StageSizeY;
5518 inf.StageSizeZ = StageSizeZ;
5519 inf.HasStageXY = HasStageXY;
5520 inf.HasStageXYZ = HasStageXYZ;
5521 return inf;
5522 }
5523
5524 }
5525 public class BioImage : IDisposable
5526 {
5527 public class WellPlate
5528 {
5529 public class Well
5530 {
5531 public string ID { get; set; }
5532 public int Index { get; set; }
5533 public int Column { get; set; }
5534 public int Row { get; set; }
5535 public System.Drawing.Color Color { get; set; }
5536 public List<Sample> Samples = new List<Sample>();
5537 public class Sample
5538 {
5539 public string ID { get; set; }
5540 public int Index { get; set; }
5541 public PointD Position { get; set; }
5542 public Timestamp Time { get; set; }
5543 }
5544 }
5545 public List<Well> Wells = new List<Well>();
5546
5547 public PointD Origin;
5548 public string ID;
5549 public string Name;
5550 public WellPlate(BioImage b)
5551 {
5552 ID = b.meta.getPlateID(b.series);
5553 Name = b.meta.getPlateName(b.series);
5554 double x, y;
5555 if (b.meta.getPlateWellOriginX(b.series) != null)
5556 x = b.meta.getPlateWellOriginX(b.series).value().doubleValue();
5557 else
5558 x = 0;
5559 if (b.meta.getPlateWellOriginY(b.series) != null)
5560 y = b.meta.getPlateWellOriginY(b.series).value().doubleValue();
5561 else
5562 y = 0;
5563 Origin = new PointD(x, y);
5564 int ws = b.meta.getWellCount(b.series);
5565 for (int i = 0; i < ws; i++)
5566 {
5567 Well w = new Well();
5568 w.ID = b.meta.getWellID(b.series, i);
5569 w.Column = b.meta.getWellColumn(b.series, i).getNumberValue().intValue();
5570 w.Row = b.meta.getWellRow(b.series, i).getNumberValue().intValue();
5571 int wsc = b.meta.getWellSampleCount(b.series, i);
5572 for (int s = 0; s < wsc; s++)
5573 {
5574 Well.Sample sa = new Well.Sample();
5575 sa.Time = b.meta.getWellSampleTimepoint(b.series, i, s);
5576 sa.Index = b.meta.getWellSampleIndex(b.series, i, s).getNumberValue().intValue();
5577 double sx, sy;
5578 if (b.meta.getWellSamplePositionX(b.series, i, s) != null)
5579 sx = b.meta.getWellSamplePositionX(b.series, i, s).value().doubleValue();
5580 else sx = 0;
5581 if (b.meta.getWellSamplePositionY(b.series, i, s) != null)
5582 sy = b.meta.getWellSamplePositionY(b.series, i, s).value().doubleValue();
5583 else sy = 0;
5584 sa.Position = new PointD(sx, sy);
5585 sa.ID = b.meta.getWellSampleID(b.series, i, s);
5586 w.Samples.Add(sa);
5587 }
5588 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color c = b.meta.getWellColor(b.series, i);
5589 if(c!=null)
5590 w.Color = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(c.getAlpha(),c.getRed(),c.getGreen(),c.getBlue());
5591 Wells.Add(w);
5592 }
5593
5594 }
5595 }
5596 public int[,,] Coords;
5597 private ZCT coordinate;
5598 /* A property. */
5599 public ZCT Coordinate
5600 {
5601 get
5602 {
5603 return coordinate;
5604 }
5605 set
5606 {
5607 coordinate = value;
5608 }
5609 }
5610 public enum ImageType
5611 {
5612 pyramidal,
5613 stack,
5614 well
5615 }
5616 private string id;
5617 private ImageType type = ImageType.stack;
5618 public WellPlate Plate = null;
5619 public ImageType Type
5620 {
5621 get { return type; }
5622 set
5623 {
5624 type = value;
5625 }
5626 }
5627 public List<Channel> Channels = new List<Channel>();
5628 public List<Resolution> Resolutions = new List<Resolution>();
5629 public List<BufferInfo> Buffers = new List<BufferInfo>();
5630 public VolumeD Volume { get; set; }
5631 public List<ROI> Annotations = new List<ROI>();
5632 public OpenSlideImage openSlideImage;
5633 public OpenSlideBase openSlideBase;
5634 public SlideBase slideBase;
5635 public SlideImage slideImage;
5636 public string filename = "";
5637 public string script = "";
5638 public string Filename
5639 {
5640 get
5641 {
5642 return filename;
5643 }
5644 set
5645 {
5646 filename = value;
5647 }
5648 }
5649 public int[] rgbChannels = new int[3];
5650 public int RGBChannelCount
5651 {
5652 get
5653 {
5654 return Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount;
5655 }
5656 }
5657 public int? MacroResolution { get; set; }
5658 public int? LabelResolution { get; set; }
5659 void SetLabelMacroResolutions()
5660 {
5661 int i = 0;
5662 Size s = new Size(int.MaxValue, int.MaxValue);
5663 bool noMacro = true;
5664 PixelFormat pf = Resolutions[0].PixelFormat;
5665 foreach (Resolution res in Resolutions)
5666 {
5667 if (res.SizeX < s.Width && res.SizeY < s.Height)
5668 {
5669 //If the pixel format changes it means this is the macro resolution.
5670 if (pf != res.PixelFormat)
5671 {
5672 noMacro = false;
5673 break;
5674 }
5675 pf = res.PixelFormat;
5676 s = new Size(res.SizeX, res.SizeY);
5677 }
5678 else
5679 {
5680 //If this level is bigger than the previous this is the macro resolution.
5681 noMacro = false;
5682 break;
5683 }
5684 i++;
5685 }
5686 if (!noMacro)
5687 {
5688 MacroResolution = i;
5689 LabelResolution = i + 1;
5690 }
5691 }
5692 public int bitsPerPixel;
5693 public int imagesPerSeries = 0;
5694 public int seriesCount = 1;
5695 public double frameInterval = 0;
5696 public bool littleEndian = false;
5697 public bool isGroup = false;
5698 public long loadTimeMS = 0;
5699 public long loadTimeTicks = 0;
5700 public bool selected = false;
5701 private double resolution = 1;
5702 public double Resolution
5703 {
5704 get { return resolution; }
5705 set
5706 {
5707 if(value<0)
5708 return;
5709 if (!isPyramidal)
5710 return;
5711 if(MacroResolution.HasValue)
5712 {
5713 if (value < GetUnitPerPixel(Level))
5714 resolution = value;
5715 }
5716 else
5717 resolution = value;
5718 }
5719 }
5720 public Statistics Statistics
5721 {
5722 get
5723 {
5724 return statistics;
5725 }
5726 set
5727 {
5728 statistics = value;
5729 }
5730 }
5731 private int sizeZ, sizeC, sizeT;
5732 private Statistics statistics;
5733 int tileX, tileY;
5734 private int level = 0;
5735 ImageInfo imageInfo = new ImageInfo();
5736 public static BioImage Copy(BioImage b, bool rois)
5737 {
5738 BioImage bi = new BioImage(b.ID);
5739 if (rois)
5740 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
5741 {
5742 bi.Annotations.Add(an);
5743 }
5744 foreach (BufferInfo bf in b.Buffers)
5745 {
5746 bi.Buffers.Add(bf.Copy());
5747 }
5748 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
5749 {
5750 bi.Channels.Add(c);
5751 }
5752 bi.Coords = b.Coords;
5753 bi.sizeZ = b.sizeZ;
5754 bi.sizeC = b.sizeC;
5755 bi.sizeT = b.sizeT;
5756 bi.series = b.series;
5757 bi.seriesCount = b.seriesCount;
5758 bi.frameInterval = b.frameInterval;
5759 bi.littleEndian = b.littleEndian;
5760 bi.isGroup = b.isGroup;
5761 bi.imageInfo = b.imageInfo.Copy();
5762 bi.bitsPerPixel = b.bitsPerPixel;
5763 bi.file = b.file;
5764 bi.filename = b.filename;
5765 bi.Resolutions = b.Resolutions;
5766 bi.statistics = b.statistics;
5767 return bi;
5768 }
5769 public static BioImage Copy(BioImage b)
5770 {
5771 return Copy(b, true);
5772 }
5773 public BioImage Copy(bool rois)
5774 {
5775 return BioImage.Copy(this, rois);
5776 }
5777 public BioImage Copy()
5778 {
5779 return BioImage.Copy(this, true);
5780 }
5781 public static BioImage CopyInfo(BioImage b, bool copyAnnotations, bool copyChannels)
5782 {
5783 BioImage bi = new BioImage(b.ID);
5784 if (copyAnnotations)
5785 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
5786 {
5787 bi.Annotations.Add(an.Copy());
5788 }
5789 if (copyChannels)
5790 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
5791 {
5792 bi.Channels.Add(c.Copy());
5793 }
5794
5795 bi.Coords = b.Coords;
5796 bi.sizeZ = b.sizeZ;
5797 bi.sizeC = b.sizeC;
5798 bi.sizeT = b.sizeT;
5799 bi.series = b.series;
5800 bi.seriesCount = b.seriesCount;
5801 bi.frameInterval = b.frameInterval;
5802 bi.littleEndian = b.littleEndian;
5803 bi.isGroup = b.isGroup;
5804 bi.imageInfo = b.imageInfo.Copy();
5805 bi.bitsPerPixel = b.bitsPerPixel;
5806 bi.Resolutions = b.Resolutions;
5807 bi.Coordinate = b.Coordinate;
5808 bi.file = b.file;
5809 bi.Filename = b.Filename;
5810 bi.ID = Images.GetImageName(b.file);
5811 bi.statistics = b.statistics;
5812 return bi;
5813 }
5814 public string ID
5815 {
5816 get { return id; }
5817 set { id = value; }
5818 }
5819 public int ImageCount
5820 {
5821 get
5822 {
5823 return Buffers.Count;
5824 }
5825 }
5826 public double PhysicalSizeX
5827 {
5828 get { return Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeX; }
5829 }
5830 public double PhysicalSizeY
5831 {
5832 get { return Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeY; }
5833 }
5834 public double PhysicalSizeZ
5835 {
5836 get { return Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeZ; }
5837 }
5838 public int TileX
5839 {
5840 get { return tileX; }
5841 }
5842 public int TileY
5843 {
5844 get { return tileY; }
5845 }
5846 public double StageSizeX
5847 {
5848 get
5849 {
5850 return Resolutions[Level].StageSizeX;
5851 }
5852 set { imageInfo.StageSizeX = value; }
5853 }
5854 public double StageSizeY
5855 {
5856 get { return Resolutions[Level].StageSizeY; }
5857 set { imageInfo.StageSizeY = value; }
5858 }
5859 public double StageSizeZ
5860 {
5861 get { return Resolutions[Level].StageSizeZ; }
5862 set { imageInfo.StageSizeZ = value; }
5863 }
5864 Size s = new Size(1920, 1080);
5865 public Size PyramidalSize { get { return s; } set { s = value; } }
5866 PointD pyramidalOrigin = new PointD(0, 0);
5867 public PointD PyramidalOrigin
5868 {
5869 get { return pyramidalOrigin; }
5870 set
5871 {
5872 pyramidalOrigin = value;
5873 }
5874 }
5875 public int Level
5876 {
5877 get
5878 {
5879 if (openSlideBase != null)
5880 return OpenSlideGTK.TileUtil.GetLevel(openSlideBase.Schema.Resolutions, Resolution);
5881 else
5882 if (slideBase != null)
5883 return LevelFromResolution(Resolution);
5884 return level;
5885 }
5886 set
5887 {
5888 if (Type == ImageType.well)
5889 {
5890 level = value;
5891 reader.setId(file);
5892 reader.setSeries(value);
5893 // read the image data bytes
5894 int pages = reader.getImageCount();
5895 bool inter = reader.isInterleaved();
5896 PixelFormat pf = Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
5897 int w = Buffers[0].SizeX; int h = Buffers[0].SizeY;
5898 Buffers.Clear();
5899 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
5900 {
5901 BufferInfo bf;
5902 byte[] bytes = reader.openBytes(p);
5903 bf = new BufferInfo(file, w, h, pf, bytes, new ZCT(), p, null, littleEndian, inter);
5904 Buffers.Add(bf);
5905 }
5906 }
5907 }
5908 }
5917 public double GetLevelDownsample(int level)
5918 {
5919 int originalWidth = Resolutions[0].SizeX; // Width of the original level
5920 int nextLevelWidth = Resolutions[level].SizeX; // Width of the next level (downsampled)
5921 return (double)originalWidth / (double)nextLevelWidth;
5922 }
5928 public int LevelFromResolution(double Resolution)
5929 {
5930 double[] ds = new double[Resolutions.Count];
5931 for (int i = 0; i < Resolutions.Count; i++)
5932 {
5933 ds[i] = Resolutions[0].PhysicalSizeX * GetLevelDownsample(i);
5934 }
5935 for (int i = 0; i < ds.Length; i++)
5936 {
5937 if (ds[i] > Resolution)
5938 return i;
5939 }
5940 return 0;
5941 }
5947 public double GetUnitPerPixel(int level)
5948 {
5949 return Resolutions[0].PhysicalSizeX * GetLevelDownsample(level);
5950 }
5954 public async void UpdateBuffersPyramidal()
5955 {
5956 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
5957 {
5958 Buffers[i].Dispose();
5959 }
5960 Buffers.Clear();
5961 for (int i = 0; i < imagesPerSeries; i++)
5962 {
5963 if (openSlideImage != null)
5964 {
5965 byte[] bts = openSlideBase.GetSlice(new OpenSlideGTK.SliceInfo(PyramidalOrigin.X, PyramidalOrigin.Y, PyramidalSize.Width, PyramidalSize.Height, resolution));
5966 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo((int)Math.Round(OpenSlideBase.destExtent.Width), (int)Math.Round(OpenSlideBase.destExtent.Height), PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bts, new ZCT(), "");
5967 bf.Stats = Statistics.FromBytes(bf);
5968 Buffers.Add(bf);
5969 }
5970 else
5971 {
5972 start:
5973 byte[] bts = await slideBase.GetSlice(new SliceInfo(PyramidalOrigin.X, PyramidalOrigin.Y, PyramidalSize.Width, PyramidalSize.Height, resolution));
5974 if (bts == null)
5975 {
5976 if (PyramidalOrigin.X == 0 && PyramidalOrigin.Y == 0)
5977 {
5978 Resolution = 1;
5979 }
5980 pyramidalOrigin = new PointD(0, 0);
5981 goto start;
5982 }
5983 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo((int)Math.Round(SlideBase.destExtent.Width), (int)Math.Round(SlideBase.destExtent.Height), PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bts, new ZCT(), "");
5984 bf.Stats = Statistics.FromBytes(bf);
5985 Buffers.Add(bf);
5986 }
5987 }
5988 BioImage.AutoThreshold(this, false);
5989 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
5990 StackThreshold(true);
5991 else
5992 StackThreshold(false);
5993 }
5994 public int series
5995 {
5996 get
5997 {
5998 return imageInfo.Series;
5999 }
6000 set
6001 {
6002 imageInfo.Series = value;
6003 }
6004 }
6005 public List<NetVips.Image> vipPages = new List<NetVips.Image>();
6006 static bool initialized = false;
6007 public Channel RChannel
6008 {
6009 get
6010 {
6011 if (Channels[0].range.Length == 1)
6012 return Channels[rgbChannels[0]];
6013 else
6014 return Channels[0];
6015 }
6016 }
6017 public Channel GChannel
6018 {
6019 get
6020 {
6021 if (Channels[0].range.Length == 1)
6022 return Channels[rgbChannels[1]];
6023 else
6024 return Channels[0];
6025 }
6026 }
6027 public Channel BChannel
6028 {
6029 get
6030 {
6031 if (Channels[0].range.Length == 1)
6032 {
6033 if (Channels.Count < 3)
6034 return GChannel;
6035 else
6036 return Channels[rgbChannels[2]];
6037 }
6038 else
6039 return Channels[0];
6040 }
6041 }
6042 public static bool Planes = false;
6043 /* It's a class that holds the information that is stored in the ImageJ description file */
6044 public class ImageJDesc
6045 {
6046 public string ImageJ;
6047 public int images = 0;
6048 public int channels = 0;
6049 public int slices = 0;
6050 public int frames = 0;
6051 public bool hyperstack;
6052 public string mode;
6053 public string unit;
6054 public double finterval = 0;
6055 public double spacing = 0;
6056 public bool loop;
6057 public double min = 0;
6058 public double max = 0;
6059 public int count;
6060 public bool bit8color = false;
6061
6062 public ImageJDesc FromImage(BioImage b)
6063 {
6064 ImageJ = "";
6065 images = b.ImageCount;
6066 channels = b.SizeC;
6067 slices = b.SizeZ;
6068 frames = b.SizeT;
6069 hyperstack = true;
6070 mode = "grayscale";
6071 unit = "micron";
6072 finterval = b.frameInterval;
6073 spacing = b.PhysicalSizeZ;
6074 loop = false;
6075 /*
6076 double dmax = double.MinValue;
6077 double dmin = double.MaxValue;
6078 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
6079 {
6080 if(dmax < c.Max)
6081 dmax = c.Max;
6082 if(dmin > c.Min)
6083 dmin = c.Min;
6084 }
6085 min = dmin;
6086 max = dmax;
6087 */
6088 min = b.Channels[0].RangeR.Min;
6089 max = b.Channels[0].RangeR.Max;
6090 return this;
6091 }
6092 public string GetString()
6093 {
6094 string s = "";
6095 s += "ImageJ=" + ImageJ + "\n";
6096 s += "images=" + images + "\n";
6097 s += "channels=" + channels.ToString() + "\n";
6098 s += "slices=" + slices.ToString() + "\n";
6099 s += "frames=" + frames.ToString() + "\n";
6100 s += "hyperstack=" + hyperstack.ToString() + "\n";
6101 s += "mode=" + mode.ToString() + "\n";
6102 s += "unit=" + unit.ToString() + "\n";
6103 s += "finterval=" + finterval.ToString() + "\n";
6104 s += "spacing=" + spacing.ToString() + "\n";
6105 s += "loop=" + loop.ToString() + "\n";
6106 s += "min=" + min.ToString() + "\n";
6107 s += "max=" + max.ToString() + "\n";
6108 return s;
6109 }
6110 public void SetString(string desc)
6111 {
6112 string[] lines = desc.Split(new string[] { "\r\n", "\r", "\n" }, StringSplitOptions.None);
6113 int maxlen = 20;
6114 for (int i = 0; i < lines.Length; i++)
6115 {
6116 if (i < maxlen)
6117 {
6118 string[] sp = lines[i].Split('=');
6119 if (sp[0] == "ImageJ")
6120 ImageJ = sp[1];
6121 if (sp[0] == "images")
6122 images = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
6123 if (sp[0] == "channels")
6124 channels = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
6125 if (sp[0] == "slices")
6126 slices = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
6127 if (sp[0] == "frames")
6128 frames = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
6129 if (sp[0] == "hyperstack")
6130 hyperstack = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
6131 if (sp[0] == "mode")
6132 mode = sp[1];
6133 if (sp[0] == "unit")
6134 unit = sp[1];
6135 if (sp[0] == "finterval")
6136 finterval = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
6137 if (sp[0] == "spacing")
6138 spacing = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
6139 if (sp[0] == "loop")
6140 loop = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
6141 if (sp[0] == "min")
6142 min = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
6143 if (sp[0] == "max")
6144 max = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
6145 if (sp[0] == "8bitcolor")
6146 bit8color = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
6147 }
6148 else
6149 return;
6150 }
6151
6152 }
6153 }
6154 public int SizeX
6155 {
6156 get
6157 {
6158 if (Buffers.Count > 0)
6159 return Buffers[0].SizeX;
6160 else return 0;
6161 }
6162 }
6163 public int SizeY
6164 {
6165 get
6166 {
6167 if (Buffers.Count > 0)
6168 return Buffers[0].SizeY;
6169 else return 0;
6170 }
6171 }
6172 public int SizeZ
6173 {
6174 get { return sizeZ; }
6175 }
6176 public int SizeC
6177 {
6178 get { return sizeC; }
6179 }
6180 public int SizeT
6181 {
6182 get { return sizeT; }
6183 }
6184 public IntRange RRange
6185 {
6186 get
6187 {
6188 return RChannel.RangeR;
6189 }
6190 }
6191 public IntRange GRange
6192 {
6193 get
6194 {
6195 return GChannel.RangeG;
6196 }
6197 }
6198 public IntRange BRange
6199 {
6200 get
6201 {
6202 return BChannel.RangeB;
6203 }
6204 }
6205 public BufferInfo SelectedBuffer
6206 {
6207 get
6208 {
6209 return Buffers[Coords[Coordinate.Z, Coordinate.C, Coordinate.T]];
6210 }
6211 }
6212 public Stopwatch watch = new Stopwatch();
6213 public bool isRGB
6214 {
6215 get
6216 {
6217 if (RGBChannelCount == 3 || RGBChannelCount == 4)
6218 return true;
6219 else
6220 return false;
6221 }
6222 }
6223 public bool isTime
6224 {
6225 get
6226 {
6227 if (SizeT > 1)
6228 return true;
6229 else
6230 return false;
6231 }
6232 }
6233 public bool isSeries
6234 {
6235 get
6236 {
6237 if (seriesCount > 1)
6238 return true;
6239 else
6240 return false;
6241 }
6242 }
6243 public bool isPyramidal
6244 {
6245 get
6246 {
6247 if (Type == ImageType.pyramidal)
6248 return true;
6249 else
6250 return false;
6251 }
6252 }
6253 public string file;
6254 public static bool Initialized
6255 {
6256 get
6257 {
6258 return initialized;
6259 }
6260 }
6261
6265 public void To8Bit()
6266 {
6267 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
6268 To24Bit();
6269 PixelFormat px = Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
6270 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
6271 return;
6272 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
6273 {
6274 To24Bit();
6275 List<BufferInfo> bfs = new List<BufferInfo>();
6276 int index = 0;
6277 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6278 {
6279 Bitmap[] bs = BufferInfo.RGB24To8((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
6280 BufferInfo br = new BufferInfo(ID, bs[2], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
6281 BufferInfo bg = new BufferInfo(ID, bs[1], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
6282 BufferInfo bb = new BufferInfo(ID, bs[0], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
6283 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
6284 {
6285 bs[b].Dispose();
6286 }
6287 bs = null;
6288 GC.Collect();
6289 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
6290 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
6291 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
6292 bfs.Add(br);
6293 bfs.Add(bg);
6294 bfs.Add(bb);
6295 index += 3;
6296 }
6297 Buffers = bfs;
6298 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
6299 }
6300 else if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
6301 {
6302 List<BufferInfo> bfs = new List<BufferInfo>();
6303 int index = 0;
6304 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6305 {
6306 Bitmap[] bs = BufferInfo.RGB24To8((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
6307 BufferInfo br = new BufferInfo(ID, bs[2], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
6308 BufferInfo bg = new BufferInfo(ID, bs[1], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
6309 BufferInfo bb = new BufferInfo(ID, bs[0], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
6310 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
6311 {
6312 bs[b].Dispose();
6313 bs[b] = null;
6314 }
6315 bs = null;
6316 GC.Collect();
6317 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
6318 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
6319 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
6320 bfs.Add(br);
6321 bfs.Add(bg);
6322 bfs.Add(bb);
6323 index += 3;
6324 }
6325 Buffers = bfs;
6326 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
6327 }
6328 else
6329 {
6330 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6331 {
6332 Bitmap b = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
6333 Buffers[i].Image = b;
6334 b.Dispose();
6335 b = null;
6336 GC.Collect();
6337 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
6338 }
6339 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
6340 {
6341 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 8;
6342 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
6343 {
6344 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
6345 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
6346 }
6347 }
6348
6349 }
6350 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
6351 do
6352 {
6353 Thread.Sleep(100);
6354 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6355 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
6356 AutoThreshold(this, false);
6357 bitsPerPixel = 8;
6358 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Table.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To8Bit();");
6359 }
6363 public void To16Bit()
6364 {
6365 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
6366 To24Bit();
6367 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
6368 return;
6369 bitsPerPixel = 16;
6370 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
6371 {
6372 List<BufferInfo> bfs = new List<BufferInfo>();
6373 int index = 0;
6374 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6375 {
6376 Array.Reverse(Buffers[i].Bytes);
6377 BufferInfo[] bs = BufferInfo.RGB48To16(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].Stride, Buffers[i].Bytes, Buffers[i].Coordinate, index, Buffers[i].Plane);
6378 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bs[0]);
6379 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bs[1]);
6380 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bs[2]);
6381 bfs.AddRange(bs);
6382 index += 3;
6383 }
6384 Buffers = bfs;
6385 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, SizeC * 3, SizeT);
6386 if (Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel == 3)
6387 {
6388 Channel c = Channels[0].Copy();
6389 c.SamplesPerPixel = 1;
6390 c.range = new IntRange[1];
6391 Channels.Clear();
6392 Channels.Add(c);
6393 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
6394 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
6395 Channels[1].Index = 1;
6396 Channels[2].Index = 2;
6397 }
6398 }
6399 else if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
6400 {
6401 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6402 {
6403 Bitmap b = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
6404 Buffers[i].Image = b;
6405 b.Dispose();
6406 b = null;
6407 GC.Collect();
6408 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
6409 }
6410 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
6411 {
6412 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
6413 {
6414 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
6415 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
6416 }
6417 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
6418 }
6419 }
6420 else if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
6421 {
6422 List<BufferInfo> bfs = new List<BufferInfo>();
6423 int index = 0;
6424 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6425 {
6426 Bitmap[] bs = BufferInfo.RGB24To8((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
6427 BufferInfo br = new BufferInfo(ID, bs[2], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
6428 BufferInfo bg = new BufferInfo(ID, bs[1], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
6429 BufferInfo bb = new BufferInfo(ID, bs[0], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
6430 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
6431 {
6432 bs[b].Dispose();
6433 bs[b] = null;
6434 }
6435 bs = null;
6436 GC.Collect();
6437 br.To16Bit();
6438 bg.To16Bit();
6439 bb.To16Bit();
6440 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
6441 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
6442 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
6443 bfs.Add(br);
6444 bfs.Add(bg);
6445 bfs.Add(bb);
6446 index += 3;
6447 }
6448 Buffers = bfs;
6449 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
6450 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
6451 {
6452 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
6453 {
6454 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
6455 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
6456 }
6457 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
6458 }
6459 }
6460 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
6461 do
6462 {
6463 Thread.Sleep(100);
6464 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6465 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
6466 AutoThreshold(this, false);
6467 StackThreshold(true);
6468 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Table.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To16Bit();");
6469 }
6473 public void To24Bit()
6474 {
6475 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
6476 return;
6477 bitsPerPixel = 8;
6478 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb)
6479 {
6480 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6481 {
6482 Bitmap b = BufferInfo.To24Bit((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
6483 Buffers[i].Image = b;
6484 b.Dispose();
6485 b = null;
6486 GC.Collect();
6487 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
6488 }
6489 if (Channels.Count == 4)
6490 {
6491 Channels.RemoveAt(0);
6492 }
6493 else
6494 {
6495 Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel = 3;
6496 }
6497 }
6498 else
6499 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
6500 {
6501 //We run 8bit so we get 24 bit rgb.
6502 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6503 {
6504 Bitmap b = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
6505 Buffers[i].Image = b;
6506 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
6507 }
6508 if (Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel == 3)
6509 {
6510 Channel c = Channels[0].Copy();
6511 c.SamplesPerPixel = 1;
6512 c.range = new IntRange[1];
6513 Channels.Clear();
6514 Channels.Add(c);
6515 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
6516 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
6517 Channels[1].Index = 1;
6518 Channels[2].Index = 2;
6519 }
6520 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
6521 {
6522 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
6523 {
6524 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
6525 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
6526 }
6527 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 8;
6528 }
6529 }
6530 else
6531 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
6532 {
6533 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
6534 {
6535 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6536 {
6537 Bitmap b = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
6538 Buffers[i].Image = b;
6539 b.Dispose();
6540 b = null;
6541 GC.Collect();
6542 }
6543 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
6544 {
6545 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
6546 {
6547 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
6548 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
6549 }
6550 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 8;
6551 }
6552 }
6553 List<BufferInfo> bfs = new List<BufferInfo>();
6554 if (Buffers.Count % 3 != 0 && Buffers.Count % 2 != 0)
6555 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6556 {
6557 BufferInfo bs = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
6558 BufferInfo bbs = BufferInfo.RGB16To48(bs);
6559 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbs);
6560 bs.Dispose();
6561 bs = null;
6562 bfs.Add(bbs);
6563 }
6564 else
6565 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += Channels.Count)
6566 {
6567 BufferInfo[] bs = new BufferInfo[3];
