6568 bs[0] = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
6569 bs[1] = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 1].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 1].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.T), i + 1, Buffers[i + 1].Plane);
6570 if (Channels.Count > 2)
6571 bs[2] = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 2].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 2].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.T), i + 2, Buffers[i + 2].Plane);
6572 BufferInfo bbs = BufferInfo.RGB8To24(bs);
6573 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
6574 {
6575 if (bs[b] != null)
6576 bs[b].Dispose();
6577 bs[b] = null;
6578 }
6579 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbs);
6580 bfs.Add(bbs);
6581 }
6582 Buffers = bfs;
6583 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
6584 }
6585 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
6586 do
6587 {
6588 Thread.Sleep(100);
6589 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6590 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
6591 AutoThreshold(this, false);
6592 //StackThreshold(false);
6593 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Table.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To24Bit();");
6594 }
6598 public void To32Bit()
6599 {
6600 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
6601 return;
6602 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat != PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
6603 {
6604 To24Bit();
6605 }
6606 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6607 {
6608 Bitmap b = BufferInfo.To32Bit((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
6609 Buffers[i].Image = b;
6610 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
6611 b.Dispose();
6612 b = null;
6613 }
6614 GC.Collect();
6615 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
6616 do
6617 {
6618 Thread.Sleep(50);
6619 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6620 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
6621 AutoThreshold(this, false);
6622 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Table.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To32Bit();");
6623 }
6627 public void To48Bit()
6628 {
6629 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
6630 To24Bit();
6631 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
6632 return;
6633 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
6634 {
6635 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
6636 {
6637 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6638 {
6639 Bitmap b = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
6640 Buffers[i].Image = b;
6641 b.Dispose();
6642 b = null;
6643 }
6644 }
6645 GC.Collect();
6646 List<BufferInfo> bfs = new List<BufferInfo>();
6647 if (Buffers.Count % 3 != 0 && Buffers.Count % 2 != 0)
6648 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6649 {
6650 BufferInfo bs = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
6651 BufferInfo bbs = BufferInfo.RGB16To48(bs);
6652 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbs);
6653 bs.Dispose();
6654 bs = null;
6655 bfs.Add(bbs);
6656 }
6657 else
6658 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += Channels.Count)
6659 {
6660 BufferInfo[] bs = new BufferInfo[3];
6661 if (Channels.Count > 2)
6662 {
6663 bs[2] = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
6664 bs[1] = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 1].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 1].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.T), i + 1, Buffers[i + 1].Plane);
6665 bs[0] = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 2].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 2].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.T), i + 2, Buffers[i + 2].Plane);
6666 }
6667 else
6668 {
6669 bs[0] = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
6670 bs[1] = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 1].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 1].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.T), i + 1, Buffers[i + 1].Plane);
6671 }
6672 BufferInfo bbs = BufferInfo.RGB16To48(bs);
6673 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
6674 {
6675 if (bs[b] != null)
6676 bs[b].Dispose();
6677 bs[b] = null;
6678 }
6679 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbs);
6680 bfs.Add(bbs);
6681 }
6682 GC.Collect();
6683 Buffers = bfs;
6684 int index = 0;
6685 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
6686
6687 }
6688 else
6689 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
6690 {
6691 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6692 {
6693 Bitmap b = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
6694 Buffers[i].Image = b;
6695 b.Dispose();
6696 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
6697 }
6698 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
6699 {
6700 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
6701 {
6702 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
6703 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
6704 }
6705 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
6706 }
6707 }
6708 else
6709 {
6710 int index = 0;
6711 List<BufferInfo> buffers = new List<BufferInfo>();
6712 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += 3)
6713 {
6714 BufferInfo[] bf = new BufferInfo[3];
6715 bf[0] = Buffers[i];
6716 bf[1] = Buffers[i + 1];
6717 bf[2] = Buffers[i + 2];
6718 BufferInfo inf = BufferInfo.RGB16To48(bf);
6719 buffers.Add(inf);
6720 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
6721 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
6722 {
6723 bf[b].Dispose();
6724 }
6725 index++;
6726 }
6727 Buffers = buffers;
6728 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
6729 }
6730 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
6731 do
6732 {
6733 Thread.Sleep(50);
6734 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6735 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
6736 bitsPerPixel = 16;
6737 AutoThreshold(this, false);
6738 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Table.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To48Bit();");
6739 }
6743 public void RotateFlip(RotateFlipType rot)
6744 {
6745 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6746 {
6747 Buffers[i].RotateFlip(rot);
6748 }
6749 }
6758 public void Bake(int rmin, int rmax, int gmin, int gmax, int bmin, int bmax)
6759 {
6760 Bake(new IntRange(rmin, rmax), new IntRange(gmin, gmax), new IntRange(bmin, bmax));
6761 }
6768 public void Bake(IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
6769 {
6770 BioImage bm = new BioImage(Images.GetImageName(ID));
6771 bm = CopyInfo(this, true, true);
6772 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6773 {
6774 ZCT co = Buffers[i].Coordinate;
6775 Bitmap b = GetFiltered(i, rf, gf, bf);
6776 BufferInfo inf = new BufferInfo(bm.ID, b, co, i);
6777 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
6778 bm.Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = i;
6779 bm.Buffers.Add(inf);
6780 }
6781 foreach (Channel item in bm.Channels)
6782 {
6783 for (int i = 0; i < item.range.Length; i++)
6784 {
6785 item.range[i].Min = 0;
6786 if (bm.bitsPerPixel > 8)
6787 item.range[i].Max = ushort.MaxValue;
6788 else
6789 item.range[i].Max = 255;
6790 }
6791 }
6792 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
6793 do
6794 {
6795 Thread.Sleep(50);
6796 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6797 AutoThreshold(bm, false);
6798 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
6799 Images.AddImage(bm, false);
6800 App.tabsView.AddTab(bm);
6801 Recorder.AddLine("ImageView.SelectedImage.Bake(" + rf.Min + "," + rf.Max + "," + gf.Min + "," + gf.Max + "," + bf.Min + "," + bf.Max + ");");
6802 }
6803
6804 static bool vips = false;
6805 public static void OpenVips(BioImage b, int pagecount)
6806 {
6807 try
6808 {
6809 for (int i = 0; i < pagecount; i++)
6810 {
6811 b.vipPages.Add(NetVips.Image.Tiffload(b.file, i));
6812 }
6813 }
6814 catch (Exception e)
6815 {
6816 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
6817 }
6818
6819 }
6820 public static void OpenVip(BioImage b, int pagenumber, int x, int y, int w, int h)
6821 {
6822 try
6823 {
6824 NetVips.Image im = NetVips.Image.Tiffload(b.file, pagenumber);
6825 b.vipPages.Add(im);
6826 BufferInfo bf = GetTile(b, new ZCT(0, 0, 0), pagenumber, x, y, w, h);
6827 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
6828 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
6829 }
6830 catch (Exception e)
6831 {
6832 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
6833 }
6834
6835 }
6836 public void UpdateCoords()
6837 {
6838 int z = 0;
6839 int c = 0;
6840 int t = 0;
6841 Coords = new int[SizeZ, SizeC, SizeT];
6842 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
6843 {
6844 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
6845 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
6846 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
6847 if (c < SizeC - 1)
6848 c++;
6849 else
6850 {
6851 c = 0;
6852 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
6853 z++;
6854 else
6855 {
6856 z = 0;
6857 if (t < SizeT - 1)
6858 t++;
6859 else
6860 t = 0;
6861 }
6862 }
6863 }
6864 }
6871 public void UpdateCoords(int sz, int sc, int st)
6872 {
6873 int z = 0;
6874 int c = 0;
6875 int t = 0;
6876 sizeZ = sz;
6877 sizeC = sc;
6878 sizeT = st;
6879 Coords = new int[sz, sc, st];
6880 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
6881 {
6882 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
6883 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
6884 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
6885 if (c < SizeC - 1)
6886 c++;
6887 else
6888 {
6889 c = 0;
6890 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
6891 z++;
6892 else
6893 {
6894 z = 0;
6895 if (t < SizeT - 1)
6896 t++;
6897 else
6898 t = 0;
6899 }
6900 }
6901 }
6902 }
6909 public void UpdateCoords(int sz, int sc, int st, string order)
6910 {
6911 int z = 0;
6912 int c = 0;
6913 int t = 0;
6914 sizeZ = sz;
6915 sizeC = sc;
6916 sizeT = st;
6917 Coords = new int[sz, sc, st];
6918 if (order == "XYCZT")
6919 {
6920 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
6921 {
6922 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
6923 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
6924 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
6925 if (c < SizeC - 1)
6926 c++;
6927 else
6928 {
6929 c = 0;
6930 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
6931 z++;
6932 else
6933 {
6934 z = 0;
6935 if (t < SizeT - 1)
6936 t++;
6937 else
6938 t = 0;
6939 }
6940 }
6941 }
6942 }
6943 else if (order == "XYZCT")
6944 {
6945 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
6946 {
6947 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
6948 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
6949 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
6950 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
6951 z++;
6952 else
6953 {
6954 z = 0;
6955 if (c < SizeC - 1)
6956 c++;
6957 else
6958 {
6959 c = 0;
6960 if (t < SizeT - 1)
6961 t++;
6962 else
6963 t = 0;
6964 }
6965 }
6966 }
6967 }
6968 }
6969
6975 public double ToImageSizeX(double d)
6976 {
6977 if (isPyramidal)
6978 return d;
6979 else
6980 return d / Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeX;
6981 }
6987 public double ToImageSizeY(double d)
6988 {
6989 if (isPyramidal)
6990 return d;
6991 else
6992 return d / Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeY;
6993 }
6999 public double ToImageSpaceX(double x)
7000 {
7001 if (isPyramidal)
7002 return x;
7003 else
7004 return (float)((x - StageSizeX) / Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeX);
7005 }
7011 public double ToImageSpaceY(double y)
7012 {
7013 if (isPyramidal)
7014 return y;
7015 else
7016 return (float)((y - StageSizeY) / Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeY);
7017 }
7024 public PointD ToImageSpace(PointD p)
7025 {
7026 return new PointD((float)ToImageSpaceX(p.X), (float)ToImageSpaceY(p.Y));
7027 }
7028
7034 public PointD[] ToImageSpace(List<PointD> p)
7035 {
7036 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Count];
7037 for (int i = 0; i < p.Count; i++)
7038 {
7039 ps[i] = ToImageSpace(p[i]);
7040 }
7041 return ps;
7042 }
7049 public PointF[] ToImageSpace(PointF[] p)
7050 {
7051 PointF[] ps = new PointF[p.Length];
7052 for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
7053 {
7054 PointF pp = new PointF();
7055 ps[i] = ToImageSpace(new PointD(p[i].X, p[i].Y)).ToPointF();
7056 }
7057 return ps;
7058 }
7064 public System.Drawing.RectangleF ToImageSpace(RectangleD p)
7065 {
7066 System.Drawing.RectangleF r = new RectangleF();
7067 System.Drawing.Point pp = new System.Drawing.Point();
7068 r.X = (int)((p.X - StageSizeX) / Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeX);
7069 r.Y = (int)((p.Y - StageSizeY) / Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeY);
7070 r.Width = (int)(p.W / Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeX);
7071 r.Height = (int)(p.H / Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeY);
7072 return r;
7073 }
7079 public PointD ToStageSpace(PointD p)
7080 {
7081 PointD pp = new PointD();
7082 pp.X = ((p.X * Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
7083 pp.Y = ((p.Y * Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
7084 return pp;
7085 }
7096 public static PointD ToStageSpace(PointD p, double physicalSizeX, double physicalSizeY, double volumeX, double volumeY)
7097 {
7098 PointD pp = new PointD();
7099 pp.X = ((p.X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
7100 pp.Y = ((p.Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
7101 return pp;
7102 }
7109 public RectangleD ToStageSpace(RectangleD p)
7110 {
7111 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
7112 r.X = ((p.X * PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
7113 r.Y = ((p.Y * PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
7114 r.W = (p.W * Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeX);
7115 r.H = (p.H * Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeY);
7116 return r;
7117 }
7128 public static RectangleD ToStageSpace(RectangleD p, double physicalSizeX, double physicalSizeY, double volumeX, double volumeY)
7129 {
7130 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
7131 r.X = ((p.X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
7132 r.Y = ((p.Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
7133 r.W = (p.W * physicalSizeX);
7134 r.H = (p.H * physicalSizeY);
7135 return r;
7136 }
7143 public PointD[] ToStageSpace(PointD[] p)
7144 {
7145 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Length];
7146 for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
7147 {
7148 PointD pp = new PointD();
7149 pp.X = ((p[i].X * PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
7150 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y * PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
7151 ps[i] = pp;
7152 }
7153 return ps;
7154 }
7166 public static PointD[] ToStageSpace(PointD[] p, double physicalSizeX, double physicalSizeY, double volumeX, double volumeY)
7167 {
7168 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Length];
7169 for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
7170 {
7171 PointD pp = new PointD();
7172 pp.X = ((p[i].X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
7173 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
7174 ps[i] = pp;
7175 }
7176 return ps;
7177 }
7184 public PointD ToStageSpace(PointD p, int resolution)
7185 {
7186 PointD pp = new PointD();
7187 pp.X = ((p.X * Resolutions[resolution].PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
7188 pp.Y = ((p.Y * Resolutions[resolution].PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
7189 return pp;
7190 }
7191 public BioImage(string file)
7192 {
7193 id = file;
7194 filename = Images.GetImageName(id);
7195 Coordinate = new ZCT();
7196 rgbChannels[0] = 0;
7197 rgbChannels[1] = 0;
7198 rgbChannels[2] = 0;
7199 }
7213 public static BioImage Substack(BioImage orig, int ser, int zs, int ze, int cs, int ce, int ts, int te)
7214 {
7215 BioImage b = CopyInfo(orig, false, false);
7216 b.ID = Images.GetImageName(orig.ID);
7217 int i = 0;
7218 b.Coords = new int[ze - zs, ce - cs, te - ts];
7219 b.sizeZ = ze - zs;
7220 b.sizeC = ce - cs;
7221 b.sizeT = te - ts;
7222 for (int ti = 0; ti < b.SizeT; ti++)
7223 {
7224 for (int zi = 0; zi < b.SizeZ; zi++)
7225 {
7226 for (int ci = 0; ci < b.SizeC; ci++)
7227 {
7228 int ind = orig.Coords[zs + zi, cs + ci, ts + ti];
7229 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(Images.GetImageName(orig.id), orig.SizeX, orig.SizeY, orig.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, orig.Buffers[ind].Bytes, new ZCT(zi, ci, ti), i);
7230 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
7231 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
7232 b.Coords[zi, ci, ti] = i;
7233 i++;
7234 }
7235 }
7236 }
7237 for (int ci = cs; ci < ce; ci++)
7238 {
7239 b.Channels.Add(orig.Channels[ci]);
7240 }
7241 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
7242 do
7243 {
7244 Thread.Sleep(100);
7245 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
7246 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
7247 AutoThreshold(b, false);
7248 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
7249 b.StackThreshold(true);
7250 else
7251 b.StackThreshold(false);
7252 Images.AddImage(b, false);
7253 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.Substack(" + '"' + orig.Filename + '"' + "," + ser + "," + zs + "," + ze + "," + cs + "," + ce + "," + ts + "," + te + ");");
7254 return b;
7255 }
7262 public static BioImage MergeChannels(BioImage b2, BioImage b)
7263 {
7264 BioImage res = new BioImage(b2.ID);
7265 res.ID = Images.GetImageName(b2.ID);
7266 res.series = b2.series;
7267 res.sizeZ = b2.SizeZ;
7268 int cOrig = b2.SizeC;
7269 res.sizeC = b2.SizeC + b.SizeC;
7270 res.sizeT = b2.SizeT;
7271 res.bitsPerPixel = b2.bitsPerPixel;
7272 res.imageInfo = b2.imageInfo;
7273 res.littleEndian = b2.littleEndian;
7274 res.seriesCount = b2.seriesCount;
7275 res.imagesPerSeries = res.ImageCount / res.seriesCount;
7276 res.Coords = new int[res.SizeZ, res.SizeC, res.SizeT];
7277
7278 int i = 0;
7279 int cc = 0;
7280 for (int ti = 0; ti < res.SizeT; ti++)
7281 {
7282 for (int zi = 0; zi < res.SizeZ; zi++)
7283 {
7284 for (int ci = 0; ci < res.SizeC; ci++)
7285 {
7286 ZCT co = new ZCT(zi, ci, ti);
7287 if (ci < cOrig)
7288 {
7289 //If this channel is part of the image b1 we add planes from it.
7290 BufferInfo copy = new BufferInfo(b2.id, b2.SizeX, b2.SizeY, b2.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b2.Buffers[i].Bytes, co, i);
7291 if (b2.littleEndian)
7292 copy.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
7293 res.Coords[zi, ci, ti] = i;
7294 res.Buffers.Add(b2.Buffers[i]);
7295 res.Buffers.Add(copy);
7296 //Lets copy the ROI's from the original image.
7297 List<ROI> anns = b2.GetAnnotations(zi, ci, ti);
7298 if (anns.Count > 0)
7299 res.Annotations.AddRange(anns);
7300 }
7301 else
7302 {
7303 //This plane is not part of b1 so we add the planes from b2 channels.
7304 BufferInfo copy = new BufferInfo(b.id, b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.Buffers[i].Bytes, co, i);
7305 if (b2.littleEndian)
7306 copy.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
7307 res.Coords[zi, ci, ti] = i;
7308 res.Buffers.Add(b.Buffers[i]);
7309 res.Buffers.Add(copy);
7310
7311 //Lets copy the ROI's from the original image.
7312 List<ROI> anns = b.GetAnnotations(zi, cc, ti);
7313 if (anns.Count > 0)
7314 res.Annotations.AddRange(anns);
7315 }
7316 i++;
7317 }
7318 }
7319 }
7320 for (int ci = 0; ci < res.SizeC; ci++)
7321 {
7322 if (ci < cOrig)
7323 {
7324 res.Channels.Add(b2.Channels[ci].Copy());
7325 }
7326 else
7327 {
7328 res.Channels.Add(b.Channels[cc].Copy());
7329 res.Channels[cOrig + cc].Index = ci;
7330 cc++;
7331 }
7332 }
7333 Images.AddImage(res, false);
7334 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
7335 do
7336 {
7337 Thread.Sleep(100);
7338 } while (res.Buffers[res.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
7339 AutoThreshold(res, false);
7340 if (res.bitsPerPixel > 8)
7341 res.StackThreshold(true);
7342 else
7343 res.StackThreshold(false);
7344 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.MergeChannels(" + '"' + b.ID + '"' + "," + '"' + b2.ID + '"' + ");");
7345 return res;
7346 }
7353 public static BioImage MergeChannels(string bname, string b2name)
7354 {
7355 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(bname);
7356 BioImage b2 = Images.GetImage(b2name);
7357 return MergeChannels(b, b2);
7358 }
7364 public static BioImage MergeZ(BioImage b)
7365 {
7366 BioImage bi = BioImage.CopyInfo(b, true, true);
7367 int ind = 0;
7368 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
7369 {
7370 for (int t = 0; t < b.sizeT; t++)
7371 {
7372 Merge m = new Merge((Bitmap)b.Buffers[b.Coords[0, c, t]].Image);
7373 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat);
7374 for (int i = 1; i < b.sizeZ; i++)
7375 {
7376 m.OverlayImage = bm;
7377 bm = m.Apply((Bitmap)b.Buffers[b.Coords[i, c, t]].Image);
7378 }
7379 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(b.file, bm, new ZCT(0, c, t), ind);
7380 bi.Buffers.Add(bf);
7381 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
7382 ind++;
7383 }
7384 }
7385 Images.AddImage(bi, false);
7386 bi.UpdateCoords(1, b.SizeC, b.SizeT);
7387 bi.Coordinate = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
7388 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
7389 do
7390 {
7391 Thread.Sleep(100);
7392 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
7393 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
7394 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
7395 if (bi.bitsPerPixel > 8)
7396 bi.StackThreshold(true);
7397 else
7398 bi.StackThreshold(false);
7399 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.MergeZ(" + '"' + b.ID + '"' + ");");
7400 return bi;
7401 }
7407 public static BioImage MergeT(BioImage b)
7408 {
7409 BioImage bi = BioImage.CopyInfo(b, true, true);
7410 int ind = 0;
7411 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
7412 {
7413 for (int z = 0; z < b.sizeZ; z++)
7414 {
7415 Merge m = new Merge((Bitmap)b.Buffers[b.Coords[z, c, 0]].Image);
7416 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat);
7417 for (int i = 1; i < b.sizeT; i++)
7418 {
7419 m.OverlayImage = bm;
7420 bm = m.Apply((Bitmap)b.Buffers[b.Coords[z, c, i]].Image);
7421 }
7422 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(b.file, bm, new ZCT(z, c, 0), ind);
7423 bi.Buffers.Add(bf);
7424 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
7425 ind++;
7426 }
7427 }
7428 Images.AddImage(bi, false);
7429 bi.UpdateCoords(1, b.SizeC, b.SizeT);
7430 bi.Coordinate = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
7431 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
7432 do
7433 {
7434 Thread.Sleep(100);
7435 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
7436 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
7437 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
7438 if (bi.bitsPerPixel > 8)
7439 bi.StackThreshold(true);
7440 else
7441 bi.StackThreshold(false);
7442 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.MergeT(" + '"' + b.ID + '"' + ");");
7443 return bi;
7444 }
7448 public BioImage[] SplitChannels()
7449 {
7450 BioImage[] bms;
7451 if (isRGB)
7452 {
7453 bms = new BioImage[3];
7454 BioImage ri = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-1" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
7455 BioImage gi = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-2" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
7456 BioImage bi = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-3" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
7457
7458 ri.sizeC = 1;
7459 gi.sizeC = 1;
7460 bi.sizeC = 1;
7461 ri.sizeZ = SizeZ;
7462 gi.sizeZ = SizeZ;
7463 bi.sizeZ = SizeZ;
7464 ri.sizeT = SizeT;
7465 gi.sizeT = SizeT;
7466 bi.sizeT = SizeT;
7467
7468 ri.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
7469 gi.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
7470 bi.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
7471 int ind = 0;
7472 for (int i = 0; i < ImageCount; i++)
7473 {
7474 if (Buffers[i].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
7475 {
7476 //For 48bit images we need to use our own function as AForge won't give us a proper image.
7477 BufferInfo[] bfs = BufferInfo.RGB48To16(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].Stride, Buffers[i].Bytes, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind, Buffers[i].Plane);
7478 ind += 3;
7479 ri.Buffers.Add(bfs[0]);
7480 gi.Buffers.Add(bfs[1]);
7481 bi.Buffers.Add(bfs[2]);
7482 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[0]);
7483 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[1]);
7484 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[2]);
7485 ri.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
7486 gi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
7487 bi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
7488 }
7489 else
7490 {
7491
7492 Bitmap rImage = extractR.Apply((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
7493 BufferInfo rbf = new BufferInfo(ri.ID, rImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
7494 Statistics.CalcStatistics(rbf);
7495 ri.Buffers.Add(rbf);
7496 ri.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
7497
7498 Bitmap gImage = extractG.Apply((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
7499 BufferInfo gbf = new BufferInfo(gi.ID, gImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
7500 Statistics.CalcStatistics(gbf);
7501 gi.Buffers.Add(gbf);
7502 gi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
7503
7504 Bitmap bImage = extractB.Apply((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
7505 //Clipboard.SetImage(bImage);
7506 BufferInfo bbf = new BufferInfo(bi.ID, bImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
7507 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbf);
7508 bi.Buffers.Add(bbf);
7509 bi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
7510
7511 }
7512 }
7513 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
7514 do
7515 {
7516 Thread.Sleep(100);
7517 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
7518
7519 ri.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
7520 gi.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
7521 bi.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
7522 AutoThreshold(ri, false);
7523 AutoThreshold(gi, false);
7524 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
7525 Images.AddImage(ri, true);
7526 Images.AddImage(gi, true);
7527 Images.AddImage(bi, true);
7528 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
7529 bms[0] = ri;
7530 bms[1] = gi;
7531 bms[2] = bi;
7532 }
7533 else
7534 {
7535 bms = new BioImage[SizeC];
7536 for (int c = 0; c < SizeC; c++)
7537 {
7538 BioImage b = BioImage.Substack(this, 0, 0, SizeZ, c, c + 1, 0, SizeT);
7539 bms[c] = b;
7540 }
7541 }
7542
7543 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
7544 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.SplitChannels(" + '"' + Filename + '"' + ");");
7545 return bms;
7546 }
7552 public static BioImage[] SplitChannels(BioImage bb)
7553 {
7554 return bb.SplitChannels();
7555 }
7561 public static BioImage[] SplitChannels(string name)
7562 {
7563 return SplitChannels(Images.GetImage(name));
7564 }
7565
7566 public static LevelsLinear filter8 = new LevelsLinear();
7567 public static LevelsLinear16bpp filter16 = new LevelsLinear16bpp();
7568 private static ExtractChannel extractR = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.R);
7569 private static ExtractChannel extractG = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.G);
7570 private static ExtractChannel extractB = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.B);
7571
7579 public Image GetImageByCoord(int z, int c, int t)
7580 {
7581 return Buffers[Coords[z, c, t]].ImageRGB;
7582 }
7590 public Bitmap GetBitmap(int z, int c, int t)
7591 {
7592 return (Bitmap)Buffers[Coords[z, c, t]].Image;
7593 }
7599 public int GetIndex(int ix, int iy)
7600 {
7601 if (ix > SizeX || iy > SizeY || ix < 0 || iy < 0)
7602 return 0;
7603 int stridex = SizeX;
7604 int x = ix;
7605 int y = iy;
7606 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
7607 {
7608 return (y * stridex + x) * 2;
7609 }
7610 else
7611 {
7612 return (y * stridex + x);
7613 }
7614 }
7621 public int GetIndexRGB(int ix, int iy, int index)
7622 {
7623 int stridex = SizeX;
7624 //For 16bit (2*8bit) images we multiply buffer index by 2
7625 int x = ix;
7626 int y = iy;
7627 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
7628 {
7629 return (y * stridex + x) * 2 * index;
7630 }
7631 else
7632 {
7633 return (y * stridex + x) * index;
7634 }
7635 }
7641 public ushort GetValue(ZCTXY coord)
7642 {
7643 if (coord.X < 0 || coord.Y < 0 || coord.X > SizeX || coord.Y > SizeY)
7644 {
7645 return 0;
7646 }
7647 if (isRGB)
7648 {
7649 if (coord.C == 0)
7650 return GetValueRGB(coord, 0);
7651 else if (coord.C == 1)
7652 return GetValueRGB(coord, 1);
7653 else if (coord.C == 2)
7654 return GetValueRGB(coord, 2);
7655 }
7656 else
7657 return GetValueRGB(coord, 0);
7658 return 0;
7659 }
7666 public ushort GetValueRGB(ZCTXY coord, int index)
7667 {
7668 int ind = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
7669 ColorS c = Buffers[ind].GetPixel(coord.X, coord.Y);
7670 if (index == 0)
7671 return c.R;
7672 else
7673 if (index == 1)
7674 return c.G;
7675 else
7676 if (index == 2)
7677 return c.B;
7678 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException();
7679 }
7687 public ushort GetValue(ZCT coord, int x, int y)
7688 {
7689 return GetValueRGB(new ZCTXY(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T, x, y), 0);
7690 }
7700 public ushort GetValue(int z, int c, int t, int x, int y)
7701 {
7702 return GetValue(new ZCTXY(z, c, t, x, y));
7703 }
7712 public ushort GetValueRGB(ZCT coord, int x, int y, int RGBindex)
7713 {
7714 ZCTXY c = new ZCTXY(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T, x, y);
7715 if (isRGB)
7716 {
7717 return GetValueRGB(c, RGBindex);
7718 }
7719 else
7720 return GetValue(coord, x, y);
7721 }
7732 public ushort GetValueRGB(int z, int c, int t, int x, int y, int RGBindex)
7733 {
7734 return GetValueRGB(new ZCT(z, c, t), x, y, RGBindex);
7735 }
7740 public void SetValue(ZCTXY coord, ushort value)
7741 {
7742 int i = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
7743 Buffers[i].SetValue(coord.X, coord.Y, value);
7744 }
7751 public void SetValue(int x, int y, int ind, ushort value)
7752 {
7753 Buffers[ind].SetValue(x, y, value);
7754 }
7761 public void SetValue(int x, int y, ZCT coord, ushort value)
7762 {
7763 SetValue(x, y, Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T], value);
7764 }
7770 public void SetValueRGB(ZCTXY coord, int RGBindex, ushort value)
7771 {
7772 int ind = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
7773 Buffers[ind].SetValueRGB(coord.X, coord.Y, RGBindex, value);
7774 }
7780 public Bitmap GetBitmap(ZCT coord)
7781 {
7782 return (Bitmap)GetImageByCoord(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T);
7783 }
7792 public Bitmap GetFiltered(ZCT coord, IntRange r, IntRange g, IntRange b)
7793 {
7794 int index = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
7795 return GetFiltered(index, r, g, b);
7796 }
7805 public Bitmap GetFiltered(int ind, IntRange r, IntRange g, IntRange b)
7806 {
7807 if (Buffers[ind].BitsPerPixel > 8)
7808 {
7809 BioImage.filter16.InRed = r;
7810 BioImage.filter16.InGreen = g;
7811 BioImage.filter16.InBlue = b;
7812 return BioImage.filter16.Apply((Bitmap)Buffers[ind].Image);
7813 }
7814 else
7815 {
7816 // set ranges
7817 BioImage.filter8.InRed = r;
7818 BioImage.filter8.InGreen = g;
7819 BioImage.filter8.InBlue = b;
7820 //We give the filter an RGB image (ImageRGB) instead of Image as with some padded 8-bit images
7821 //AForge will return an invalid managed Bitmap which causes a crash due to faulty image properties.
7822 return BioImage.filter8.Apply((Bitmap)Buffers[ind].ImageRGB);
7823 }
7824 }
7831 public Bitmap GetChannelImage(int ind, RGB rGB)
7832 {
7833 BufferInfo bf = Buffers[ind];
7834 if (bf.isRGB)
7835 {
7836 if (rGB == RGB.R)
7837 return extractR.Apply((Bitmap)Buffers[ind].Image);
7838 else
7839 if (rGB == RGB.G)
7840 return extractG.Apply((Bitmap)Buffers[ind].Image);
7841 else
7842 return extractB.Apply((Bitmap)Buffers[ind].Image);
7843 }
7844 else
7845 throw new InvalidOperationException();
7846 }
7855 public Bitmap GetEmission(ZCT coord, IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
7856 {
7857 if (RGBChannelCount == 1)
7858 {
7859 BufferInfo[] bs = new BufferInfo[Channels.Count];
7860 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
7861 {
7862 int index = Coords[coord.Z, c, coord.T];
7863 bs[c] = Buffers[index];
7864 }
7865 return BufferInfo.GetEmissionBitmap(bs, Channels.ToArray());
7866 }
7867 else
7868 {
7869 int index = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
7870 return (Bitmap)Buffers[index].Image;
7871 }
7872 }
7881 public Bitmap GetRGBBitmap(ZCT coord, IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
7882 {
7883 int index = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
7884 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
7885 {
7886 if (Channels.Count >= 3)
7887 {
7888 BufferInfo[] bs = new BufferInfo[3];
7889 bs[0] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index];
7890 bs[1] = Buffers[index + GChannel.Index];
7891 bs[2] = Buffers[index + BChannel.Index];
7892 return BufferInfo.GetRGBBitmap(bs, rf, gf, bf);
7893 }
7894 else
7895 {
7896 BufferInfo[] bs = new BufferInfo[3];
7897 bs[0] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index];
7898 bs[1] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index + 1];
7899 bs[2] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index + 2];
7900 return BufferInfo.GetRGBBitmap(bs, rf, gf, bf);
7901 }
7902 }
7903 else
7904 return (Bitmap)Buffers[index].Image;
7905 }
7906
7907 public static Stopwatch swatch = new Stopwatch();
7914 public List<ROI> GetAnnotations(ZCT coord)
7915 {
7916 List<ROI> annotations = new List<ROI>();
7917 foreach (ROI an in Annotations)
7918 {
7919 if (an == null)
7920 continue;
7921 if (an.coord == coord)
7922 annotations.Add(an);
7923 }
7924 return annotations;
7925 }
7934 public List<ROI> GetAnnotations(int Z, int C, int T)
7935 {
7936 List<ROI> annotations = new List<ROI>();
7937 foreach (ROI an in Annotations)
7938 {
7939 if (an.coord.Z == Z && an.coord.Z == Z && an.coord.C == C && an.coord.T == T)
7940 annotations.Add(an);
7941 }
7942 return annotations;
7943 }
7944
7945 public bool Loading = false;
7948 public static void Initialize()
7949 {
7950 //We initialize OME on a seperate thread so the user doesn't have to wait for initialization to
7951 //view images.
7952 System.Threading.Thread t = new System.Threading.Thread(new System.Threading.ThreadStart(InitOME));
7953 t.Start();
7954 }
7956 private static void InitOME()
7957 {
7958 factory = new ServiceFactory();
7959 service = (OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService));
7960 reader = new ImageReader();
7961 writer = new ImageWriter();
7962 initialized = true;
7963 }
7969 public static void SaveFile(string file, string ID)
7970 {
7971 string[] sts = new string[1];
7972 sts[0] = file;
7973 SaveSeries(sts, ID);
7974 }
7979 public static void SaveSeries(string[] files, string ID)
7980 {
7981 string desc = "";
7982 int stride = 0;
7983 ImageJDesc j = new ImageJDesc();
7984 BioImage bi = Images.GetImage(files[0]);
7985 j.FromImage(bi);
7986 desc = j.GetString();
7987 for (int fi = 0; fi < files.Length; fi++)
7988 {
7989 string file = files[fi];
7990
7991 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(file);
7992 string fn = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID);
7993 string dir = Path.GetDirectoryName(ID);
7994 stride = b.Buffers[0].Stride;
7995
7996 //Save ROIs to CSV file.
7997 if (b.Annotations.Count > 0)
7998 {
7999 string f = dir + "//" + fn + ".csv";
8000 ExportROIsCSV(f, b.Annotations);
8001 }
8002
8003 //Embed ROI's to image description.
8004 for (int i = 0; i < b.Annotations.Count; i++)
8005 {
8006 desc += "-ROI:" + b.series + ":" + ROIToString(b.Annotations[i]) + NewLine;
8007 }
8008 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
8009 {
8010 string cj = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(c.info, Formatting.None);
8011 desc += "-Channel:" + fi + ":" + cj + NewLine;
8012 }
8013 string json = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(b.imageInfo, Formatting.None);
8014 desc += "-ImageInfo:" + fi + ":" + json + NewLine;
8015 }
8016
8017 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(ID, "w");
8018 for (int fi = 0; fi < files.Length; fi++)
8019 {
8020 int im = 0;
8021 string file = files[fi];
8022 Progress pr = new Progress(file, "Saving");
8023 pr.Show();
8024 Application.DoEvents();
8025 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(file);
8026 int sizec = 1;
8027 if (!b.isRGB)
8028 {
8029 sizec = b.SizeC;
8030 }
8031 byte[] buffer;
8032 for (int c = 0; c < sizec; c++)
8033 {
8034 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
8035 {
8036 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
8037 {
8038 image.SetDirectory((short)(im + (b.Buffers.Count * fi)));
8039 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH, b.SizeX);
8040 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION, desc);
8041 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH, b.SizeY);
8042 image.SetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE, b.bitsPerPixel);
8043 image.SetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL, b.RGBChannelCount);
8044 image.SetField(TiffTag.ROWSPERSTRIP, b.SizeY);
8045 image.SetField(TiffTag.ORIENTATION, BitMiracle.LibTiff.Classic.Orientation.TOPLEFT);
8046 image.SetField(TiffTag.PLANARCONFIG, PlanarConfig.CONTIG);
8047 image.SetField(TiffTag.PHOTOMETRIC, Photometric.MINISBLACK);
8048 image.SetField(TiffTag.ROWSPERSTRIP, image.DefaultStripSize(0));
8049 if (b.PhysicalSizeX != -1 && b.PhysicalSizeY != -1)
8050 {
8051 image.SetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION, (b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX) / ((b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX) * b.PhysicalSizeX));
8052 image.SetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION, (b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY) / ((b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY) * b.PhysicalSizeY));
8053 image.SetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT, ResUnit.NONE);
8054 }
8055 else
8056 {
8057 image.SetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION, 100.0);
8058 image.SetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION, 100.0);
8059 image.SetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT, ResUnit.INCH);
8060 }
8061 // specify that it's a page within the multipage file
8062 image.SetField(TiffTag.SUBFILETYPE, FileType.PAGE);
8063 // specify the page number
8064 buffer = b.Buffers[im].GetSaveBytes(true);
8065 image.SetField(TiffTag.PAGENUMBER, im + (b.Buffers.Count * fi), b.Buffers.Count * files.Length);
8066 for (int i = 0, offset = 0; i < b.SizeY; i++)
8067 {
8068 image.WriteScanline(buffer, offset, i, 0);
8069 offset += stride;
8070 }
8071 image.WriteDirectory();
8072 pr.UpdateProgressF((float)im / (float)b.ImageCount);
8073 Application.DoEvents();
8074 im++;
8075 }
8076 }
8077 }
8078 pr.Close();
8079 }
8080 image.Dispose();
8081
8082 }
8089 public static BioImage[] OpenSeries(string file)
8090 {
8091 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
8092 int pages = image.NumberOfDirectories();
8093 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
8094 int sp = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
8095 ImageJDesc imDesc = new ImageJDesc();
8096 int count = 1;
8097 if (f != null)
8098 {
8099 string desc = f[0].ToString();
8100 if (desc.StartsWith("ImageJ"))
8101 {
8102 imDesc.SetString(desc);
8103 if (imDesc.channels != 0)
8104 count = imDesc.channels;
8105 }
8106 }
8107 int scount = (pages * sp) / count;
8108 BioImage[] bs = new BioImage[pages];
8109 image.Close();
8110 for (int i = 0; i < pages; i++)
8111 {
8112 bs[i] = OpenFile(file, i, true);
8113 }
8114 return bs;
8115 }
8121 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file)
8122 {
8123 return OpenFile(file, 0, true);
8124 }
8125 static bool IsTiffTiled(string imagePath)
8126 {
8127 if (imagePath.EndsWith(".tif") || imagePath.EndsWith(".tiff"))
8128 {
8129 using (Tiff tiff = Tiff.Open(imagePath, "r"))
8130 {
8131 if (tiff == null)
8132 {
8133 throw new Exception("Failed to open TIFF image.");
8134 }
8135 bool t = tiff.IsTiled();
8136 tiff.Close();
8137 return t;
8138 }
8139 }
8140 else return false;
8141 }
8142 static void InitDirectoryResolution(BioImage b, Tiff image, ImageJDesc jdesc = null)
8143 {
8144 Resolution res = new Resolution();
8145 FieldValue[] rs = image.GetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT);
8146 string unit = "NONE";
8147 if (rs != null)
8148 unit = rs[0].ToString();
8149 if (jdesc != null)
8150 res.PhysicalSizeZ = jdesc.finterval;
8151 else
8152 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 2.54 / 96;
8153 if (unit == "CENTIMETER")
8154 {
8155 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
8156 {
8157 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
8158 res.PhysicalSizeX = (1000 / x);
8159 }
8160 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
8161 {
8162 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
8163 res.PhysicalSizeY = (1000 / y);
8164 }
8165 }
8166 else
8167 if (unit == "INCH")
8168 {
8169 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
8170 {
8171 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
8172 res.PhysicalSizeX = (2.54 / x) / 2.54;
8173 }
8174 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
8175 {
8176 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
8177 res.PhysicalSizeY = (2.54 / y) / 2.54;
8178 }
8179 }
8180 else
8181 if (unit == "NONE")
8182 {
8183 if (jdesc != null)
8184 {
8185 if (jdesc.unit == "micron")
8186 {
8187 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
8188 {
8189 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
8190 res.PhysicalSizeX = (2.54 / x) / 2.54;
8191 }
8192 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
8193 {
8194 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
8195 res.PhysicalSizeY = (2.54 / y) / 2.54;
8196 }
8197 }
8198 }
8199 else
8200 {
8201 res.PhysicalSizeX = 2.54 / 96;
8202 res.PhysicalSizeY = 2.54 / 96;
8203 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 2.54 / 96;
8204 }
8205 }
8206 res.SizeX = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH)[0].ToInt();
8207 res.SizeY = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH)[0].ToInt();
8208 int bitsPerPixel = image.GetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE)[0].ToInt();
8209 int RGBChannelCount = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
8210 res.PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, bitsPerPixel);
8211 b.Resolutions.Add(res);
8212 }
8220 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, int series, bool newTab)
8221 {
8222 return OpenFile(file, series, newTab, true, false, 0, 0, 1920, 1080);
8223 }
8231 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, int series, bool newTab, bool addToImages, bool tile, int x, int y, int w, int h)
8232 {
8233 if (isOME(file))
8234 {
8235 return OpenOME(file);
8236 }
8237 vips = VipsSupport(file);
8238 Stopwatch st = new Stopwatch();
8239 st.Start();
8240 Progress pr = new Progress(file, "Opening");
8241 pr.Show();
8242 Application.DoEvents();
8243 BioImage b = new BioImage(file);
8244 bool tiled = IsTiffTiled(file);
8245 if (tiled)
8246 {
8247 b.Type = ImageType.pyramidal;
8248 }
8249 b.series = series;
8250 b.file = file;
8251 string fn = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(file);
8252 string dir = Path.GetDirectoryName(file);
8253 if (File.Exists(fn + ".csv"))
8254 {
8255 string f = dir + "//" + fn + ".csv";
8256 b.Annotations = BioImage.ImportROIsCSV(f);
8257 }
8258 if (file.EndsWith("tif") || file.EndsWith("tiff") || file.EndsWith("TIF") || file.EndsWith("TIFF"))
8259 {
8260 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
8261 for (int d = 0; d < image.NumberOfDirectories(); d++)
8262 {
8263 image.SetDirectory((short)d);
8264 int SizeX = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH)[0].ToInt();
8265 int SizeY = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH)[0].ToInt();
8266 b.bitsPerPixel = image.GetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE)[0].ToInt();
8267 b.littleEndian = image.IsBigEndian();
8268 int RGBChannelCount = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
8269 string desc = "";
8270
8271 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
8272 ImageJDesc imDesc = new ImageJDesc();
8273 b.sizeC = 1;
8274 b.sizeT = 1;
8275 b.sizeZ = 1;
8276 if (f != null)
8277 {
8278 desc = f[0].ToString();
8279 if (desc.StartsWith("ImageJ"))
8280 {
8281 imDesc.SetString(desc);
8282 if (imDesc.channels != 0)
8283 b.sizeC = imDesc.channels;
8284 else
8285 b.sizeC = 1;
8286 if (imDesc.slices != 0)
8287 b.sizeZ = imDesc.slices;
8288 else
8289 b.sizeZ = 1;
8290 if (imDesc.frames != 0)
8291 b.sizeT = imDesc.frames;
8292 else
8293 b.sizeT = 1;
8294 if (imDesc.finterval != 0)
8295 b.frameInterval = imDesc.finterval;
8296 else
8297 b.frameInterval = 1;
8298 if (imDesc.spacing != 0)
8299 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = imDesc.spacing;
8300 else
8301 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
8302 }
8303 }
8304 int stride = 0;
8305 PixelFormat PixelFormat;
8306 if (RGBChannelCount == 1)
8307 {
8308 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
8309 {
8310 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
8311 stride = SizeX * 2;
8312 }
8313 else
8314 {
8315 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
8316 stride = SizeX;
8317 }
8318 }
8319 else
8320 if (RGBChannelCount == 3)
8321 {
8322 b.sizeC = 1;
8323 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
8324 {
8325 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
8326 stride = SizeX * 2 * 3;
8327 }
8328 else
8329 {
8330 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
8331 stride = SizeX * 3;
8332 }
8333 }
8334 else
8335 {
8336 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
8337 stride = SizeX * 4;
8338 }
8339
8340 string[] sts = desc.Split('\n');
8341 int index = 0;
8342 for (int i = 0; i < sts.Length; i++)
8343 {
8344 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-Channel"))
8345 {
8346 string val = sts[i].Substring(9);
8347 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
8348 int serie = int.Parse(val);
8349 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 7)
8350 {
8351 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
8352 Channel.ChannelInfo info = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<Channel.ChannelInfo>(cht);
8353 Channel ch = new Channel(index, b.bitsPerPixel, info.samplesPerPixel);
8354 ch.info = info;
8355 b.Channels.Add(ch);
8356 index++;
8357 }
8358 }
8359 else
8360 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ROI"))
8361 {
8362 string val = sts[i].Substring(5);
8363 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
8364 int serie = int.Parse(val);
8365 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 7)
8366 {
8367 string s = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf("ROI:") + 4, sts[i].Length - (sts[i].IndexOf("ROI:") + 4));
8368 string ro = s.Substring(s.IndexOf(":") + 1, s.Length - (s.IndexOf(':') + 1));
8369 ROI roi = StringToROI(ro);
8370 b.Annotations.Add(roi);
8371 }
8372 }
8373 else
8374 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ImageInfo"))
8375 {
8376 string val = sts[i].Substring(11);
8377 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
8378 int serie = int.Parse(val);
8379 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 10)
8380 {
8381 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
8382 b.imageInfo = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<ImageInfo>(cht);
8383 }
8384
8385 }
8386 }
8387
8388 InitDirectoryResolution(b, image, imDesc);
8389
8390 b.Coords = new int[b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT];
8391
8392 //If this is a tiff file not made by Bio we init channels based on RGBChannels.
8393 if (b.Channels.Count == 0)
8394 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, RGBChannelCount));
8395
8396 //Lets check to see the channels are correctly defined in this file
8397 for (int ch = 0; ch < b.Channels.Count; ch++)
8398 {
8399 if (b.Channels[ch].SamplesPerPixel != RGBChannelCount)
8400 {
8401 b.Channels[ch].SamplesPerPixel = RGBChannelCount;
8402 }
8403 }
8404
8405 int z = 0;
8406 int c = 0;
8407 int t = 0;
8408 b.Buffers = new List<BufferInfo>();
8409
8410 if (vips && tiled)
8411 {
8412 OpenVip(b, d, x, y, w, h);
8413 }
8414 else
8415 {
8416 int pages = image.NumberOfDirectories() / b.seriesCount;
8417 //int stride = image.ScanlineSize();
8418 int str = image.ScanlineSize();
8419 //If calculated stride and image scanline size is not the same it means the image is written in planes
8420 bool planes = false;
8421 if (stride != str)
8422 planes = true;
8423 if (planes)
8424 {
8425 BufferInfo[] bfs = new BufferInfo[3];
8426 for (int pl = 0; pl < 3; pl++)
8427 {
8428 byte[] bytes = new byte[str * SizeY];
8429 for (int im = 0, offset = 0; im < SizeY; im++)
8430 {
8431 image.ReadScanline(bytes, offset, im, (short)pl);
8432 offset += str;
8433 }
8434 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
8435 bfs[pl] = new BufferInfo(file, SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale, bytes, new ZCT(0, 0, 0), d, b.littleEndian, true);
8436 else
8437 bfs[pl] = new BufferInfo(file, SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed, bytes, new ZCT(0, 0, 0), d, b.littleEndian, true);
8438 }
8439 BufferInfo bf;
8440 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
8441 bf = BufferInfo.RGB16To48(bfs);
8442 else
8443 bf = BufferInfo.RGB8To24(bfs);
8444 bf.SwitchRedBlue();
8445 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
8446 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
8447 }
8448 else
8449 {
8450 byte[] bytes = new byte[stride * SizeY];
8451 for (int im = 0, offset = 0; im < SizeY; im++)
8452 {
8453 image.ReadScanline(bytes, offset, im, 0);
8454 offset += stride;
8455 }
8456 BufferInfo inf = new BufferInfo(file, SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, bytes, new ZCT(0, 0, 0), d, b.littleEndian, true);
8457 if (inf.PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
8458 inf.SwitchRedBlue();
8459 b.Buffers.Add(inf);
8460 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
8461 }
8462 pr.UpdateProgressF((float)((double)d / (double)(series + 1) * pages));
8463 Application.DoEvents();
8464 }
8465
8466 }
8467 image.Close();
8468 b.UpdateCoords();
8469 }
8470 else
8471 {
8472 b.bitsPerPixel = 8;
8473 b.littleEndian = BitConverter.IsLittleEndian;
8474 b.sizeZ = 1;
8475 b.sizeC = 1;
8476 b.sizeT = 1;
8477 BufferInfo inf = null;
8478 //We use a try block incase this is an OME file
8479 try
8480 {
8481 Image im = Image.FromFile(file);
8482 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
8483 b.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(im.Width, im.Height, im.PixelFormat, 2.54 / im.HorizontalResolution, 2.54 / im.VerticalResolution, 1, 0, 0, 0));
8484 inf = new BufferInfo(file, Image.FromFile(file), new ZCT(0, 0, 0), 0);
8485 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
8486 }
8487 catch (Exception)
8488 {
8489 b.Dispose();
8490 return OpenOME(file);
8491 }
8492 b.Buffers.Add(inf);
8493 Channel ch = new Channel(0, 8, b.RGBChannelCount);
8494 b.Channels.Add(ch);
8495 b.Coords = new int[b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.sizeT];
8496 b.imageInfo.Series = 0;
8497
8498 }
8499 //We wait for histogram image statistics calculation
8500 do
8501 {
8502 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
8503
8504 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
8505 AutoThreshold(b, false);
8506 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
8507 b.StackThreshold(true);
8508 else
8509 b.StackThreshold(false);
8510 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.Open(" + '"' + file + '"' + ");");
8511 Images.AddImage(b,newTab);
8512 pr.Close();
8513 pr.Dispose();
8514 st.Stop();
8515 return b;
8516 }
8523 public static bool isTiffSeries(string file)
8524 {
8525 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
8526 string desc = "";
8527 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
8528 image.Close();
8529 string[] sts = desc.Split('\n');
8530 int index = 0;
8531 for (int i = 0; i < sts.Length; i++)
8532 {
8533 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ImageInfo"))
8534 {
8535 string val = sts[i].Substring(11);
8536 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
8537 int serie = int.Parse(val);
8538 if (sts[i].Length > 10)
8539 {
8540 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
8541 ImageInfo info = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<ImageInfo>(cht);
8542 if (info.Series > 1)
8543 return true;
8544 else
8545 return false;
8546 }
8547 }
8548 }
8549 return false;
8550 }
8557 public static bool isOME(string file)
8558 {
8559 if (file.EndsWith(".ome.tif") || file.EndsWith(".OME.TIF"))
8560 return true;
8561 if (file.EndsWith(".tif") || file.EndsWith(".TIF") || file.EndsWith("tiff") || file.EndsWith("TIFF"))
8562 {
8563 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
8564 string desc = "";
8565 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
8566 image.Close();
8567 if (desc.Contains("<OME"))
8568 return true;
8569 else
8570 return false;
8571 }
8572 if (!(file.EndsWith("png") || file.EndsWith("PNG") || file.EndsWith("jpg") || file.EndsWith("JPG") ||
8573 file.EndsWith("jpeg") || file.EndsWith("JPEG") || file.EndsWith("bmp") || file.EndsWith("BMP")))
8574 {
8575 return true;
8576 }
8577 else return false;
8578 }
8584 public static bool isOMESeries(string file)
8585 {
8586 if (!isOME(file))
8587 return false;
8588 ImageReader reader = new ImageReader();
8589 var meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)new ServiceFactory().getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
8590 reader.setMetadataStore((MetadataStore)meta);
8591 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
8592 reader.setId(file);
8593 bool ser = false;
8594 if (reader.getSeriesCount() > 1)
8595 ser = true;
8596 reader.close();
8597 reader = null;
8598 return ser;
8599 }
8604 public static void SaveOME(string file, string ID)
8605 {
8606 string[] sts = new string[1];
8607 sts[0] = ID;
8608 SaveOMESeries(sts, file, Properties.Settings.Default.Planes);
8609 }
8615 public static void SaveOMESeries(string[] files, string f, bool planes)
8616 {
8617 if (File.Exists(f))
8618 File.Delete(f);
8619 loci.formats.meta.IMetadata omexml = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
8620 for (int fi = 0; fi < files.Length; fi++)
8621 {
8622 int serie = fi;
8623 string file = files[fi];
8624 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(file);
8625 // create OME-XML metadata store
8626
8627 omexml.setImageID("Image:" + serie, serie);
8628 omexml.setPixelsID("Pixels:" + serie, serie);
8629 omexml.setPixelsInterleaved(java.lang.Boolean.TRUE, serie);
8630 omexml.setPixelsDimensionOrder(ome.xml.model.enums.DimensionOrder.XYCZT, serie);
8631 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
8632 omexml.setPixelsType(ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16, serie);
8633 else
8634 omexml.setPixelsType(ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8, serie);
8635 omexml.setPixelsSizeX(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeX)), serie);
8636 omexml.setPixelsSizeY(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeY)), serie);
8637 omexml.setPixelsSizeZ(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeZ)), serie);
8638 int samples = 1;
8639 if (b.isRGB)
8640 samples = 3;
8641 omexml.setPixelsSizeC(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeC)), serie);
8642 omexml.setPixelsSizeT(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeT)), serie);
8643 if (BitConverter.IsLittleEndian)
8644 omexml.setPixelsBigEndian(java.lang.Boolean.FALSE, serie);
8645 else
8646 omexml.setPixelsBigEndian(java.lang.Boolean.TRUE, serie);
8647 ome.units.quantity.Length p1 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeX), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8648 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeX(p1, serie);
8649 ome.units.quantity.Length p2 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeY), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8650 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeY(p2, serie);
8651 ome.units.quantity.Length p3 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeZ), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8652 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(p3, serie);
8653 ome.units.quantity.Length s1 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8654 omexml.setStageLabelX(s1, serie);
8655 ome.units.quantity.Length s2 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8656 omexml.setStageLabelY(s2, serie);
8657 ome.units.quantity.Length s3 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8658 omexml.setStageLabelZ(s3, serie);
8659 omexml.setStageLabelName("StageLabel:" + serie, serie);
8660
8661 for (int channel = 0; channel < b.Channels.Count; channel++)
8662 {
8663 Channel c = b.Channels[channel];
8664 for (int r = 0; r < c.range.Length; r++)
8665 {
8666 omexml.setChannelID("Channel:" + channel + ":" + serie, serie, channel + r);
8667 omexml.setChannelSamplesPerPixel(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), serie, channel + r);
8668 if (c.LightSourceWavelength != 0)
8669 {
8670 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsID("LightSourceSettings:" + channel, serie, channel + r);
8671 ome.units.quantity.Length lw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.LightSourceWavelength), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
8672 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsWavelength(lw, serie, channel + r);
8673 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(PercentFraction.valueOf(c.LightSourceAttenuation), serie, channel + r);
8674 }
8675 omexml.setChannelName(c.Name, serie, channel + r);
8676 if (c.Color != null)
8677 {
8678 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(c.Color.Value.R, c.Color.Value.G, c.Color.Value.B, c.Color.Value.A);
8679 omexml.setChannelColor(col, serie, channel + r);
8680 }
8681 if (c.Emission != 0)
8682 {
8683 ome.units.quantity.Length em = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.Emission), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
8684 omexml.setChannelEmissionWavelength(em, serie, channel + r);
8685 ome.units.quantity.Length ex = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.Excitation), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
8686 omexml.setChannelExcitationWavelength(ex, serie, channel + r);
8687 }
8688 omexml.setChannelContrastMethod(c.ContrastMethod, serie, channel + r);
8689 omexml.setChannelFluor(c.Fluor, serie, channel + r);
8690 omexml.setChannelIlluminationType(c.IlluminationType, serie, channel + r);
8691
8692 if (c.LightSourceIntensity != 0)
8693 {
8694 ome.units.quantity.Power pw = new ome.units.quantity.Power(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.LightSourceIntensity), ome.units.UNITS.VOLT);
8695 omexml.setLightEmittingDiodePower(pw, serie, channel + r);
8696 omexml.setLightEmittingDiodeID(c.DiodeName, serie, channel + r);
8697 }
8698 if (c.AcquisitionMode != null)
8699 omexml.setChannelAcquisitionMode(c.AcquisitionMode, serie, channel + r);
8700 }
8701 }
8702
8703 int i = 0;
8704 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
8705 {
8706 if (an.roiID == "")
8707 omexml.setROIID("ROI:" + i.ToString() + ":" + serie, i);
8708 else
8709 omexml.setROIID(an.roiID, i);
8710 omexml.setROIName(an.roiName, i);
8711 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Point)
8712 {
8713 if (an.id != "")
8714 omexml.setPointID(an.id, i, serie);
8715 else
8716 omexml.setPointID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
8717 omexml.setPointX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.X)), i, serie);
8718 omexml.setPointY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Y)), i, serie);
8719 omexml.setPointTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
8720 omexml.setPointTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
8721 omexml.setPointTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
8722 if (an.Text != "")
8723 omexml.setPointText(an.Text, i, serie);
8724 else
8725 omexml.setPointText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8726 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8727 omexml.setPointFontSize(fl, i, serie);
8728 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
8729 omexml.setPointStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
8730 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8731 omexml.setPointStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
8732 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
8733 omexml.setPointFillColor(colf, i, serie);
8734 }
8735 else
8736 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Polygon || an.type == ROI.Type.Freeform)
8737 {
8738 if (an.id != "")
8739 omexml.setPolygonID(an.id, i, serie);
8740 else
8741 omexml.setPolygonID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
8742 omexml.setPolygonPoints(an.PointsToString(b), i, serie);
8743 omexml.setPolygonTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
8744 omexml.setPolygonTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
8745 omexml.setPolygonTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
8746 if (an.Text != "")
8747 omexml.setPolygonText(an.Text, i, serie);
8748 else
8749 omexml.setPolygonText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8750 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8751 omexml.setPolygonFontSize(fl, i, serie);
8752 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
8753 omexml.setPolygonStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
8754 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8755 omexml.setPolygonStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
8756 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
8757 omexml.setPolygonFillColor(colf, i, serie);
8758 }
8759 else
8760 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Rectangle)
8761 {
8762 if (an.id != "")
8763 omexml.setRectangleID(an.id, i, serie);
8764 else
8765 omexml.setRectangleID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
8766 omexml.setRectangleWidth(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeX(an.W)), i, serie);
8767 omexml.setRectangleHeight(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeY(an.H)), i, serie);
8768 omexml.setRectangleX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
8769 omexml.setRectangleY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
8770 omexml.setRectangleTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
8771 omexml.setRectangleTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
8772 omexml.setRectangleTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
8773 omexml.setRectangleText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8774 if (an.Text != "")
8775 omexml.setRectangleText(an.Text, i, serie);
8776 else
8777 omexml.setRectangleText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8778 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8779 omexml.setRectangleFontSize(fl, i, serie);
8780 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
8781 omexml.setRectangleStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
8782 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8783 omexml.setRectangleStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
8784 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
8785 omexml.setRectangleFillColor(colf, i, serie);
8786 }
8787 else
8788 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Line)
8789 {
8790 if (an.id != "")
8791 omexml.setLineID(an.id, i, serie);
8792 else
8793 omexml.setLineID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
8794 omexml.setLineX1(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.GetPoint(0).X)), i, serie);
8795 omexml.setLineY1(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.GetPoint(0).Y)), i, serie);
8796 omexml.setLineX2(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.GetPoint(1).X)), i, serie);
8797 omexml.setLineY2(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.GetPoint(1).Y)), i, serie);
8798 omexml.setLineTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
8799 omexml.setLineTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
8800 omexml.setLineTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
8801 if (an.Text != "")
8802 omexml.setLineText(an.Text, i, serie);
8803 else
8804 omexml.setLineText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8805 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8806 omexml.setLineFontSize(fl, i, serie);
8807 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
8808 omexml.setLineStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
8809 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8810 omexml.setLineStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
8811 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
8812 omexml.setLineFillColor(colf, i, serie);
8813 }
8814 else
8815 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Ellipse)
8816 {
8817
8818 if (an.id != "")
8819 omexml.setEllipseID(an.id, i, serie);
8820 else
8821 omexml.setEllipseID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
8822 //We need to change System.Drawing.Rectangle to ellipse radius;
8823 double w = (double)an.W / 2;
8824 double h = (double)an.H / 2;
8825 omexml.setEllipseRadiusX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeX(w)), i, serie);
8826 omexml.setEllipseRadiusY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeY(h)), i, serie);
8827
8828 double x = an.Point.X + w;
8829 double y = an.Point.Y + h;
8830 omexml.setEllipseX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(x)), i, serie);
8831 omexml.setEllipseY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(y)), i, serie);
8832 omexml.setEllipseTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
8833 omexml.setEllipseTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
8834 omexml.setEllipseTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
8835 if (an.Text != "")
8836 omexml.setEllipseText(an.Text, i, serie);
8837 else
8838 omexml.setEllipseText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8839 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8840 omexml.setEllipseFontSize(fl, i, serie);
8841 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
8842 omexml.setEllipseStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
8843 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8844 omexml.setEllipseStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
8845 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
8846 omexml.setEllipseFillColor(colf, i, serie);
8847 }
8848 else
8849 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Label)
8850 {
8851 if (an.id != "")
8852 omexml.setLabelID(an.id, i, serie);
8853 else
8854 omexml.setLabelID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
8855 omexml.setLabelX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
8856 omexml.setLabelY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
8857 omexml.setLabelTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
8858 omexml.setLabelTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
8859 omexml.setLabelTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
8860 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8861 if (an.Text != "")
8862 omexml.setLabelText(an.Text, i, serie);
8863 else
8864 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8865 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8866 omexml.setLabelFontSize(fl, i, serie);
8867 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
8868 omexml.setLabelStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
8869 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8870 omexml.setLabelStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
8871 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
8872 omexml.setLabelFillColor(colf, i, serie);
8873 }
8874 i++;
8875 }
8876 if (b.Buffers[0].Plane != null && planes)
8877 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
8878 {
8879 //Correct order of parameters.
8880 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Delta != 0)
8881 {
8882 ome.units.quantity.Time t = new ome.units.quantity.Time(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Delta), ome.units.UNITS.MILLISECOND);
8883 omexml.setPlaneDeltaT(t, serie, bu);
8884 }
8885 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure != 0)
8886 {
8887 ome.units.quantity.Time et = new ome.units.quantity.Time(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure), ome.units.UNITS.MILLISECOND);
8888 omexml.setPlaneExposureTime(et, serie, bu);
8889 }
8890 ome.units.quantity.Length lx = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8891 ome.units.quantity.Length ly = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8892 ome.units.quantity.Length lz = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8893 omexml.setPlanePositionX(lx, serie, bu);
8894 omexml.setPlanePositionY(ly, serie, bu);
8895 omexml.setPlanePositionZ(lz, serie, bu);
8896 omexml.setPlaneTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), serie, bu);
8897 omexml.setPlaneTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), serie, bu);
8898 omexml.setPlaneTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), serie, bu);
8899
8900 omexml.setTiffDataPlaneCount(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), serie, bu);
8901 omexml.setTiffDataIFD(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(bu)), serie, bu);
8902 omexml.setTiffDataFirstC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), serie, bu);
8903 omexml.setTiffDataFirstZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), serie, bu);
8904 omexml.setTiffDataFirstT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), serie, bu);
8905
8906 }
8907
8908 }
8909 writer.setMetadataRetrieve(omexml);
8910 f = f.Replace("\\", "/");
8911 writer.setId(f);
8912 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
8913 {
8914 string file = files[i];
8915 Progress pr = new Progress(file, "Saving");
8916 pr.Show();
8917 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(files[i]);
8918 writer.setSeries(i);
8919 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
8920 {
8921 writer.saveBytes(bu, b.Buffers[bu].GetSaveBytes(BitConverter.IsLittleEndian));
8922 pr.UpdateProgressF((float)bu / b.Buffers.Count);
8923 Application.DoEvents();
8924 }
8925 pr.Close();
8926 pr.Dispose();
8927 }
8928 bool stop = false;
8929 do
8930 {
8931 try
8932 {
8933 writer.close();
8934 stop = true;
8935 }
8936 catch (Exception e)
8937 {
8938 Scripting.LogLine(e.Message);
8939 }
8940
8941 } while (!stop);
8942 }
8943 public static void SaveOMESeries(BioImage[] bms, string f, bool planes)
8944 {
8945 List<string> sts = new List<string>();
8946 foreach (BioImage b in bms)
8947 {
8948 sts.Add(b.ID);
8949 }
8950 SaveOMESeries(sts.ToArray(), f, planes);
8951 }
8952 public static void SaveOMEStiched(BioImage[] bms, string file, string compression)
8953 {
8954 if (File.Exists(file))
8955 File.Delete(file);
8956 loci.formats.meta.IMetadata omexml = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
8957 //We need to go through the images and find the ones belonging to each resolution.
8958 //As well we need to determine the dimensions of the tiles.
8959 Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>> bis = new Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>>();
8960 Dictionary<double, Point3D> min = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
8961 Dictionary<double, Point3D> max = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
8962 for (int i = 0; i < bms.Length; i++)
8963 {
8964 Resolution r = bms[i].Resolutions[bms[i].Level];
8965 if (bis.ContainsKey(r.PhysicalSizeX))
8966 {
8967 bis[r.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
8968 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[r.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[r.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
8969 {
8970 min[r.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
8971 }
8972 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[r.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[r.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
8973 {
8974 max[r.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
8975 }
8976 }
8977 else
8978 {
8979 bis.Add(r.PhysicalSizeX, new List<BioImage>());
8980 min.Add(r.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(bms[i].StageSizeX, bms[i].StageSizeY, bms[i].StageSizeZ));
8981 max.Add(r.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(bms[i].StageSizeX, bms[i].StageSizeY, bms[i].StageSizeZ));
8982 bis[r.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
8983 }
8984 }
8985 int s = 0;
8986 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
8987 {
8988 Resolution rr = bis[px][0].Resolutions[bis[px][0].Level];
8989 int xi = 1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].X - min[px].X) / rr.VolumeWidth);
8990 int yi = 1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].Y - min[px].Y) / rr.VolumeHeight);
8991 BioImage b = bis[px][0];
8992 int serie = s;
8993 // create OME-XML metadata store.
8994 omexml.setImageID("Image:" + serie, serie);
8995 omexml.setPixelsID("Pixels:" + serie, serie);
8996 omexml.setPixelsInterleaved(java.lang.Boolean.TRUE, serie);
8997 omexml.setPixelsDimensionOrder(ome.xml.model.enums.DimensionOrder.XYCZT, serie);
8998 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
8999 omexml.setPixelsType(ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16, serie);
9000 else
9001 omexml.setPixelsType(ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8, serie);
9002 omexml.setPixelsSizeX(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeX * xi)), serie);
9003 omexml.setPixelsSizeY(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeY * yi)), serie);
9004 omexml.setPixelsSizeZ(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeZ)), serie);
9005 int samples = 1;
9006 if (b.isRGB)
9007 samples = 3;
9008 omexml.setPixelsSizeC(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeC)), serie);
9009 omexml.setPixelsSizeT(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeT)), serie);
9010 if (BitConverter.IsLittleEndian)
9011 omexml.setPixelsBigEndian(java.lang.Boolean.FALSE, serie);
9012 else
9013 omexml.setPixelsBigEndian(java.lang.Boolean.TRUE, serie);
9014 ome.units.quantity.Length p1 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeX), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
9015 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeX(p1, serie);
9016 ome.units.quantity.Length p2 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeY), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
9017 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeY(p2, serie);
9018 ome.units.quantity.Length p3 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeZ), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
9019 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(p3, serie);
9020 ome.units.quantity.Length s1 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
9021 omexml.setStageLabelX(s1, serie);
9022 ome.units.quantity.Length s2 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
9023 omexml.setStageLabelY(s2, serie);
9024 ome.units.quantity.Length s3 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
9025 omexml.setStageLabelZ(s3, serie);
9026 omexml.setStageLabelName("StageLabel:" + serie, serie);
9027
9028 for (int channel = 0; channel < b.Channels.Count; channel++)
9029 {
9030 Channel c = b.Channels[channel];
9031 for (int r = 0; r < c.range.Length; r++)
9032 {
9033 omexml.setChannelID("Channel:" + channel + ":" + serie, serie, channel + r);
9034 omexml.setChannelSamplesPerPixel(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), serie, channel + r);
9035 if (c.LightSourceWavelength != 0)
9036 {
9037 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsID("LightSourceSettings:" + channel, serie, channel + r);
9038 ome.units.quantity.Length lw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.LightSourceWavelength), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
9039 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsWavelength(lw, serie, channel + r);
9040 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(PercentFraction.valueOf(c.LightSourceAttenuation), serie, channel + r);
9041 }
9042 omexml.setChannelName(c.Name, serie, channel + r);
9043 if (c.Color != null)
9044 {
9045 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(c.Color.Value.R, c.Color.Value.G, c.Color.Value.B, c.Color.Value.A);
9046 omexml.setChannelColor(col, serie, channel + r);
9047 }
9048 if (c.Emission != 0)
9049 {
9050 ome.units.quantity.Length em = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.Emission), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
9051 omexml.setChannelEmissionWavelength(em, serie, channel + r);
9052 ome.units.quantity.Length ex = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.Excitation), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
9053 omexml.setChannelExcitationWavelength(ex, serie, channel + r);
9054 }
9055 omexml.setChannelContrastMethod(c.ContrastMethod, serie, channel + r);
9056 omexml.setChannelFluor(c.Fluor, serie, channel + r);
9057 omexml.setChannelIlluminationType(c.IlluminationType, serie, channel + r);
9058
9059 if (c.LightSourceIntensity != 0)
9060 {
9061 ome.units.quantity.Power pw = new ome.units.quantity.Power(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.LightSourceIntensity), ome.units.UNITS.VOLT);
9062 omexml.setLightEmittingDiodePower(pw, serie, channel + r);
9063 omexml.setLightEmittingDiodeID(c.DiodeName, serie, channel + r);
9064 }
9065 if (c.AcquisitionMode != null)
9066 omexml.setChannelAcquisitionMode(c.AcquisitionMode, serie, channel + r);
9067 }
9068 }
9069
9070 int i = 0;
9071 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
9072 {
9073 if (an.roiID == "")
9074 omexml.setROIID("ROI:" + i.ToString() + ":" + serie, i);
9075 else
9076 omexml.setROIID(an.roiID, i);
9077 omexml.setROIName(an.roiName, i);
9078 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Point)
9079 {
9080 if (an.id != "")
9081 omexml.setPointID(an.id, i, serie);
9082 else
9083 omexml.setPointID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
9084 omexml.setPointX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.X)), i, serie);
9085 omexml.setPointY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Y)), i, serie);
9086 omexml.setPointTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
9087 omexml.setPointTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
9088 omexml.setPointTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
9089 if (an.Text != "")
9090 omexml.setPointText(an.Text, i, serie);
9091 else
9092 omexml.setPointText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
9093 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
9094 omexml.setPointFontSize(fl, i, serie);
9095 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
9096 omexml.setPointStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
9097 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
9098 omexml.setPointStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
9099 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
9100 omexml.setPointFillColor(colf, i, serie);
9101 }
9102 else
9103 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Polygon || an.type == ROI.Type.Freeform)
9104 {
9105 if (an.id != "")
9106 omexml.setPolygonID(an.id, i, serie);
9107 else
9108 omexml.setPolygonID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
9109 omexml.setPolygonPoints(an.PointsToString(b), i, serie);
9110 omexml.setPolygonTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
9111 omexml.setPolygonTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
9112 omexml.setPolygonTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
9113 if (an.Text != "")
9114 omexml.setPolygonText(an.Text, i, serie);
9115 else
9116 omexml.setPolygonText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
9117 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
9118 omexml.setPolygonFontSize(fl, i, serie);
9119 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
9120 omexml.setPolygonStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
9121 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
9122 omexml.setPolygonStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
9123 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
9124 omexml.setPolygonFillColor(colf, i, serie);
9125 }
9126 else
9127 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Rectangle)
9128 {
9129 if (an.id != "")
9130 omexml.setRectangleID(an.id, i, serie);
9131 else
9132 omexml.setRectangleID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
9133 omexml.setRectangleWidth(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeX(an.W)), i, serie);
9134 omexml.setRectangleHeight(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeY(an.H)), i, serie);
9135 omexml.setRectangleX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
9136 omexml.setRectangleY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
9137 omexml.setRectangleTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
9138 omexml.setRectangleTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
9139 omexml.setRectangleTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
9140 omexml.setRectangleText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
9141 if (an.Text != "")
9142 omexml.setRectangleText(an.Text, i, serie);
9143 else
9144 omexml.setRectangleText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
9145 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
9146 omexml.setRectangleFontSize(fl, i, serie);
