9147 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
9148 omexml.setRectangleStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
9149 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
9150 omexml.setRectangleStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
9151 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
9152 omexml.setRectangleFillColor(colf, i, serie);
9153 }
9154 else
9155 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Line)
9156 {
9157 if (an.id != "")
9158 omexml.setLineID(an.id, i, serie);
9159 else
9160 omexml.setLineID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
9161 omexml.setLineX1(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.GetPoint(0).X)), i, serie);
9162 omexml.setLineY1(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.GetPoint(0).Y)), i, serie);
9163 omexml.setLineX2(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.GetPoint(1).X)), i, serie);
9164 omexml.setLineY2(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.GetPoint(1).Y)), i, serie);
9165 omexml.setLineTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
9166 omexml.setLineTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
9167 omexml.setLineTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
9168 if (an.Text != "")
9169 omexml.setLineText(an.Text, i, serie);
9170 else
9171 omexml.setLineText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
9172 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
9173 omexml.setLineFontSize(fl, i, serie);
9174 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
9175 omexml.setLineStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
9176 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
9177 omexml.setLineStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
9178 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
9179 omexml.setLineFillColor(colf, i, serie);
9180 }
9181 else
9182 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Ellipse)
9183 {
9184
9185 if (an.id != "")
9186 omexml.setEllipseID(an.id, i, serie);
9187 else
9188 omexml.setEllipseID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
9189 //We need to change System.Drawing.Rectangle to ellipse radius;
9190 double w = (double)an.W / 2;
9191 double h = (double)an.H / 2;
9192 omexml.setEllipseRadiusX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeX(w)), i, serie);
9193 omexml.setEllipseRadiusY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeY(h)), i, serie);
9194
9195 double x = an.Point.X + w;
9196 double y = an.Point.Y + h;
9197 omexml.setEllipseX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(x)), i, serie);
9198 omexml.setEllipseY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(y)), i, serie);
9199 omexml.setEllipseTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
9200 omexml.setEllipseTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
9201 omexml.setEllipseTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
9202 if (an.Text != "")
9203 omexml.setEllipseText(an.Text, i, serie);
9204 else
9205 omexml.setEllipseText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
9206 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
9207 omexml.setEllipseFontSize(fl, i, serie);
9208 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
9209 omexml.setEllipseStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
9210 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
9211 omexml.setEllipseStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
9212 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
9213 omexml.setEllipseFillColor(colf, i, serie);
9214 }
9215 else
9216 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Label)
9217 {
9218 if (an.id != "")
9219 omexml.setLabelID(an.id, i, serie);
9220 else
9221 omexml.setLabelID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
9222 omexml.setLabelX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
9223 omexml.setLabelY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
9224 omexml.setLabelTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
9225 omexml.setLabelTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
9226 omexml.setLabelTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
9227 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
9228 if (an.Text != "")
9229 omexml.setLabelText(an.Text, i, serie);
9230 else
9231 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
9232 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
9233 omexml.setLabelFontSize(fl, i, serie);
9234 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
9235 omexml.setLabelStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
9236 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
9237 omexml.setLabelStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
9238 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
9239 omexml.setLabelFillColor(colf, i, serie);
9240 }
9241 i++;
9242 }
9243 s++;
9244 }
9245 writer.setMetadataRetrieve(omexml);
9246 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
9247 writer.setId(file);
9248 writer.setCompression(compression);
9249 int xx; int yy;
9250 Progress pr = new Progress(file, "Saving");
9251 pr.Show();
9252 s = 0;
9253 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
9254 {
9255 writer.setSeries(s);
9256 PointD p = new PointD(max[px].X - min[px].X, max[px].Y - min[px].Y);
9257 for (int i = 0; i < bis[px].Count; i++)
9258 {
9259 BioImage b = bis[px][i];
9260 writer.setTileSizeX(b.SizeX);
9261 writer.setTileSizeY(b.SizeY);
9262 Resolution r = bis[px][i].Resolutions[bis[px][i].Level];
9263 double dx = Math.Ceiling((bis[px][i].StageSizeX - min[px].X) / r.VolumeWidth);
9264 double dy = Math.Ceiling((bis[px][i].StageSizeY - min[px].Y) / r.VolumeHeight);
9265 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
9266 {
9267 byte[] bt = b.Buffers[bu].GetSaveBytes(BitConverter.IsLittleEndian);
9268 writer.saveBytes(bu, bt, (int)dx * b.SizeX, (int)dy * b.SizeY, b.SizeX, b.SizeY);
9269 Application.DoEvents();
9270 }
9271 pr.UpdateProgressF((float)i / bis[px].Count);
9272
9273 }
9274 }
9275 pr.Close();
9276 pr.Dispose();
9277 bool stop = false;
9278 do
9279 {
9280 try
9281 {
9282 writer.close();
9283 stop = true;
9284 }
9285 catch (Exception e)
9286 {
9287 Scripting.LogLine(e.Message);
9288 }
9289 } while (!stop);
9290 }
9291
9303 private static int GetBands(PixelFormat format)
9304 {
9305 switch (format)
9306 {
9307 case PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed: return 1;
9308 case PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale: return 1;
9309 case PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb: return 3;
9310 case PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb:
9311 case PixelFormat.Format32bppPArgb:
9312 case PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb:
9313 return 4;
9314 case PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb:
9315 return 3;
9316 default:
9317 throw new NotSupportedException($"Unsupported pixel format: {format}");
9318 }
9319 }
9330 public static void SaveOMEPyramidal(BioImage[] bms, string file, Enums.ForeignTiffCompression compression, int compressionLevel)
9331 {
9332 if (File.Exists(file))
9333 File.Delete(file);
9334 //We need to go through the images and find the ones belonging to each resolution.
9335 //As well we need to determine the dimensions of the tiles.
9336 Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>> bis = new Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>>();
9337 Dictionary<double, Point3D> min = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
9338 Dictionary<double, Point3D> max = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
9339 for (int i = 0; i < bms.Length; i++)
9340 {
9341 Resolution res = bms[i].Resolutions[bms[i].Level];
9342 if (bis.ContainsKey(res.PhysicalSizeX))
9343 {
9344 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
9345 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
9346 {
9347 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
9348 }
9349 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
9350 {
9351 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
9352 }
9353 }
9354 else
9355 {
9356 bis.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new List<BioImage>());
9357 min.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue));
9358 max.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(double.MinValue, double.MinValue, double.MinValue));
9359 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
9360 {
9361 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
9362 }
9363 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
9364 {
9365 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
9366 }
9367 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
9368 }
9369 }
9370 int s = 0;
9371 //We determine the sizes of each resolution.
9372 Dictionary<double, Size> ss = new Dictionary<double, Size>();
9373 int minx = int.MaxValue;
9374 int miny = int.MaxValue;
9375 double last = 0;
9376 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
9377 {
9378 int xs = (1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].X - min[px].X) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[0].VolumeWidth)) * bis[px][0].SizeX;
9379 int ys = (1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].Y - min[px].Y) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[0].VolumeHeight)) * bis[px][0].SizeY;
9380 if (minx > xs)
9381 minx = xs;
9382 if (miny > ys)
9383 miny = ys;
9384 ss.Add(px, new Size(xs, ys));
9385 last = px;
9386 }
9387 s = 0;
9388 string met = "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\" standalone=\"no\"?>" +
9389 "<OME xmlns=\"http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06\" " +
9390 "xmlns:xsi=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance\" " +
9391 "xsi:schemaLocation=\"http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06 http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06/ome.xsd\">";
9392 NetVips.Image img = null;
9393 int ib = 0;
9394
9395 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
9396 {
9397 int c = bis[px][s].SizeC;
9398 if (bis[px][s].Buffers[0].isRGB)
9399 c = 3;
9400 string endian = (bis[px][s].Buffers[0].LittleEndian).ToString().ToLower(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
9401 met +=
9402 "<Image ID=\"Image:" + ib + "\">" +
9403 "<Pixels BigEndian=\"" + endian + "\" DimensionOrder= \"XYCZT\" ID= \"Pixels:0\" Interleaved=\"true\" " +
9404 "PhysicalSizeX=\"" + bis[px][s].PhysicalSizeX + "\" PhysicalSizeXUnit=\"µm\" PhysicalSizeY=\"" + bis[px][s].PhysicalSizeY + "\" PhysicalSizeYUnit=\"µm\" SignificantBits=\"" + bis[px][s].bitsPerPixel + "\" " +
9405 "SizeC = \"" + c + "\" SizeT = \"" + bis[px][s].SizeT + "\" SizeX =\"" + ss[px].Width +
9406 "\" SizeY= \"" + ss[px].Height + "\" SizeZ=\"" + bis[px][s].SizeZ;
9407 if (bis[px][s].bitsPerPixel > 8) met += "\" Type= \"uint16\">";
9408 else met += "\" Type= \"uint8\">";
9409 int i = 0;
9410 foreach (Channel ch in bis[px][s].Channels)
9411 {
9412 met += "<Channel ID=\"Channel:" + ib + ":" + i + "\" SamplesPerPixel=\"1\"></Channel>";
9413 i++;
9414 }
9415 met += "</Pixels></Image>";
9416 ib++;
9417 }
9418 met += "</OME>";
9419 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
9420 {
9421 PixelFormat pf = bis[px][0].Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
9422 Bitmap level = new Bitmap(ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, pf);
9423 int bands = GetBands(pf);
9424 BitmapData d = level.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, level.Width, level.Height),ImageLockMode.ReadWrite,pf);
9425 if (bis[px][0].bitsPerPixel > 8)
9426 img = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(d.Scan0, (ulong)(d.Stride * d.Height), level.Width, level.Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Ushort);
9427 else
9428 img = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(d.Scan0, (ulong)(d.Stride * d.Height), level.Width, level.Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Uchar);
9429 int i = 0;
9430 foreach (BioImage b in bis[px])
9431 {
9432 Size si = ss[px];
9433 double xs = (-(min[px].X - bis[px][i].Volume.Location.X) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[0].VolumeWidth) * bis[px][i].SizeX;
9434 double ys = (-(min[px].Y - bis[px][i].Volume.Location.Y) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[0].VolumeHeight) * bis[px][i].SizeY;
9435 NetVips.Image tile;
9436 Bitmap bm = (Bitmap)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Image;
9437 BitmapData bd = bm.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, level.Width, level.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, pf);
9438 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
9439 tile = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(bd.Scan0, (ulong)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Length, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].SizeX, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].SizeY, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Ushort);
9440 else
9441 tile = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(bd.Scan0, (ulong)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Length, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].SizeX, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].SizeY, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Uchar);
9442 img = img.Insert(tile, (int)xs, (int)ys);
9443 bm.UnlockBits(bd);
9444 i++;
9445 };
9446 level.UnlockBits(d);
9447 using var mutated = img.Mutate(mutable =>
9448 {
9449 // Set the ImageDescription tag
9450 mutable.Set(GValue.GStrType, "image-description", met);
9451 mutable.Set(GValue.GIntType, "page-height", ss[last].Height);
9452 });
9453 if (bis[px][0].bitsPerPixel > 8)
9454 mutated.Tiffsave(file, compression, 1, Enums.ForeignTiffPredictor.None, true, ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, true, false, 16,
9455 Enums.ForeignTiffResunit.Cm, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeX, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeY, true, null, Enums.RegionShrink.Nearest,
9456 compressionLevel, true, Enums.ForeignDzDepth.One, true, false, null, null, ss[px].Height);
9457 else
9458 mutated.Tiffsave(file, compression, 1, Enums.ForeignTiffPredictor.None, true, ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, true, false, 8,
9459 Enums.ForeignTiffResunit.Cm, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeX, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeY, true, null, Enums.RegionShrink.Nearest,
9460 compressionLevel, true, Enums.ForeignDzDepth.One, true, false, null, null, ss[px].Height);
9461 s++;
9462 }
9463
9464 }
9465
9471 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file)
9472 {
9473 return OpenOMESeries(file, true, true)[0];
9474 }
9483 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file, int serie, bool newTab, bool addToImages)
9484 {
9485 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.OpenOME(\"" + file + "\"," + serie + ");");
9486 return OpenOME(file, serie, newTab, addToImages, false, 0, 0, 0, 0);
9487 }
9497 public static BioImage FilesToStack(string[] files, int sizeZ, int sizeC, int sizeT)
9498 {
9499 BioImage b = new BioImage(files[0]);
9500 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
9501 {
9502 BioImage bb = OpenFile(files[i]);
9503 b.Buffers.AddRange(bb.Buffers);
9504 }
9505 b.UpdateCoords(sizeZ, sizeC, sizeT);
9506 Images.AddImage(b,true);
9507 return b;
9508 }
9514 public static BioImage FolderToStack(string path)
9515 {
9516 string[] files = Directory.GetFiles(path);
9517 BioImage b = new BioImage(files[0]);
9518 int z = 0;
9519 int c = 0;
9520 int t = 0;
9521 BioImage bb = null;
9522 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
9523 {
9524 string[] st = files[i].Split('_');
9525 if (st.Length > 3)
9526 {
9527 z = int.Parse(st[1].Replace("Z", ""));
9528 c = int.Parse(st[2].Replace("C", ""));
9529 t = int.Parse(st[3].Replace("T", ""));
9530 }
9531 bb = OpenFile(files[i]);
9532 b.Buffers.AddRange(bb.Buffers);
9533 }
9534 if (z == 0)
9535 {
9536 ImagesToStack im = new ImagesToStack();
9537 if (im.ShowDialog() != DialogResult.OK)
9538 return null;
9539 b.UpdateCoords(im.SizeZ, im.SizeC, im.SizeT);
9540 }
9541 else
9542 b.UpdateCoords(z + 1, c + 1, t + 1);
9543 Images.AddImage(b,true);
9544 Recorder.AddLine("BioImage.FolderToStack(\"" + path + "\");");
9545 return b;
9546 }
9547 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file, int serie, bool tab, bool addToImages, bool tile, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY, bool useOpenSlide = true)
9548 {
9549 if (file == null || file == "")
9550 throw new InvalidDataException("File is empty or null");
9551 //We wait incase OME has not initialized.
9552 do
9553 {
9554 Thread.Sleep(10);
9555 } while (!initialized);
9556 reader = new ImageReader();
9557 Console.WriteLine("OpenOME " + file);
9558 if (tileSizeX == 0)
9559 tileSizeX = 1920;
9560 if (tileSizeY == 0)
9561 tileSizeY = 1080;
9562 Progress pr = new Progress(file, "Opening OME");
9563 pr.Show();
9564 Application.DoEvents();
9565 BioImage b = new BioImage(file);
9566 b.imRead = reader;
9567 b.Type = ImageType.stack;
9568 b.Loading = true;
9569 if (b.meta == null)
9570 b.meta = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
9571 reader.close();
9572 reader.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
9573 reader.setId(file);
9574 pr.Status = "Reading Metadata";
9575 //status = "Reading OME Metadata.";
9576 reader.setSeries(serie);
9577 int RGBChannelCount = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
9578 //OME reader.getBitsPerPixel(); sometimes returns incorrect bits per pixel, like when opening ImageJ images.
9579 //So we check the pixel type from xml metadata and if it fails we use the readers value.
9580 PixelFormat PixelFormat;
9581 try
9582 {
9583 PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, b.meta.getPixelsType(serie));
9584 }
9585 catch (Exception)
9586 {
9587 PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, reader.getBitsPerPixel());
9588 }
9589
9590 b.id = file;
9591 b.file = file;
9592 int SizeX, SizeY;
9593 SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
9594 SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
9595 int SizeZ = reader.getSizeZ();
9596 b.sizeC = reader.getSizeC();
9597 b.sizeZ = reader.getSizeZ();
9598 b.sizeT = reader.getSizeT();
9599 b.littleEndian = reader.isLittleEndian();
9600 b.seriesCount = reader.getSeriesCount();
9601 b.imagesPerSeries = reader.getImageCount();
9602 b.bitsPerPixel = reader.getBitsPerPixel();
9603 b.series = serie;
9604 string order = reader.getDimensionOrder();
9605
9606 //Lets get the channels and initialize them
9607 int i = 0;
9608 pr.Status = "Reading Channels";
9609 int sumSamples = 0;
9610 while (true)
9611 {
9612 Channel ch = new Channel(i, b.bitsPerPixel, 1);
9613 bool def = false;
9614 try
9615 {
9616 if (b.meta.getChannelSamplesPerPixel(serie, i) != null)
9617 {
9618 int s = b.meta.getChannelSamplesPerPixel(serie, i).getNumberValue().intValue();
9619 ch.SamplesPerPixel = s;
9620 sumSamples += s;
9621 def = true;
9622 }
9623 if (b.meta.getChannelName(serie, i) != null)
9624 ch.Name = b.meta.getChannelName(serie, i);
9625 if (b.meta.getChannelAcquisitionMode(serie, i) != null)
9626 ch.AcquisitionMode = b.meta.getChannelAcquisitionMode(serie, i);
9627 if (b.meta.getChannelID(serie, i) != null)
9628 ch.info.ID = b.meta.getChannelID(serie, i);
9629 if (b.meta.getChannelFluor(serie, i) != null)
9630 ch.Fluor = b.meta.getChannelFluor(serie, i);
9631 if (b.meta.getChannelColor(serie, i) != null)
9632 {
9633 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color cc = b.meta.getChannelColor(serie, i);
9634 ch.Color = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(cc.getRed(), cc.getGreen(), cc.getBlue());
9635 }
9636 if (b.meta.getChannelIlluminationType(serie, i) != null)
9637 ch.IlluminationType = b.meta.getChannelIlluminationType(serie, i);
9638 if (b.meta.getChannelContrastMethod(serie, i) != null)
9639 ch.ContrastMethod = b.meta.getChannelContrastMethod(serie, i);
9640 if (b.meta.getChannelEmissionWavelength(serie, i) != null)
9641 ch.Emission = b.meta.getChannelEmissionWavelength(serie, i).value().intValue();
9642 if (b.meta.getChannelExcitationWavelength(serie, i) != null)
9643 ch.Excitation = b.meta.getChannelExcitationWavelength(serie, i).value().intValue();
9644 if (b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodePower(serie, i) != null)
9645 ch.LightSourceIntensity = b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodePower(serie, i).value().doubleValue();
9646 if (b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodeID(serie, i) != null)
9647 ch.DiodeName = b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodeID(serie, i);
9648 if (b.meta.getChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(serie, i) != null)
9649 ch.LightSourceAttenuation = b.meta.getChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(serie, i).toString();
9650
9651 }
9652 catch (Exception e)
9653 {
9654 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
9655 }
9656 //If this channel is not defined we have loaded all the channels in the file.
9657 if (!def)
9658 break;
9659 else
9660 b.Channels.Add(ch);
9661 if (i == 0)
9662 {
9663 b.rgbChannels[0] = 0;
9664 }
9665 else
9666 if (i == 1)
9667 {
9668 b.rgbChannels[1] = 1;
9669 }
9670 else
9671 if (i == 2)
9672 {
9673 b.rgbChannels[2] = 2;
9674 }
9675 i++;
9676 }
9677 //If the file doens't have channels we initialize them.
9678 if (b.Channels.Count == 0)
9679 {
9680 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, RGBChannelCount));
9681 }
9682
9683 //Bioformats gives a size of 3 for C when saved in ImageJ as RGB. We need to correct for this as C should be 1 for RGB.
9684 if (RGBChannelCount >= 3)
9685 {
9686 b.sizeC = sumSamples / b.Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel;
9687 }
9688 b.Coords = new int[b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT];
9689
9690 int resc = reader.getResolutionCount();
9691 try
9692 {
9693 int wells = b.meta.getWellCount(0);
9694 if (wells > 0)
9695 {
9696 b.Type = ImageType.well;
9697 b.Plate = new WellPlate(b);
9698 tile = false;
9699 }
9700
9701 }
9702 catch (Exception e)
9703 {
9704 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
9705 }
9706 List<Resolution> rss = new List<Resolution>();
9707 for (int s = 0; s < b.seriesCount; s++)
9708 {
9709 reader.setSeries(s);
9710 for (int r = 0; r < reader.getResolutionCount(); r++)
9711 {
9712 Resolution res = new Resolution();
9713 try
9714 {
9715 int rgbc = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
9716 int bps = reader.getBitsPerPixel();
9717 PixelFormat px;
9718 try
9719 {
9720 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, b.meta.getPixelsType(r));
9721 }
9722 catch (Exception)
9723 {
9724 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, bps);
9725 }
9726 res.PixelFormat = px;
9727 res.SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
9728 res.SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
9729 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(r) != null)
9730 {
9731 res.PhysicalSizeX = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(r).value().doubleValue();
9732 }
9733 else
9734 res.PhysicalSizeX = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
9735 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(r) != null)
9736 {
9737 res.PhysicalSizeY = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(r).value().doubleValue();
9738 }
9739 else
9740 res.PhysicalSizeY = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
9741
9742 if (b.meta.getStageLabelX(r) != null)
9743 res.StageSizeX = b.meta.getStageLabelX(r).value().doubleValue();
9744 if (b.meta.getStageLabelY(r) != null)
9745 res.StageSizeY = b.meta.getStageLabelY(r).value().doubleValue();
9746 if (b.meta.getStageLabelZ(r) != null)
9747 res.StageSizeZ = b.meta.getStageLabelZ(r).value().doubleValue();
9748 else
9749 res.StageSizeZ = 1;
9750 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(r) != null)
9751 {
9752 res.PhysicalSizeZ = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(r).value().doubleValue();
9753 }
9754 else
9755 {
9756 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
9757 }
9758 }
9759 catch (Exception e)
9760 {
9761 Console.WriteLine("No Stage Coordinates. PhysicalSize:(" + res.PhysicalSizeX + "," + res.PhysicalSizeY + "," + res.PhysicalSizeZ + ")");
9762 }
9763 rss.Add(res);
9764 }
9765 }
9766 reader.setSeries(serie);
9767 int pyramidCount = 0;
9768 int pyramidResolutions = 0;
9769 List<Tuple<int, int>> prs = new List<Tuple<int, int>>();
9770 //We need to determine if this image is pyramidal or not.
9771 //We do this by seeing if the resolutions are downsampled or not.
9772 if (rss.Count > 1 && b.Type != ImageType.well)
9773 {
9774 if (rss[0].SizeX > rss[1].SizeX)
9775 {
9776 b.Type = ImageType.pyramidal;
9777 tile = true;
9778 //We need to determine number of pyramids in this image and which belong to the series we are opening.
9779 int? sr = null;
9780 for (int r = 0; r < rss.Count - 1; r++)
9781 {
9782 if (rss[r].SizeX > rss[r + 1].SizeX && rss[r].PixelFormat == rss[r + 1].PixelFormat)
9783 {
9784 if (sr == null)
9785 {
9786 sr = r;
9787 prs.Add(new Tuple<int, int>(r, 0));
9788 }
9789 }
9790 else
9791 {
9792 if (rss[prs[prs.Count - 1].Item1].PixelFormat == rss[r].PixelFormat)
9793 prs[prs.Count - 1] = new Tuple<int, int>(prs[prs.Count - 1].Item1, r);
9794 sr = null;
9795 }
9796 }
9797 pyramidCount = prs.Count;
9798 for (int p = 0; p < prs.Count; p++)
9799 {
9800 pyramidResolutions += (prs[p].Item2 - prs[p].Item1) + 1;
9801 }
9802
9803 if (prs[serie].Item2 == 0)
9804 {
9805 prs[serie] = new Tuple<int, int>(prs[serie].Item1, rss.Count);
9806 }
9807 for (int r = prs[serie].Item1; r < prs[serie].Item2; r++)
9808 {
9809 b.Resolutions.Add(rss[r]);
9810 }
9811 }
9812 else
9813 {
9814 b.Resolutions.AddRange(rss);
9815 }
9816 }
9817 else
9818 b.Resolutions.AddRange(rss);
9819
9820 //If we have 2 resolutions that were not added they are the label & macro resolutions so we add them to the image.
9821 if (rss.Count - pyramidResolutions == 2)
9822 {
9823 b.Resolutions.Add(rss[rss.Count - 2]);
9824 b.Resolutions.Add(rss[rss.Count - 1]);
9825 }
9826
9827 b.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(b.PhysicalSizeX * SizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY * SizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
9828 pr.Status = "Reading ROIs";
9829 int rc = b.meta.getROICount();
9830 for (int im = 0; im < rc; im++)
9831 {
9832 string roiID = b.meta.getROIID(im);
9833 string roiName = b.meta.getROIName(im);
9834 ZCT co = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
9835 int scount = 1;
9836 try
9837 {
9838 scount = b.meta.getShapeCount(im);
9839 }
9840 catch (Exception e)
9841 {
9842 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
9843 }
9844 for (int sc = 0; sc < scount; sc++)
9845 {
9846 string type = b.meta.getShapeType(im, sc);
9847 ROI an = new ROI();
9848 an.roiID = roiID;
9849 an.roiName = roiName;
9850 an.shapeIndex = sc;
9851 if (type == "Point")
9852 {
9853 an.type = ROI.Type.Point;
9854 an.id = b.meta.getPointID(im, sc);
9855 double dx = b.meta.getPointX(im, sc).doubleValue();
9856 double dy = b.meta.getPointY(im, sc).doubleValue();
9857 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(dx, dy)));
9858 an.coord = new ZCT();
9859 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPointTheZ(im, sc);
9860 if (nz != null)
9861 an.coord.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
9862 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPointTheC(im, sc);
9863 if (nc != null)
9864 an.coord.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
9865 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPointTheT(im, sc);
9866 if (nt != null)
9867 an.coord.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
9868 an.Text = b.meta.getPointText(im, sc);
9869 int fs = 8;
9870 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
9871 if (fl != null)
9872 fs = fl.value().intValue();
9873 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc);
9874 if (ff != null)
9875 an.font = new Font(new FontFamily(ff.name()), fs);
9876 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
9877 if (col != null)
9878 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
9879 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPointStrokeWidth(im, sc);
9880 if (fw != null)
9881 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
9882 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
9883 if (colf != null)
9884 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
9885 }
9886 else
9887 if (type == "Line")
9888 {
9889 an.type = ROI.Type.Line;
9890 an.id = b.meta.getLineID(im, sc);
9891 double px1 = b.meta.getLineX1(im, sc).doubleValue();
9892 double py1 = b.meta.getLineY1(im, sc).doubleValue();
9893 double px2 = b.meta.getLineX2(im, sc).doubleValue();
9894 double py2 = b.meta.getLineY2(im, sc).doubleValue();
9895 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(px1, py1)));
9896 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(px2, py2)));
9897 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getLineTheZ(im, sc);
9898 if (nz != null)
9899 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
9900 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getLineTheC(im, sc);
9901 if (nc != null)
9902 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
9903 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getLineTheT(im, sc);
9904 if (nt != null)
9905 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
9906 an.coord = co;
9907 an.Text = b.meta.getLineText(im, sc);
9908 int fs = 8;
9909 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
9910 if (fl != null)
9911 fs = fl.value().intValue();
9912 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc);
9913 if (ff != null)
9914 an.font = new Font(new FontFamily(ff.name()), fs);
9915 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getLineStrokeColor(im, sc);
9916 if (col != null)
9917 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
9918 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getLineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
9919 if (fw != null)
9920 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
9921 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getLineFillColor(im, sc);
9922 if (colf != null)
9923 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
9924 }
9925 else
9926 if (type == "Rectangle")
9927 {
9928 an.type = ROI.Type.Rectangle;
9929 an.id = b.meta.getRectangleID(im, sc);
9930 double px = b.meta.getRectangleX(im, sc).doubleValue();
9931 double py = b.meta.getRectangleY(im, sc).doubleValue();
9932 double pw = b.meta.getRectangleWidth(im, sc).doubleValue();
9933 double ph = b.meta.getRectangleHeight(im, sc).doubleValue();
9934 an.Rect = b.ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, pw, ph));
9935 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getRectangleTheZ(im, sc);
9936 if (nz != null)
9937 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
9938 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getRectangleTheC(im, sc);
9939 if (nc != null)
9940 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
9941 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getRectangleTheT(im, sc);
9942 if (nt != null)
9943 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
9944 an.coord = co;
9945
9946 an.Text = b.meta.getRectangleText(im, sc);
9947 int fs = 8;
9948 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
9949 if (fl != null)
9950 fs = fl.value().intValue();
9951 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc);
9952 if (ff != null)
9953 an.font = new Font(new FontFamily(ff.name()), fs);
9954 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getRectangleStrokeColor(im, sc);
9955 if (col != null)
9956 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
9957 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getRectangleStrokeWidth(im, sc);
9958 if (fw != null)
9959 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
9960 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getRectangleFillColor(im, sc);
9961 if (colf != null)
9962 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
9963 ome.xml.model.enums.FillRule fr = b.meta.getRectangleFillRule(im, sc);
9964 }
9965 else
9966 if (type == "Ellipse")
9967 {
9968 an.type = ROI.Type.Ellipse;
9969 an.id = b.meta.getEllipseID(im, sc);
9970 double px = b.meta.getEllipseX(im, sc).doubleValue();
9971 double py = b.meta.getEllipseY(im, sc).doubleValue();
9972 double ew = b.meta.getEllipseRadiusX(im, sc).doubleValue();
9973 double eh = b.meta.getEllipseRadiusY(im, sc).doubleValue();
9974 //We convert the ellipse radius to Rectangle
9975 double w = ew * 2;
9976 double h = eh * 2;
9977 double x = px - ew;
9978 double y = py - eh;
9979 an.Rect = b.ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(x, y, w, h));
9980 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getEllipseTheZ(im, sc);
9981 if (nz != null)
9982 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
9983 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getEllipseTheC(im, sc);
9984 if (nc != null)
9985 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
9986 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getEllipseTheT(im, sc);
9987 if (nt != null)
9988 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
9989 an.coord = co;
9990 an.Text = b.meta.getEllipseText(im, sc);
9991 int fs = 8;
9992 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
9993 if (fl != null)
9994 fs = fl.value().intValue();
9995 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc);
9996 if (ff != null)
9997 an.font = new Font(new FontFamily(ff.name()), fs);
9998 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getEllipseStrokeColor(im, sc);
9999 if (col != null)
10000 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
10001 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getEllipseStrokeWidth(im, sc);
10002 if (fw != null)
10003 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
10004 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getEllipseFillColor(im, sc);
10005 if (colf != null)
10006 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
10007 }
10008 else
10009 if (type == "Polygon")
10010 {
10011 an.type = ROI.Type.Polygon;
10012 an.id = b.meta.getPolygonID(im, sc);
10013 an.closed = true;
10014 string pxs = b.meta.getPolygonPoints(im, sc);
10015 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
10016 pts = b.ToStageSpace(pts);
10017 if (pts.Length > 100)
10018 {
10019 an.type = ROI.Type.Freeform;
10020 }
10021 an.AddPoints(pts);
10022 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPolygonTheZ(im, sc);
10023 if (nz != null)
10024 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
10025 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPolygonTheC(im, sc);
10026 if (nc != null)
10027 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
10028 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPolygonTheT(im, sc);
10029 if (nt != null)
10030 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
10031 an.coord = co;
10032 an.Text = b.meta.getPolygonText(im, sc);
10033 int fs = 8;
10034 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
10035 if (fl != null)
10036 fs = fl.value().intValue();
10037 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc);
10038 if (ff != null)
10039 an.font = new Font(new FontFamily(ff.name()), fs);
10040 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPolygonStrokeColor(im, sc);
10041 if (col != null)
10042 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
10043 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPolygonStrokeWidth(im, sc);
10044 if (fw != null)
10045 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
10046 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPolygonFillColor(im, sc);
10047 if (colf != null)
10048 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
10049 }
10050 else
10051 if (type == "Polyline")
10052 {
10053 an.type = ROI.Type.Polyline;
10054 an.id = b.meta.getPolylineID(im, sc);
10055 string pxs = b.meta.getPolylinePoints(im, sc);
10056 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
10057 for (int pi = 0; pi < pts.Length; pi++)
10058 {
10059 pts[pi] = b.ToStageSpace(pts[pi]);
10060 }
10061 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(pxs));
10062 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPolylineTheZ(im, sc);
10063 if (nz != null)
10064 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
10065 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPolylineTheC(im, sc);
10066 if (nc != null)
10067 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
10068 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPolylineTheT(im, sc);
10069 if (nt != null)
10070 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
10071 an.coord = co;
10072 an.Text = b.meta.getPolylineText(im, sc);
10073 int fs = 8;
10074 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
10075 if (fl != null)
10076 fs = fl.value().intValue();
10077 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc);
10078 if (ff != null)
10079 an.font = new Font(new FontFamily(ff.name()), fs);
10080 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPolylineStrokeColor(im, sc);
10081 if (col != null)
10082 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
10083 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPolylineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
10084 if (fw != null)
10085 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
10086 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPolylineFillColor(im, sc);
10087 if (colf != null)
10088 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
10089 }
10090 else
10091 if (type == "Label")
10092 {
10093 an.type = ROI.Type.Label;
10094 an.id = b.meta.getLabelID(im, sc);
10095
10096 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getLabelTheZ(im, sc);
10097 if (nz != null)
10098 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
10099 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getLabelTheC(im, sc);
10100 if (nc != null)
10101 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
10102 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getLabelTheT(im, sc);
10103 if (nt != null)
10104 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
10105 an.coord = co;
10106
10107 int fs = 8;
10108 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
10109 if (fl != null)
10110 fs = fl.value().intValue();
10111 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc);
10112 if (ff != null)
10113 an.font = new Font(new FontFamily(ff.name()), fs);
10114 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getLabelStrokeColor(im, sc);
10115 if (col != null)
10116 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
10117 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getLabelStrokeWidth(im, sc);
10118 if (fw != null)
10119 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
10120 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getLabelFillColor(im, sc);
10121 if (colf != null)
10122 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
10123 PointD p = new PointD(b.meta.getLabelX(im, sc).doubleValue(), b.meta.getLabelY(im, sc).doubleValue());
10124 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(p));
10125 an.Text = b.meta.getLabelText(im, sc);
10126 }
10127 else
10128 if (type == "Mask")
10129 {
10130 byte[] bts = b.meta.getMaskBinData(im, sc);
10131 bool end = b.meta.getMaskBinDataBigEndian(im, sc).booleanValue();
10132 an = ROI.CreateMask(co, bts, b.Resolutions[0].SizeX, b.Resolutions[0].SizeY, new PointD(b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY), b.PhysicalSizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY);
10133 an.Text = b.meta.getMaskText(im, sc);
10134 an.id = b.meta.getMaskID(im, sc);
10135 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getMaskTheZ(im, sc);
10136 if (nz != null)
10137 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
10138 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getMaskTheC(im, sc);
10139 if (nc != null)
10140 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
10141 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getMaskTheT(im, sc);
10142 if (nt != null)
10143 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
10144 an.coord = co;
10145
10146 int fs = 8;
10147 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
10148 if (fl != null)
10149 fs = fl.value().intValue();
10150 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc);
10151 if (ff != null)
10152 an.font = new Font(new FontFamily(ff.name()), fs);
10153 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getMaskStrokeColor(im, sc);
10154 if (col != null)
10155 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
10156 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getMaskStrokeWidth(im, sc);
10157 if (fw != null)
10158 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
10159 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getMaskFillColor(im, sc);
10160 if (colf != null)
10161 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
10162 }
10163 b.Annotations.Add(an);
10164 }
10165 }
10166
10167 List<string> serFiles = new List<string>();
10168 serFiles.AddRange(reader.getSeriesUsedFiles());
10169
10170 b.Buffers = new List<BufferInfo>();
10171 if (b.Type == ImageType.pyramidal)
10172 try
10173 {
10174 string st = OpenSlideImage.DetectVendor(file);
10175 if (st != null && !file.EndsWith("ome.tif") && useOpenSlide)
10176 {
10177 b.openSlideImage = OpenSlideImage.Open(file);
10178 b.openSlideBase = (OpenSlideBase)OpenSlideGTK.SlideSourceBase.Create(file);
10179 }
10180 else
10181 {
10182 b.slideBase = new SlideBase(b,SlideImage.Open(b));
10183 }
10184 }
10185 catch (Exception e)
10186 {
10187 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
10188 b.slideBase = new SlideBase(b,SlideImage.Open(b));
10189 }
10190
10191 // read the image data bytes
10192 int pages = reader.getImageCount();
10193 bool inter = reader.isInterleaved();
10194 int z = 0;
10195 int c = 0;
10196 int t = 0;
10197 pr.Status = "Reading Image Data";
10198 if (!tile)
10199 {
10200 try
10201 {
10202 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
10203 {
10204 BufferInfo bf;
10205 pr.UpdateProgressF((float)p / (float)pages);
10206 byte[] bytes = reader.openBytes(p);
10207 bf = new BufferInfo(file, SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, bytes, new ZCT(z, c, t), p, null, b.littleEndian, inter);
10208 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
10209 }
10210 }
10211 catch (Exception)
10212 {
10213 //If we failed to read an entire plane it is likely too large so we open as pyramidal.
10214 b.Type = ImageType.pyramidal;
10215 try
10216 {
10217 string st = OpenSlideImage.DetectVendor(file);
10218 if (st != null && !file.EndsWith("ome.tif") && useOpenSlide)
10219 {
10220 b.openSlideImage = OpenSlideImage.Open(file);
10221 b.openSlideBase = (OpenSlideBase)OpenSlideGTK.SlideSourceBase.Create(file);
10222 }
10223 else
10224 {
10225 b.slideBase = new SlideBase(b, SlideImage.Open(b));
10226 }
10227 }
10228 catch (Exception e)
10229 {
10230 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
10231 b.slideBase = new SlideBase(b, SlideImage.Open(b));
10232 }
10233 b.imRead = reader;
10234 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
10235 {
10236 b.Buffers.Add(GetTile(b, p, serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY));
10237 Statistics.CalcStatistics(b.Buffers.Last());
10238 }
10239 }
10240
10241 }
10242 else
10243 {
10244 b.imRead = reader;
10245 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
10246 {
10247 b.Buffers.Add(GetTile(b, p, serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY));
10248 Statistics.CalcStatistics(b.Buffers.Last());
10249 }
10250 }
10251 int pls;
10252 try
10253 {
10254 pls = b.meta.getPlaneCount(serie);
10255 }
10256 catch (Exception)
10257 {
10258 pls = 0;
10259 }
10260 pr.Status = "Reading Plane Data";
10261 if (pls == b.Buffers.Count)
10262 for (int bi = 0; bi < b.Buffers.Count; bi++)
10263 {
10264 Plane pl = new Plane();
10265 pl.Coordinate = new ZCT();
10266 double px = 0; double py = 0; double pz = 0;
10267 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionX(serie, bi) != null)
10268 px = b.meta.getPlanePositionX(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
10269 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionY(serie, bi) != null)
10270 py = b.meta.getPlanePositionY(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
10271 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionZ(serie, bi) != null)
10272 pz = b.meta.getPlanePositionZ(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
10273 pl.Location = new Point3D(px, py, pz);
10274 int cc = 0; int zc = 0; int tc = 0;
10275 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi) != null)
10276 cc = b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
10277 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheZ(serie, bi) != null)
10278 zc = b.meta.getPlaneTheZ(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
10279 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheT(serie, bi) != null)
10280 tc = b.meta.getPlaneTheT(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
10281 pl.Coordinate = new ZCT(zc, cc, tc);
10282 if (b.meta.getPlaneDeltaT(serie, bi) != null)
10283 pl.Delta = b.meta.getPlaneDeltaT(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
10284 if (b.meta.getPlaneExposureTime(serie, bi) != null)
10285 pl.Exposure = b.meta.getPlaneExposureTime(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
10286 b.Buffers[bi].Plane = pl;
10287 }
10288
10289 b.UpdateCoords(b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT, order);
10290 //We wait for histogram image statistics calculation
10291 do
10292 {
10293 Thread.Sleep(50);
10294 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
10295 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
10296 AutoThreshold(b, true);
10297 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
10298 b.StackThreshold(true);
10299 else
10300 b.StackThreshold(false);
10301
10302 //We use a try block to close the reader as sometimes this will cause an error.
10303 bool stop = false;
10304 do
10305 {
10306 try
10307 {
10308 reader.close();
10309 stop = true;
10310 }
10311 catch (Exception e)
10312 {
10313 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
10314 }
10315 } while (!stop);
10316 b.Loading = false;
10317 b.SetLabelMacroResolutions();
10318 Console.WriteLine("Opening complete " + file);
10319 pr.Close();
10320 if (addToImages)
10321 Images.AddImage(b, tab);
10322 return b;
10323 }
10324 public ImageReader imRead = null;
10325 byte[] bts;
10326 int ssx, ssy;
10327 public static int FindFocus(BioImage im, int Channel, int Time)
10328 {
10329
10330 long mf = 0;
10331 int fr = 0;
10332 List<double> dt = new List<double>();
10333 ZCT c = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
10334 for (int i = 0; i < im.SizeZ; i++)
10335 {
10336 long f = CalculateFocusQuality(im.Buffers[im.Coords[i, Channel, Time]]);
10337 dt.Add(f);
10338 if (f > mf)
10339 {
10340 mf = f;
10341 fr = im.Coords[i, Channel, Time];
10342 }
10343 }
10344 Plot pl = new Plot(dt.ToArray(), "Focus");
10345 return fr;
10346 }
10347 static long CalculateFocusQuality(BufferInfo b)
10348 {
10349 if (b.RGBChannelsCount == 1)
10350 {
10351 long sum = 0;
10352 long sumOfSquaresR = 0;
10353 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
10354 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
10355 {
10356 ColorS pixel = b.GetPixel(x, y);
10357 sum += pixel.R;
10358 sumOfSquaresR += pixel.R * pixel.R;
10359 }
10360 return sumOfSquaresR * b.SizeX * b.SizeY - sum * sum;
10361 }
10362 else
10363 {
10364 long sum = 0;
10365 long sumOfSquares = 0;
10366 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
10367 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
10368 {
10369 ColorS pixel = b.GetPixel(x, y);
10370 int p = (pixel.R + pixel.G + pixel.B) / 3;
10371 sum += p;
10372 sumOfSquares += p * p;
10373 }
10374 return sumOfSquares * b.SizeX * b.SizeY - sum * sum;
10375 }
10376 }
10377 public static BufferInfo ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff(BioImage b, int x, int y, int width, int height, int res)
10378 {
10379 try
10380 {
10381
10382 NetVips.Image subImage = b.vipPages[res].Crop(x, y, width, height);
10383 if (b.vipPages[res].Format == NetVips.Enums.BandFormat.Uchar)
10384 {
10385 BufferInfo bm;
10386 byte[] imageData = subImage.WriteToMemory();
10387 if (b.Resolutions[res].RGBChannelsCount == 3)
10388 bm = new BufferInfo(b.file, subImage.Width, subImage.Height, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, imageData, new ZCT(), res);
10389 else
10390 bm = new BufferInfo(b.file, subImage.Width, subImage.Height, PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed, imageData, new ZCT(), res);
10391 return bm;
10392
10393 }
10394 else if (b.vipPages[res].Format == NetVips.Enums.BandFormat.Ushort)
10395 {
10396 BufferInfo bm;
10397 byte[] imageData = subImage.WriteToMemory();
10398 if (b.Resolutions[res].RGBChannelsCount == 3)
10399 bm = new BufferInfo(b.file, subImage.Width, subImage.Height, PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb, imageData, new ZCT(), res);
10400 else
10401 bm = new BufferInfo(b.file, subImage.Width, subImage.Height, PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale, imageData, new ZCT(), res);
10402 return bm;
10403 }
10404 }
10405 catch (Exception ex)
10406 {
10407 Console.WriteLine($"Error: {ex.Message}");
10408 return null;
10409 }
10410 return null;
10411 }
10424 public static BufferInfo GetTile(BioImage b, ZCT coord, int serie, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY, bool OpenSlide = true)
10425 {
10426 if ((b.file.EndsWith("ome.tif") && vips) || (b.file.EndsWith(".tif") && vips))
10427 {
10428 //We can get a tile faster with libvips rather than bioformats.
10429 //and incase we are on mac we can't use bioformats due to IKVM not supporting mac.
10430 return ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff(b, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY, serie);
10431 }
10432 //We check if we can open this with OpenSlide as this is faster than Bioformats with IKVM.
10433 if (b.openSlideImage != null && OpenSlide && !b.file.EndsWith("ome.tif"))
10434 {
10435 return new BufferInfo(tileSizeX, tileSizeY, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb, b.openSlideImage.ReadRegion(serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY), coord, "");
10436 }
10437 if (b.imRead == null)
10438 b.imRead = new ImageReader();
10439 string s = b.imRead.getCurrentFile();
10440 b.file = b.file.Replace("\\", "/");
10441 if (s == null)
10442 b.imRead.setId(b.file);
10443 if (b.imRead.getSeries() != serie)
10444 b.imRead.setSeries(serie);
10445 int SizeX = b.imRead.getSizeX();
10446 int SizeY = b.imRead.getSizeY();
10447 int p = b.Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
10448 bool littleEndian = b.imRead.isLittleEndian();
10449 PixelFormat px = b.Resolutions[serie].PixelFormat;
10450 if (tilex < 0)
10451 tilex = 0;
10452 if (tiley < 0)
10453 tiley = 0;
10454 if (tilex >= SizeX)
10455 tilex = SizeX - 1;
10456 if (tiley >= SizeY)
10457 tiley = SizeY - 1;
10458 int sx = tileSizeX;
10459 if (tilex + tileSizeX > SizeX)
10460 sx -= (tilex + tileSizeX) - (SizeX);
10461 int sy = tileSizeY;
10462 if (tiley + tileSizeY > SizeY)
10463 sy -= (tiley + tileSizeY) - (SizeY);
10464 if (sx <= 0)
10465 return null;
10466 if (sy <= 0)
10467 return null;
10468 try
10469 {
10470 byte[] bytesr = b.imRead.openBytes(b.Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T], tilex, tiley, sx, sy);
10471 bool interleaved = b.imRead.isInterleaved();
10472 BufferInfo bm = new BufferInfo(b.file, sx, sy, px, bytesr, coord, p, null, littleEndian, interleaved);
10473 return bm;
10474 }
10475 catch (Exception e)
10476 {
10477 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
10478 return null;
10479 }
10480
10481 }
10482 public static BufferInfo GetTile(BioImage b, int index, int serie, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY, bool OpenSlide = true)
10483 {
10484 if ((b.file.EndsWith("ome.tif") && vips) || (b.file.EndsWith(".tif") && vips))
10485 {
10486 //We can get a tile faster with libvips rather than bioformats.
10487 //and incase we are on mac we can't use bioformats due to IKVM not supporting mac.
10488 return ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff(b, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY, serie);
10489 }
10490 //We check if we can open this with OpenSlide as this is faster than Bioformats with IKVM.
10491 if (b.openSlideImage != null && OpenSlide && !b.file.EndsWith("ome.tif"))
10492 {
10493 return new BufferInfo(tileSizeX, tileSizeY, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb, b.openSlideImage.ReadRegion(serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY), new ZCT(), "");
10494 }
10495 if (b.imRead == null)
10496 b.imRead = new ImageReader();
10497 string s = b.imRead.getCurrentFile();
10498 b.file = b.file.Replace("\\", "/");
10499 if (s == null)
10500 b.imRead.setId(b.file);
10501 if (b.imRead.getSeries() != serie)
10502 b.imRead.setSeries(serie);
10503 int SizeX = b.imRead.getSizeX();
10504 int SizeY = b.imRead.getSizeY();
10505 bool littleEndian = b.imRead.isLittleEndian();
10506 PixelFormat px = b.Resolutions[serie].PixelFormat;
10507 if (tilex < 0)
10508 tilex = 0;
10509 if (tiley < 0)
10510 tiley = 0;
10511 if (tilex >= SizeX)
10512 tilex = SizeX - 1;
10513 if (tiley >= SizeY)
10514 tiley = SizeY - 1;
10515 int sx = tileSizeX;
10516 if (tilex + tileSizeX > SizeX)
10517 sx -= (tilex + tileSizeX) - (SizeX);
10518 int sy = tileSizeY;
10519 if (tiley + tileSizeY > SizeY)
10520 sy -= (tiley + tileSizeY) - (SizeY);
10521 if (sx <= 0)
10522 return null;
10523 if (sy <= 0)
10524 return null;
10525 byte[] bytesr = b.imRead.openBytes(index, tilex, tiley, sx, sy);
10526 bool interleaved = b.imRead.isInterleaved();
10527 BufferInfo bm = new BufferInfo(b.file, sx, sy, px, bytesr, new ZCT(), index, null, littleEndian, interleaved);
10528 return bm;
10529 }
10530 public Bitmap GetTileRGB(ZCT coord, int serie, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY)
10531 {
10532 return (Bitmap)GetTile(this, coord, serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY).ImageRGB;
10533 }
10534 static NetVips.Image netim;
10535 public static bool VipsSupport(string file)
10536 {
10537 NetVips.Image im;
10538 try
10539 {
10540 im = NetVips.Image.Tiffload(file);
10541 }
10542 catch (Exception e)
10543 {
10544 Console.WriteLine(e.ToString());
10545 return false;
10546 }
10547 im.Close();
10548 im.Dispose();
10549 return true;
10550 }
10555 public void StackThreshold(bool bit16)
10556 {
10557 if (bit16)
10558 {
10559 for (int ch = 0; ch < Channels.Count; ch++)
10560 {
10561 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[ch].range.Length; i++)
10562 {
10563 Channels[ch].range[i].Min = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMin;
10564 Channels[ch].range[i].Max = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMax;
10565 }
10566 Channels[ch].BitsPerPixel = 16;
10567 }
10568 bitsPerPixel = 16;
10569 }
10570 else
10571 {
10572 for (int ch = 0; ch < Channels.Count; ch++)
10573 {
10574 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[ch].range.Length; i++)
10575 {
10576 Channels[ch].range[i].Min = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMin;
10577 Channels[ch].range[i].Max = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMax;
10578 }
10579 Channels[ch].BitsPerPixel = 8;
10580 }
10581 bitsPerPixel = 8;
10582 }
10583 }
10594 public static int GetBitsPerPixel(int bt)
10595 {
10596 if (bt <= 255)
10597 return 8;
10598 if (bt <= 512)
10599 return 9;
10600 else if (bt <= 1023)
10601 return 10;
10602 else if (bt <= 2047)
10603 return 11;
10604 else if (bt <= 4095)
10605 return 12;
10606 else if (bt <= 8191)
10607 return 13;
10608 else if (bt <= 16383)
10609 return 14;
10610 else if (bt <= 32767)
10611 return 15;
10612 else
10613 return 16;
10614 }
10620 public static int GetBitMaxValue(int bt)
10621 {
10622 if (bt == 8)
10623 return 255;
10624 if (bt == 9)
10625 return 512;
10626 else if (bt == 10)
10627 return 1023;
10628 else if (bt == 11)
10629 return 2047;
10630 else if (bt == 12)
10631 return 4095;
10632 else if (bt == 13)
10633 return 8191;
10634 else if (bt == 14)
10635 return 16383;
10636 else if (bt == 15)
10637 return 32767;
10638 else
10639 return 65535;
10640 }
10650 public static PixelFormat GetPixelFormat(int rgbChannelCount, int bitsPerPixel)
10651 {
10652 if (bitsPerPixel == 8)
10653 {
10654 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
10655 return PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
10656 else if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
10657 return PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
10658 else if (rgbChannelCount == 4)
10659 return PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
10660 }
10661 else
10662 {
10663 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
10664 return PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
10665 if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
10666 return PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
10667 }
10668 throw new NotSupportedException("Not supported pixel format.");
10669 }
10670 public static PixelFormat GetPixelFormat(int rgbChannelCount, ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType px)
10671 {
10672 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
10673 {
10674 if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT8 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8)
10675 return PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
10676 else if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT16 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16)
10677 return PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
10678 }
10679 else
10680 {
10681 if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT8 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8)
10682 return PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
10683 else if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT16 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16)
10684 return PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
10685 }
10686 throw new NotSupportedException("Not supported pixel format.");
10687 }
10694 public static BioImage[] OpenOMESeries(string file, bool newTab, bool addToImages)
10695 {
10696 reader = new ImageReader();
10697 var meta = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
10698 reader.setMetadataStore((MetadataStore)meta);
10699 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
10700 reader.setId(file);
10701 bool tile = false;
10702 if (reader.getOptimalTileWidth() != reader.getSizeX())
10703 tile = true;
10704 int count = reader.getSeriesCount();
10705 BioImage[] bs = null;
10706 if (tile)
10707 {
10708 bs = new BioImage[1];
10709 bs[0] = OpenOME(file, 0, newTab, addToImages, true, 0, 0, Screen.PrimaryScreen.Bounds.Width, Screen.PrimaryScreen.Bounds.Height);
10710 return bs;
10711 }
10712 else
10713 bs = new BioImage[count];
10714 reader.close();
10715 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
10716 {
10717 bs[i] = OpenOME(file, i,newTab,addToImages);
10718 if (bs[i] == null)
10719 return null;
10720 }
10721 return bs;
10722 }
10726 public static async Task OpenAsync(string file, bool OME, bool newtab, bool images, int series)
10727 {
10728 openfile = file;
10729 omes = OME;
10730 tab = newtab;
10731 add = images;
10732 serie = series;
10733 await Task.Run(OpenThread);
10734 }
10738 public static async Task OpenAsync(string[] files, bool OME, bool tab, bool images)
10739 {
10740 foreach (string file in files)
10741 {
10742 await OpenAsync(file, OME, tab, images, 0);
10743 }
10744 }
10745
10752 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, int series, bool tab, bool addToImages)
10753 {
10754 return OpenFile(file, series, tab, addToImages, false, 0,0,0,0);
10755 }
10756
10757 static string openfile;
10758 static bool omes, tab, add;
10759 static int serie;
10760 static void OpenThread()
10761 {
10762 OpenFile(openfile, serie, tab, add);
10763 }
10764 static string savefile, saveid;
10765 static bool some;
10766 static int sserie;
10767 static void SaveThread()
10768 {
10769 if (omes)
10770 SaveOME(savefile, saveid);
10771 else
10772 SaveFile(savefile, saveid);
10773 }
10786 public static async Task SaveAsync(string file, string id, int serie, bool ome)
10787 {
10788 savefile = file;
10789 saveid = id;
10790 some = ome;
10791 await Task.Run(SaveThread);
10792 }
10793
10794 static List<string> sts = new List<string>();
10795 static void SaveSeriesThread()
10796 {
10797 if (omes)
10798 {
10799 BioImage[] bms = new BioImage[sts.Count];
10800 int i = 0;
10801 foreach (string st in sts)
10802 {
10803 bms[i] = Images.GetImage(st);
10804 }
10805 SaveOMESeries(bms, savefile, Planes);
10806 }
10807 else
10808 SaveSeries(sts.ToArray(), savefile);
10809 }
10819 public static async Task SaveSeriesAsync(BioImage[] imgs, string file, bool ome)
10820 {
10821 sts.Clear();
10822 foreach (BioImage item in imgs)
10823 {
10824 sts.Add(item.ID);
10825 }
10826 savefile = file;
10827 some = ome;
10828 await Task.Run(SaveSeriesThread);
10829 }
10830 static Enums.ForeignTiffCompression comp;
10831 static int compLev = 0;
10832 static BioImage[] bms;
10833 static void SavePyramidalThread()
10834 {
10835 SaveOMEPyramidal(bms, savefile, comp, compLev);
10836 }
10850 public static async Task SavePyramidalAsync(BioImage[] imgs, string file, Enums.ForeignTiffCompression com, int compLevel)
10851 {
10852 bms = imgs;
10853 savefile = file;
10854 comp = com;
10855 compLev = compLevel;
10856 await Task.Run(SavePyramidalThread);
10857 }
10858 private static List<string> openOMEfile = new List<string>();
10860 private static void OpenOME()
10861 {
10862 foreach (string f in openOMEfile)
10863 {
10864 OpenOME(f, 0, true, true, false, 0,0,0,0);
10865 }
10866 openOMEfile.Clear();
10867 }
10868 private static string saveOMEfile;
10869 private static string saveOMEID;
10873 public static void Open(string file)
10874 {
10875 OpenFile(file);
10876 }
10880 public static void Open(string[] files)
10881 {
10882 foreach (string file in files)
10883 {
10884 Open(file);
10885 }
10886 }
10891 public static void Save(string file, string ID)
10892 {
10893 SaveFile(file, ID);
10894 }
10896 private static void SaveOME()
10897 {
10898 SaveOME(saveOMEfile, saveOMEID);
10899 }
10900
10906 public static BioImage ImagesToStack(string[] files)
10907 {
10908 BioImage[] bs = new BioImage[files.Length];
10909 int z = 0;
10910 int c = 0;
10911 int t = 0;
10912 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
10913 {
10914 string str = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(files[i]);
10915 str = str.Replace(".ome", "");
10916 string[] st = str.Split('_');
10917 if (st.Length > 3)
10918 {
10919 z = int.Parse(st[1].Replace("Z", ""));
10920 c = int.Parse(st[2].Replace("C", ""));
10921 t = int.Parse(st[3].Replace("T", ""));
10922 }
10923 if (i == 0)
10924 bs[0] = OpenOME(files[i]);
10925 else
10926 {
10927 bs[i] = OpenFile(files[i], 0, true);
10928 }
10929 }
10930 BioImage b = BioImage.CopyInfo(bs[0], true, true);
10931 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
10932 {
10933 for (int bc = 0; bc < bs[i].Buffers.Count; bc++)
10934 {
10935 b.Buffers.Add(bs[i].Buffers[bc]);
10936 }
10937 }
10938 b.UpdateCoords(z + 1, c + 1, t + 1);
10939 return b;
10940 }
10944 public static void Update(BioImage b)
10945 {
10946 b = OpenFile(b.file);
10947 }
10949 public void Update()
10950 {
10951 Update(this);
10952 }
10953
10954 private static List<Resolution> GetResolutions()
10955 {
10956 List<Resolution> rss = new List<Resolution>();
10957 int seriesCount = reader.getSeriesCount();
10958 for (int s = 0; s < seriesCount; s++)
10959 {
10960 reader.setSeries(s);
10961 IMetadata meta = (IMetadata)reader.getMetadataStore();
10962 for (int r = 0; r < reader.getResolutionCount(); r++)
10963 {
10964 Resolution res = new Resolution();
10965 try
10966 {
10967 int rgbc = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
10968 int bps = reader.getBitsPerPixel();
10969 PixelFormat px;
10970 try
10971 {
10972 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, meta.getPixelsType(r));
10973 }
10974 catch (Exception)
10975 {
10976 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, bps);
10977 }
10978 res.PixelFormat = px;
10979 res.SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
10980 res.SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
10981 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(r) != null)
10982 {
10983 res.PhysicalSizeX = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(r).value().doubleValue();
10984 }
10985 else
10986 res.PhysicalSizeX = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
10987 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(r) != null)
10988 {
10989 res.PhysicalSizeY = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(r).value().doubleValue();
10990 }
10991 else
10992 res.PhysicalSizeY = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
10993
10994 if (meta.getStageLabelX(r) != null)
10995 res.StageSizeX = meta.getStageLabelX(r).value().doubleValue();
10996 if (meta.getStageLabelY(r) != null)
10997 res.StageSizeY = meta.getStageLabelY(r).value().doubleValue();
10998 if (meta.getStageLabelZ(r) != null)
10999 res.StageSizeZ = meta.getStageLabelZ(r).value().doubleValue();
11000 else
11001 res.StageSizeZ = 1;
11002 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(r) != null)
11003 {
11004 res.PhysicalSizeZ = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(r).value().doubleValue();
11005 }
11006 else
11007 {
11008 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
11009 }
11010 }
11011 catch (Exception e)
11012 {
11013 Console.WriteLine("No Stage Coordinates. PhysicalSize:(" + res.PhysicalSizeX + "," + res.PhysicalSizeY + "," + res.PhysicalSizeZ + ")");
11014 }
11015 rss.Add(res);
11016 }
11017 }
11018 return rss;
11019 }
11020 private static int GetPyramidCount()
11021 {
11022 List<Resolution> rss = GetResolutions();
11023 //We need to determine if this image is pyramidal or not.
11024 //We do this by seeing if the resolutions are downsampled or not.
11025 //We also need to determine number of pyramids in this image and which belong to the series we are opening.
11026 List<Tuple<int, int>> prs = new List<Tuple<int, int>>();
11027 int? sr = null;
11028 for (int r = 0; r < rss.Count - 1; r++)
11029 {
11030 if (rss[r].SizeX > rss[r + 1].SizeX && rss[r].PixelFormat == rss[r + 1].PixelFormat)
11031 {
11032 if (sr == null)
11033 {
11034 sr = r;
11035 prs.Add(new Tuple<int, int>(r, 0));
11036 }
11037 }
11038 else
11039 {
11040 if (rss[prs[prs.Count - 1].Item1].PixelFormat == rss[r].PixelFormat)
11041 prs[prs.Count - 1] = new Tuple<int, int>(prs[prs.Count - 1].Item1, r);
11042 sr = null;
11043 }
11044 }
11045 return prs.Count;
11046 }
11047 public static int GetSeriesCount(string file)
11048 {
11049 reader.setId(file);
11050 int i = reader.getSeriesCount();
11051 int prs = GetPyramidCount();
11052 reader.close();
11053 if (prs > 0)
11054 return prs;
11055 else
11056 return i;
11057 }
11058
11059 private static Stopwatch st = new Stopwatch();
11060 private static ServiceFactory factory;
11061 private static OMEXMLService service;
11062 private static ImageReader reader;
11063 private static ImageWriter writer;
11064 private loci.formats.meta.IMetadata meta;
11065
11066 //We use UNIX type line endings since they are supported by ImageJ & BioImage.
11067 public const char NewLine = '\n';
11068 public const string columns = "ROIID,ROINAME,TYPE,ID,SHAPEINDEX,TEXT,S,C,Z,T,X,Y,W,H,POINTS,STROKECOLOR,STROKECOLORW,FILLCOLOR,FONTSIZE\n";
11069
11075 public static string OpenXML(string file)
11076 {
11077 if (!file.EndsWith(".tif"))
11078 return null;
11079 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
11080 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
11081 return f[0].ToString();
11082 }
11083
11090 public static List<ROI> OpenOMEROIs(string file, int series)
11091 {
11092 List<ROI> Annotations = new List<ROI>();
11093 // create OME-XML metadata store
11094 ServiceFactory factory = new ServiceFactory();
11095 OMEXMLService service = (OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService));
11096 loci.formats.ome.OMEXMLMetadata meta = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
11097 // create format reader
11098 ImageReader imageReader = new ImageReader();
11099 imageReader.setMetadataStore(meta);
11100 // initialize file
11101 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
11102 imageReader.setId(file);
11103 int imageCount = imageReader.getImageCount();
11104 int seriesCount = imageReader.getSeriesCount();
11105 double physicalSizeX = 0;
11106 double physicalSizeY = 0;
11107 double physicalSizeZ = 0;
11108 double stageSizeX = 0;
11109 double stageSizeY = 0;
11110 double stageSizeZ = 0;
11111 int SizeX = imageReader.getSizeX();
11112 int SizeY = imageReader.getSizeY();
11113 int SizeZ = imageReader.getSizeY();
11114 try
11115 {
11116 bool hasPhysical = false;
11117 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(series) != null)
11118 {
11119 physicalSizeX = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(series).value().doubleValue();
11120 hasPhysical = true;
11121 }
11122 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(series) != null)
11123 {
11124 physicalSizeY = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(series).value().doubleValue();
11125 }
11126 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(series) != null)
11127 {
11128 physicalSizeZ = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(series).value().doubleValue();
11129 }
11130 else
11131 {
11132 physicalSizeZ = 1;
11133 }
11134 if (meta.getStageLabelX(series) != null)
11135 stageSizeX = meta.getStageLabelX(series).value().doubleValue();
11136 if (meta.getStageLabelY(series) != null)
11137 stageSizeY = meta.getStageLabelY(series).value().doubleValue();
11138 if (meta.getStageLabelZ(series) != null)
11139 stageSizeZ = meta.getStageLabelZ(series).value().doubleValue();
11140 else
11141 stageSizeZ = 1;
11142 }
11143 catch (Exception e)
11144 {
11145 stageSizeX = 0;
11146 stageSizeY = 0;
11147 stageSizeZ = 1;
11148 }
11149 VolumeD volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(stageSizeX, stageSizeY, stageSizeZ), new Point3D(physicalSizeX * SizeX, physicalSizeY * SizeY, physicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
11150 int rc = meta.getROICount();
11151 for (int im = 0; im < rc; im++)
11152 {
11153 string roiID = meta.getROIID(im);
11154 string roiName = meta.getROIName(im);
11155 ZCT co = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
11156 int scount = 1;
11157 try
11158 {
11159 scount = meta.getShapeCount(im);
11160 }
11161 catch (Exception e)
11162 {
11163 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
11164 }
11165 for (int sc = 0; sc < scount; sc++)
11166 {
11167 string type = meta.getShapeType(im, sc);
11168 ROI an = new ROI();
11169 an.roiID = roiID;
11170 an.roiName = roiName;
11171 an.shapeIndex = sc;
11172 if (type == "Point")
11173 {
11174 an.type = ROI.Type.Point;
11175 an.id = meta.getPointID(im, sc);
11176 double dx = meta.getPointX(im, sc).doubleValue();
11177 double dy = meta.getPointY(im, sc).doubleValue();
11178 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(dx, dy), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
11179 an.coord = new ZCT();
11180 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPointTheZ(im, sc);
11181 if (nz != null)
11182 an.coord.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
11183 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPointTheC(im, sc);
11184 if (nc != null)
11185 an.coord.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
11186 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPointTheT(im, sc);
11187 if (nt != null)
11188 an.coord.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
11189 an.Text = meta.getPointText(im, sc);
11190 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
11191 if (fl != null)
11192 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
11193 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
11194 if (col != null)
11195 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
11196 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPointStrokeWidth(im, sc);
11197 if (fw != null)
11198 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
11199 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
11200 if (colf != null)
11201 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
11202 }
11203 else
11204 if (type == "Line")
11205 {
11206 an.type = ROI.Type.Line;
11207 an.id = meta.getLineID(im, sc);
11208 double px1 = meta.getLineX1(im, sc).doubleValue();
11209 double py1 = meta.getLineY1(im, sc).doubleValue();
11210 double px2 = meta.getLineX2(im, sc).doubleValue();
11211 double py2 = meta.getLineY2(im, sc).doubleValue();
11212 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(px1, py1), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
11213 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(px2, py2), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
11214 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getLineTheZ(im, sc);
11215 if (nz != null)
11216 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
11217 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getLineTheC(im, sc);
11218 if (nc != null)
11219 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
11220 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getLineTheT(im, sc);
11221 if (nt != null)
11222 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
11223 an.coord = co;
11224 an.Text = meta.getLineText(im, sc);
11225 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getLineFontSize(im, sc);
11226 if (fl != null)
11227 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
11228 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getLineStrokeColor(im, sc);
11229 if (col != null)
11230 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
11231 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getLineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
11232 if (fw != null)
11233 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
11234 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getLineFillColor(im, sc);
11235 if (colf != null)
11236 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
11237 }
11238 else
11239 if (type == "Rectangle")
11240 {
11241 an.type = ROI.Type.Rectangle;
11242 an.id = meta.getRectangleID(im, sc);
11243 double px = meta.getRectangleX(im, sc).doubleValue();
11244 double py = meta.getRectangleY(im, sc).doubleValue();
11245 double pw = meta.getRectangleWidth(im, sc).doubleValue();
11246 double ph = meta.getRectangleHeight(im, sc).doubleValue();
11247 an.Rect = ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, pw, ph), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
11248 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getRectangleTheZ(im, sc);
11249 if (nz != null)
11250 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
11251 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getRectangleTheC(im, sc);
11252 if (nc != null)
11253 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
11254 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getRectangleTheT(im, sc);
11255 if (nt != null)
11256 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
11257 an.coord = co;
11258
11259 an.Text = meta.getRectangleText(im, sc);
11260 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getRectangleFontSize(im, sc);
11261 if (fl != null)
11262 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
11263 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getRectangleStrokeColor(im, sc);
11264 if (col != null)
11265 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
11266 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getRectangleStrokeWidth(im, sc);
11267 if (fw != null)
11268 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
11269 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getRectangleFillColor(im, sc);
11270 if (colf != null)
11271 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
11272 ome.xml.model.enums.FillRule fr = meta.getRectangleFillRule(im, sc);
11273 }
11274 else
11275 if (type == "Ellipse")
11276 {
11277 an.type = ROI.Type.Ellipse;
11278 an.id = meta.getEllipseID(im, sc);
11279 double px = meta.getEllipseX(im, sc).doubleValue();
11280 double py = meta.getEllipseY(im, sc).doubleValue();
11281 double ew = meta.getEllipseRadiusX(im, sc).doubleValue();
11282 double eh = meta.getEllipseRadiusY(im, sc).doubleValue();
11283 //We convert the ellipse radius to System.Drawing.Rectangle
11284 double w = ew * 2;
11285 double h = eh * 2;
11286 double x = px - ew;
11287 double y = py - eh;
11288 an.Rect = ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, w, h), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
11289 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getEllipseTheZ(im, sc);
11290 if (nz != null)
11291 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
11292 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getEllipseTheC(im, sc);
11293 if (nc != null)
11294 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
11295 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getEllipseTheT(im, sc);
11296 if (nt != null)
11297 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
11298 an.coord = co;
11299 an.Text = meta.getEllipseText(im, sc);
11300 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getEllipseFontSize(im, sc);
11301 if (fl != null)
11302 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
11303 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getEllipseStrokeColor(im, sc);
11304 if (col != null)
11305 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
11306 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getEllipseStrokeWidth(im, sc);
11307 if (fw != null)
11308 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
11309 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getEllipseFillColor(im, sc);
11310 if (colf != null)
11311 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
11312 }
11313 else
11314 if (type == "Polygon")
11315 {
11316 an.type = ROI.Type.Polygon;
11317 an.id = meta.getPolygonID(im, sc);
11318 an.closed = true;
11319 string pxs = meta.getPolygonPoints(im, sc);
11320 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
11321 pts = ToStageSpace(pts, physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
11322 if (pts.Length > 100)
11323 {
11324 an.type = ROI.Type.Freeform;
11325 }
11326 an.AddPoints(pts);
11327 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPolygonTheZ(im, sc);
11328 if (nz != null)
11329 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
11330 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPolygonTheC(im, sc);
11331 if (nc != null)
11332 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
11333 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPolygonTheT(im, sc);
11334 if (nt != null)
11335 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
11336 an.coord = co;
11337 an.Text = meta.getPolygonText(im, sc);
11338 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPolygonFontSize(im, sc);
11339 if (fl != null)
11340 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
11341 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPolygonStrokeColor(im, sc);
11342 if (col != null)
11343 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
11344 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPolygonStrokeWidth(im, sc);
11345 if (fw != null)
11346 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
11347 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPolygonFillColor(im, sc);
11348 if (colf != null)
11349 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
11350 }
11351 else
11352 if (type == "Polyline")
11353 {
11354 an.type = ROI.Type.Polyline;
11355 an.id = meta.getPolylineID(im, sc);
11356 string pxs = meta.getPolylinePoints(im, sc);
11357 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
11358 for (int pi = 0; pi < pts.Length; pi++)
11359 {
11360 pts[pi] = ToStageSpace(pts[pi], physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
11361 }
11362 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(pxs));
11363 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPolylineTheZ(im, sc);
11364 if (nz != null)
11365 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
11366 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPolylineTheC(im, sc);
11367 if (nc != null)
11368 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
11369 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPolylineTheT(im, sc);
11370 if (nt != null)
11371 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
11372 an.coord = co;
11373 an.Text = meta.getPolylineText(im, sc);
11374 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPolylineFontSize(im, sc);
11375 if (fl != null)
11376 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
11377 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPolylineStrokeColor(im, sc);
11378 if (col != null)
11379 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
11380 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPolylineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
11381 if (fw != null)
11382 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
11383 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPolylineFillColor(im, sc);
11384 if (colf != null)
11385 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
11386 }
11387 else
11388 if (type == "Label")
11389 {
11390 an.type = ROI.Type.Label;
11391 an.id = meta.getLabelID(im, sc);
11392
11393 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getLabelTheZ(im, sc);
11394 if (nz != null)
11395 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
11396 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getLabelTheC(im, sc);
11397 if (nc != null)
11398 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
11399 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getLabelTheT(im, sc);
11400 if (nt != null)
11401 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
11402 an.coord = co;
11403
11404 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getLabelFontSize(im, sc);
11405 if (fl != null)
