11406 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
11407 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getLabelStrokeColor(im, sc);
11408 if (col != null)
11409 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
11410 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getLabelStrokeWidth(im, sc);
11411 if (fw != null)
11412 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
11413 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getLabelFillColor(im, sc);
11414 if (colf != null)
11415 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
11416 PointD p = new PointD(meta.getLabelX(im, sc).doubleValue(), meta.getLabelY(im, sc).doubleValue());
11417 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(p, physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
11418 an.Text = meta.getLabelText(im, sc);
11419 }
11420 }
11421 }
11422
11423 imageReader.close();
11424 return Annotations;
11425 }
11431 public static string ROIsToString(List<ROI> Annotations)
11432 {
11433 string s = "";
11434 for (int i = 0; i < Annotations.Count; i++)
11435 {
11436 s += ROIToString(Annotations[i]);
11437 }
11438 return s;
11439 }
11445 public static string ROIToString(ROI an)
11446 {
11447 PointD[] points = an.GetPoints();
11448 string pts = "";
11449 for (int j = 0; j < points.Length; j++)
11450 {
11451 if (j == points.Length - 1)
11452 pts += points[j].X.ToString() + "," + points[j].Y.ToString();
11453 else
11454 pts += points[j].X.ToString() + "," + points[j].Y.ToString() + " ";
11455 }
11456 char sep = (char)34;
11457 string sColor = sep.ToString() + an.strokeColor.A.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.R.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.G.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.B.ToString() + sep.ToString();
11458 string bColor = sep.ToString() + an.fillColor.A.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.R.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.G.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.B.ToString() + sep.ToString();
11459
11460 string line = an.roiID + ',' + an.roiName + ',' + an.type.ToString() + ',' + an.id + ',' + an.shapeIndex.ToString() + ',' +
11461 an.Text + ',' + an.serie + ',' + an.coord.Z.ToString() + ',' + an.coord.C.ToString() + ',' + an.coord.T.ToString() + ',' + an.X.ToString() + ',' + an.Y.ToString() + ',' +
11462 an.W.ToString() + ',' + an.H.ToString() + ',' + sep.ToString() + pts + sep.ToString() + ',' + sColor + ',' + an.strokeWidth.ToString() + ',' + bColor + ',' + an.font.Size.ToString() + ',' + NewLine;
11463 return line;
11464 }
11470 public static ROI StringToROI(string sts)
11471 {
11472 //Works with either comma or tab separated values.
11473 if (sts.StartsWith("<?xml") || sts.StartsWith("{"))
11474 return null;
11475 ROI an = new ROI();
11476 string val = "";
11477 bool inSep = false;
11478 int col = 0;
11479 double x = 0;
11480 double y = 0;
11481 double w = 0;
11482 double h = 0;
11483 string line = sts;
11484 bool points = false;
11485 char sep = '"';
11486 for (int i = 0; i < line.Length; i++)
11487 {
11488 char c = line[i];
11489 if (c == sep)
11490 {
11491 if (!inSep)
11492 {
11493 inSep = true;
11494 }
11495 else
11496 inSep = false;
11497 continue;
11498 }
11499
11500 if ((c == ',' || c == '\t') && (!inSep || points))
11501 {
11502 //ROIID,ROINAME,TYPE,ID,SHAPEINDEX,TEXT,C,Z,T,X,Y,W,H,POINTS,STROKECOLOR,STROKECOLORW,FILLCOLOR,FONTSIZE
11503 if (col == 0)
11504 {
11505 //ROIID
11506 an.roiID = val;
11507 }
11508 else
11509 if (col == 1)
11510 {
11511 //ROINAME
11512 an.roiName = val;
11513 }
11514 else
11515 if (col == 2)
11516 {
11517 //TYPE
11518 an.type = (ROI.Type)Enum.Parse(typeof(ROI.Type), val);
11519 }
11520 else
11521 if (col == 3)
11522 {
11523 //ID
11524 an.id = val;
11525 }
11526 else
11527 if (col == 4)
11528 {
11529 //SHAPEINDEX/
11530 an.shapeIndex = int.Parse(val);
11531 }
11532 else
11533 if (col == 5)
11534 {
11535 //TEXT/
11536 an.Text = val;
11537 }
11538 else
11539 if (col == 6)
11540 {
11541 an.serie = int.Parse(val);
11542 }
11543 else
11544 if (col == 7)
11545 {
11546 an.coord.Z = int.Parse(val);
11547 }
11548 else
11549 if (col == 8)
11550 {
11551 an.coord.C = int.Parse(val);
11552 }
11553 else
11554 if (col == 9)
11555 {
11556 an.coord.T = int.Parse(val);
11557 }
11558 else
11559 if (col == 10)
11560 {
11561 x = double.Parse(val);
11562 }
11563 else
11564 if (col == 11)
11565 {
11566 y = double.Parse(val);
11567 }
11568 else
11569 if (col == 12)
11570 {
11571 w = double.Parse(val);
11572 }
11573 else
11574 if (col == 13)
11575 {
11576 h = double.Parse(val);
11577 }
11578 else
11579 if (col == 14)
11580 {
11581 //POINTS
11582 if (c == ',')
11583 {
11584 inSep = true;
11585 points = true;
11586 val += c;
11587 continue;
11588 }
11589 else
11590 {
11591 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(val));
11592 points = false;
11593 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
11594 }
11595 }
11596 else
11597 if (col == 15)
11598 {
11599 //STROKECOLOR
11600 string[] st = val.Split(',');
11601 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(int.Parse(st[0]), int.Parse(st[1]), int.Parse(st[2]), int.Parse(st[3]));
11602 }
11603 else
11604 if (col == 16)
11605 {
11606 //STROKECOLORW
11607 an.strokeWidth = double.Parse(val);
11608 }
11609 else
11610 if (col == 17)
11611 {
11612 //FILLCOLOR
11613 string[] st = val.Split(',');
11614 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(int.Parse(st[0]), int.Parse(st[1]), int.Parse(st[2]), int.Parse(st[3]));
11615 }
11616 else
11617 if (col == 18)
11618 {
11619 //FONTSIZE
11620 double s = double.Parse(val);
11621 an.font = new System.Drawing.Font(System.Drawing.SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)s, System.Drawing.FontStyle.Regular);
11622 }
11623 col++;
11624 val = "";
11625 }
11626 else
11627 val += c;
11628 }
11629
11630 return an;
11631 }
11637 public static void ExportROIsCSV(string filename, List<ROI> Annotations)
11638 {
11639 string con = columns;
11640 con += ROIsToString(Annotations);
11641 File.WriteAllText(filename, con);
11642 }
11648 public static List<ROI> ImportROIsCSV(string filename)
11649 {
11650 List<ROI> list = new List<ROI>();
11651 if (!File.Exists(filename))
11652 return list;
11653 string[] sts = File.ReadAllLines(filename);
11654 //We start reading from line 1.
11655 for (int i = 1; i < sts.Length; i++)
11656 {
11657 list.Add(StringToROI(sts[i]));
11658 }
11659 return list;
11660 }
11668 public static void ExportROIFolder(string path, string filename)
11669 {
11670 string[] fs = Directory.GetFiles(path);
11671 int i = 0;
11672 foreach (string f in fs)
11673 {
11674 List<ROI> annotations = OpenOMEROIs(f, 0);
11675 string ff = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(f);
11676 ExportROIsCSV(path + "//" + ff + "-" + i.ToString() + ".csv", annotations);
11677 i++;
11678 }
11679 }
11680
11681 private static BioImage bstats = null;
11682 private static bool update = false;
11688 public static void AutoThreshold(BioImage b, bool updateImageStats)
11689 {
11690 bstats = b;
11691 Statistics statistics = null;
11692 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
11693 statistics = new Statistics(true);
11694 else
11695 statistics = new Statistics(false);
11696 for (int i = 0; i < b.Buffers.Count; i++)
11697 {
11698 if (b.Buffers[i].Stats == null || updateImageStats)
11699 b.Buffers[i].Stats = Statistics.FromBytes(b.Buffers[i]);
11700 if (b.Buffers[i].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
11701 statistics.AddStatistics(b.Buffers[i].Stats[0]);
11702 else
11703 {
11704 for (int r = 0; r < b.Buffers[i].RGBChannelsCount; r++)
11705 {
11706 statistics.AddStatistics(b.Buffers[i].Stats[r]);
11707 }
11708 }
11709 }
11710
11711 for (int c = 0; c < b.Channels.Count; c++)
11712 {
11713 Statistics[] sts;
11714 if (b.RGBChannelCount == 1)
11715 {
11716 sts = new Statistics[1];
11717 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
11718 {
11719 sts[0] = new Statistics(true);
11720 }
11721 else
11722 sts[0] = new Statistics(false);
11723 }
11724 else
11725 {
11726 sts = new Statistics[b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount];
11727 if (b.RGBChannelCount == 3)
11728 {
11729 sts[0] = new Statistics(true);
11730 sts[1] = new Statistics(true);
11731 sts[2] = new Statistics(true);
11732 }
11733 else
11734 {
11735 sts[0] = new Statistics(false);
11736 sts[1] = new Statistics(false);
11737 sts[2] = new Statistics(false);
11738 sts[3] = new Statistics(false);
11739 }
11740 }
11741
11742 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
11743 {
11744 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
11745 {
11746 int ind = 0;
11747 if (b.RGBChannelCount > 1)
11748 ind = b.Coords[z, 0, t];
11749 else
11750 ind = b.Coords[z, c, t];
11751 if (b.Buffers[ind].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
11752 sts[0].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[0]);
11753 else
11754 {
11755 sts[0].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[0]);
11756 sts[1].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[1]);
11757 sts[2].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[2]);
11758 if (b.Buffers[ind].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
11759 sts[3].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[3]);
11760 }
11761 }
11762 }
11763 if (b.RGBChannelCount == 1)
11764 sts[0].MeanHistogram();
11765 else
11766 {
11767 sts[0].MeanHistogram();
11768 sts[1].MeanHistogram();
11769 sts[2].MeanHistogram();
11770 if (b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
11771 sts[3].MeanHistogram();
11772 }
11773 b.Channels[c].stats = sts;
11774 }
11775 statistics.MeanHistogram();
11776 b.statistics = statistics;
11777
11778 }
11781 public static void AutoThreshold()
11782 {
11783 AutoThreshold(bstats, update);
11784 }
11791 public static void AutoThresholdThread(BioImage b)
11792 {
11793 bstats = b;
11794 Thread th = new Thread(AutoThreshold);
11795 th.Start();
11796 }
11799 public void Dispose()
11800 {
11801 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
11802 {
11803 Buffers[i].Dispose();
11804 }
11805 for (int i = 0; i < Channels.Count; i++)
11806 {
11807 Channels[i].Dispose();
11808 }
11809 Images.RemoveImage(this);
11810 GC.Collect();
11811 }
11816 public override string ToString()
11817 {
11818 return Filename.ToString() + ", (" + Volume.Location.X + ", " + Volume.Location.Y + ", " + Volume.Location.Z + ")";
11819 }
11820
11827 public static BioImage operator /(BioImage a, float b)
11828 {
11829 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
11830 {
11831 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] / b;
11832 }
11833 return a;
11834 }
11841 public static BioImage operator *(BioImage a, float b)
11842 {
11843 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
11844 {
11845 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] * b;
11846 }
11847 return a;
11848 }
11855 public static BioImage operator +(BioImage a, float b)
11856 {
11857 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
11858 {
11859 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] + b;
11860 }
11861 return a;
11862 }
11869 public static BioImage operator -(BioImage a, float b)
11870 {
11871 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
11872 {
11873 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] - b;
11874 }
11875 return a;
11876 }
11877
11884 public static BioImage operator /(BioImage a, ColorS b)
11885 {
11886 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
11887 {
11888 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] / b;
11889 }
11890 return a;
11891 }
11898 public static BioImage operator *(BioImage a, ColorS b)
11899 {
11900 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
11901 {
11902 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] * b;
11903 }
11904 return a;
11905 }
11913 public static BioImage operator +(BioImage a, ColorS b)
11914 {
11915 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
11916 {
11917 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] + b;
11918 }
11919 return a;
11920 }
11927 public static BioImage operator -(BioImage a, ColorS b)
11928 {
11929 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
11930 {
11931 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] - b;
11932 }
11933 return a;
11934 }
11935 }
